Emperor Thaurissan.name: Emperor Thaurissan
Emperor Thaurissan.text: At the end of your turn, reduce the Cost of cards in your hand by (1).
Emperor Thaurissan.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Emperor Thaurissan.flavor: His second greatest regret is summoning an evil Firelord who enslaved his entire people.
Emperor Thaurissan.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Lightspawn.name: Lightspawn
Lightspawn.text: This minion's Attack is always equal to its Health.
Lightspawn.flavor: Spawn of the Light? Or Pawn of the Lights?

Doomcaller.name: Doomcaller
Doomcaller.text: Battlecry: Give your C'Thun +2/+2 (wherever it is). If it's dead, shuffle it into your deck.
Doomcaller.flavor: "Hello, is Doom there? No? Can I leave a message?"

Zoobot.name: Zoobot
Zoobot.text: Battlecry: Give a random friendly Beast, Dragon, and Murloc +1/+1.
Zoobot.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
Zoobot.flavor: The Murloc is taking the picture.
Zoobot.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.

Salty Dog.name: Salty Dog
Salty Dog.flavor: He's recently recovered from being a "scurvy dog."

Tortollan Primalist.name: Tortollan Primalist
Tortollan Primalist.text: Battlecry: Discover a spell and cast it with random targets.
Tortollan Primalist.flavor: I see pizza in my future.

Eaglehorn Bow.name: Eaglehorn Bow
Eaglehorn Bow.text: [x]Whenever a friendly Secret is revealed, gain +1 Durability.
Eaglehorn Bow.flavor: First Lesson: Put the pointy end in the other guy.

Blood Imp.name: Blood Imp
Blood Imp.text: [x] Stealth. At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Health.
Blood Imp.flavor: Imps are content to hide and viciously taunt everyone nearby.

Auchenai Soulpriest.name: Auchenai Soulpriest
Auchenai Soulpriest.text: Your cards and powers that restore Health now deal damage instead.
Auchenai Soulpriest.flavor: The Auchenai know the end is coming, but they're not sure when.

Tinker's Sharpsword Oil.name: Tinker's Sharpsword Oil
Tinker's Sharpsword Oil.text: Give your weapon +3 Attack. Combo: Give a random friendly minion +3 Attack.
Tinker's Sharpsword Oil.flavor: "Get ready to strike oil!" - Super-cheesy battle cry

Forlorn Stalker.name: Forlorn Stalker
Forlorn Stalker.text: Battlecry: Give all Deathrattle minions in your hand +1/+1.
Forlorn Stalker.flavor: He's going to leave the dying up to you, if that's cool.

Captain's Parrot.name: Captain's Parrot
Captain's Parrot.text: Battlecry: Draw a Pirate from your deck.
Captain's Parrot.howToEarn: Unlocked when you have all the Pirates from the Classic Set.
Captain's Parrot.flavor: Pirates and Parrots go together like Virmen and Carrots.
Captain's Parrot.howToEarnGolden: Unlocked when you have all the Golden Pirates from the Expert Set.

Primordial Glyph.name: Primordial Glyph
Primordial Glyph.text: Discover a spell. Reduce its Cost by (2).
Primordial Glyph.flavor: It's the Ancient Tol'vir symbol for "Whoops!"

Mortal Coil.name: Mortal Coil
Mortal Coil.text: Deal $1 damage to a minion. If that kills it, draw a card.
Mortal Coil.flavor: If your spells look like horrifying skulls, let's be honest, you should get to draw some cards.

Lightning Storm.name: Lightning Storm
Lightning Storm.text: Deal $2-$3 damage to all enemy minions. Overload: (2)
Lightning Storm.flavor: An umbrella won't be effective, I'm afraid.

Clockwork Knight.name: Clockwork Knight
Clockwork Knight.flavor: It takes a lot to wind him up.

Dragonling Mechanic.name: Dragonling Mechanic
Dragonling Mechanic.flavor: She is still working on installing the rocket launcher add-on for Mr. Bitey.

Ysera.name: Ysera
Ysera.text: At the end of your turn, add a Dream Card to your hand.
Ysera.flavor: Ysera rules the Emerald Dream.  Which is some kind of green-mirror-version of the real world, or something?

Light's Champion.name: Light's Champion
Light's Champion.flavor: When there's something strange (say, a gibbering demon) in your neighborhood, who are you going to call?

Hand of Protection.name: Hand of Protection
Hand of Protection.flavor: This spell has been renamed so many times, even paladins don’t know what it should be called anymore.

Nefarian.name: Nefarian
Nefarian.text: Battlecry: Add 2 random spells to your hand (from your opponent's class).
Nefarian.howToEarn: Unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Nefarian.flavor: They call him "Blackwing" because he's a black dragon...... and he's got wings.
Nefarian.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Stormpike Commando.name: Stormpike Commando
Stormpike Commando.flavor: The Stormpike Commandos are demolition experts.  They also bake a mean cupcake.

Primalfin Champion.name: Primalfin Champion
Primalfin Champion.text: Deathrattle: Return any spells you cast on this minion to your hand.
Primalfin Champion.flavor: Sure, he'll return your stuff.  OVER HIS DEAD BODY!

Selfless Hero.name: Selfless Hero
Selfless Hero.text: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion Divine Shield.
Selfless Hero.flavor: "Don't worry about me… I'll just be here... under these tentacles."

Stormcrack.name: Stormcrack
Stormcrack.flavor: WARNING: DO NOT TOUCH THE PURPLE BALL OF LIGHTNING

Adaptation.name: Adaptation
Adaptation.flavor: Pray for salvation. If that fails, pray for extra horns or bigger teeth.

Jade Shuriken.name: Jade Shuriken
Jade Shuriken.flavor: Good news is, after you remove it from your wound, you can use it to pay your medical bills!

Mechwarper.name: Mechwarper
Mechwarper.flavor: Mechs that summon mechs? What's next? Donuts that summon donuts? Mmmmm.

Moat Lurker.name: Moat Lurker
Moat Lurker.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
Moat Lurker.flavor: He really enjoys lurking and gets a lot of job satisfaction out of it.
Moat Lurker.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.

Deathlord.name: Deathlord
Deathlord.text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Your opponent puts a minion from their deck into the battlefield.
Deathlord.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Deathlord.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Sergeant Sally.name: Sergeant Sally
Sergeant Sally.text: Deathrattle: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack to all enemy minions.
Sergeant Sally.flavor: "Who is she?  Where did she come from?  We don't even have a police force here in Gadgetzan!!" - Mayor Noggenfogger

Swamp King Dred.name: Swamp King Dred
Swamp King Dred.text: After your opponent plays a minion, attack it.
Swamp King Dred.flavor: Swamp King Dred, more like Swamp King Dead, amiright?

The Curator.name: The Curator
The Curator.text: Taunt Battlecry: Draw a Beast, Dragon, and Murloc from your deck.
The Curator.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
The Curator.flavor: The Curator guards Azeroth’s deadliest creatures, but it’s secretly terrified of squirrels.
The Curator.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.

Herald Volazj.name: Herald Volazj
Herald Volazj.text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 copy of each of your other minions.
Herald Volazj.flavor: His whole job is yelling "Yogg-Saron comin'!"

Drakonid Operative.name: Drakonid Operative
Drakonid Operative.text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, Discover a card in  your opponent's deck.
Drakonid Operative.flavor: His job is to spy on the Goons and the Jade Lotus, but he's OBVIOUSLY a dragon so it's pretty hard work.

Undertaker.name: Undertaker
Undertaker.text: Whenever you summon a minion with Deathrattle, gain +1 Attack.
Undertaker.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Undertaker.flavor: In a world where you can run to a spirit healer and resurrect yourself, Undertakers do pretty light business.
Undertaker.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Grimscale Chum.name: Grimscale Chum
Grimscale Chum.text: [x]Battlecry: Give a random Murloc in your hand +1/+1.
Grimscale Chum.flavor: Listen, see?  We'll take 'em to the docks, see?  And throw 'em in the sea, see?

Unlicensed Apothecary.name: Unlicensed Apothecary
Unlicensed Apothecary.text: Whenever you summon a minion, deal 5 damage to your hero.
Unlicensed Apothecary.flavor: Get the ingredients wrong on ONE healing potion and they take your license. What a world!

Murloc Warleader.name: Murloc Warleader
Murloc Warleader.flavor: Do Murlocs ever get tired of making the same old sound?  Nope!  Mrglglrglglglglglglgl!

Shadowform.name: Shadowform
Shadowform.text: Your Hero Power becomes 'Deal 2 damage'. If already in Shadowform: 3 damage.
Shadowform.flavor: If a bright light shines on a priest in Shadowform… do they cast a shadow?

Ethereal Conjurer.name: Ethereal Conjurer
Ethereal Conjurer.howToEarn: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Ethereal Conjurer.flavor: Despite the name, he's a solid conjurer.
Ethereal Conjurer.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Freezing Potion.name: Freezing Potion
Freezing Potion.flavor: This is delicious! Oh no. BRAIN FREEEEEEEZE!

Tournament Medic.name: Tournament Medic
Tournament Medic.flavor: The medic tournament is less entertaining than the Grand Tournament.

Lost in the Jungle.name: Lost in the Jungle
Lost in the Jungle.flavor: George and Karl were never heard from again.

Jungle Panther.name: Jungle Panther
Jungle Panther.flavor: Stranglethorn is a beautiful place to visit, but you wouldn't want to live there.

Pit Snake.name: Pit Snake
Pit Snake.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Pit Snake.flavor: It could be worse.  It could be a Snake Pit.
Pit Snake.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Inner Rage.name: Inner Rage
Inner Rage.text: Deal $1 damage to a minion and give it +2 Attack.
Inner Rage.flavor: They're only smiling on the outside.

Feeding Time.name: Feeding Time
Feeding Time.text: Deal $3 damage to a minion. Summon three 1/1 Pterrordaxes.
Feeding Time.flavor: True, they're only 1/1s, but they eat as much as most 4/4s!

Cult Master.name: Cult Master
Cult Master.text: Whenever one of your other minions dies, draw a card.
Cult Master.flavor: She may be an evil cult master, but she still calls her parents once a week.

Faceless Manipulator.name: Faceless Manipulator
Faceless Manipulator.text: Battlecry: Choose a minion and become a copy of it.
Faceless Manipulator.targetingArrowText: Become a copy of a minion.
Faceless Manipulator.flavor: The Faceless Ones are servants of Yogg-Saron, and they feed on fear. Right now they are feeding on your fear of accidentally disenchanting all your good cards.

Competitive Spirit.name: Competitive Spirit
Competitive Spirit.text: Secret: When your turn starts, give your minions +1/+1.
Competitive Spirit.flavor: Competition can be an inspiration to improve oneself.  Or kill all the competitors.

Houndmaster.name: Houndmaster
Houndmaster.flavor: "Who let the dogs out?" he asks.  It's rhetorical.

Blizzard.name: Blizzard
Blizzard.text: Deal $2 damage to all enemy minions and Freeze them.
Blizzard.flavor: This spell can be very Entertaining.

Mirror Image.name: Mirror Image
Mirror Image.flavor: Oh hey it's Mirror Image! !egamI rorriM s'ti yeh hO

Venture Co. Mercenary.name: Venture Co. Mercenary
Venture Co. Mercenary.flavor: No Job is too big.  No fee is too big.

Refreshment Vendor.name: Refreshment Vendor
Refreshment Vendor.flavor: Menu:  Funnel cakes, carrots, popcorn, jormungar steaks.  It's hard serving a diverse clientele.

Tar Creeper.name: Tar Creeper
Tar Creeper.text: Taunt Has +2 Attack during your opponent's turn.
Tar Creeper.flavor: If you won't come to the tar pits, we'll bring them to you!

Booty Bay Bodyguard.name: Booty Bay Bodyguard
Booty Bay Bodyguard.flavor: You can hire him... until someone offers him enough gold to turn on you.

Dragon Consort.name: Dragon Consort
Dragon Consort.text: Battlecry: The next Dragon you play costs (2) less.
Dragon Consort.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Dragon Consort.flavor: Everybody wants someone to snuggle with. Even giant armored scaly draconic beasts of destruction.
Dragon Consort.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Reckless Rocketeer.name: Reckless Rocketeer
Reckless Rocketeer.flavor: One Insane Rocketeer.   One Rocket full of Explosives.   Infinite Fun.

Biteweed.name: Biteweed
Biteweed.text: Combo: Gain +1/+1 for each other card you've played this turn.

Journey Below.name: Journey Below
Journey Below.flavor: Don't stop believing there's something below.

Arcane Explosion.name: Arcane Explosion
Arcane Explosion.text: Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions.
Arcane Explosion.flavor: This spell is much better than Arcane Implosion.

Holy Smite.name: Holy Smite
Holy Smite.flavor: It doesn't matter how pious you are.  Everyone needs a good smiting now and again.

Elite Tauren Chieftain.name: Elite Tauren Chieftain
Elite Tauren Chieftain.text: Battlecry: Give both players the power to ROCK! (with a Power Chord card)
Elite Tauren Chieftain.flavor: He's looking for a drummer.  The current candidates are: Novice Engineer, Sen'jin Shieldmasta', and Ragnaros the Firelord.

Cogmaster's Wrench.name: Cogmaster's Wrench
Cogmaster's Wrench.text: Has +2 Attack while you have a Mech.
Cogmaster's Wrench.flavor: For tightening cogs and smashin' troggs!

Mire Keeper.name: Mire Keeper
Mire Keeper.text: [x]Choose One - Summon a 2/2 Slime; or Gain an empty Mana Crystal.
Mire Keeper.flavor:
"Hey.... Is that Mire for sale?" 
"No.  I'm keeping it."

Grievous Bite.name: Grievous Bite
Grievous Bite.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion and $1 damage to adjacent ones.
Grievous Bite.flavor: Ooh.  I'll have a bite of this, and of this, and of this...

Gormok the Impaler.name: Gormok the Impaler
Gormok the Impaler.text: Battlecry: If you have at least 4 other minions, deal 4 damage.
Gormok the Impaler.flavor: Gormok has been giving impaling lessons in a small tent near the tournament grounds.  For only 25g you too could learn the fine art of impaling!

Knuckles.name: Knuckles
Knuckles.text:
After this attacks a
minion, it also hits the enemy hero.
Knuckles.flavor: When confronted with accusations of performance-enhancing bananas, Knuckles replied, "I get my fruit from trees I knock down with my bare hands like everyone else."

Djinni of Zephyrs.name: Djinni of Zephyrs
Djinni of Zephyrs.text: After you cast a spell on another friendly minion, cast a copy of it on this one.
Djinni of Zephyrs.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Djinni of Zephyrs.flavor: If you want your wish granted, don't rub him the wrong way.
Djinni of Zephyrs.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Explore Un'Goro.name: Explore Un'Goro
Explore Un'Goro.text: Replace your deck with copies of "Discover a card."
Explore Un'Goro.flavor: It turns out cards DO grow on trees!

Holy Light.name: Holy Light
Holy Light.flavor: If you are often bathed in Holy Light, you should consider wearing sunscreen.

Water Elemental.name: Water Elemental
Water Elemental.text: Freeze any character damaged by this minion.
Water Elemental.flavor: Don't summon a water elemental at a party.  It'll dampen the mood.

Pyros.name: Pyros
Pyros.text: Deathrattle: Return this to your hand as a 6/6 that costs (6).
Pyros.flavor: If you strike her down, she shall become more powerful than you can possibly… well, she'll become a 6/6 anyways.

Ironforge Portal.name: Ironforge Portal
Ironforge Portal.text:
Gain 4 Armor.
Summon a random
4-Cost minion.
Ironforge Portal.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
Ironforge Portal.flavor: Come to beautiful Ironforge! Where irons are forged and the forges are iron!
Ironforge Portal.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.

Armorsmith.name: Armorsmith
Armorsmith.text: Whenever a friendly minion takes damage, gain 1 Armor.
Armorsmith.flavor: She accepts guild funds for repairs!

Violet Teacher.name: Violet Teacher
Violet Teacher.text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a 1/1 Violet Apprentice.
Violet Teacher.flavor: If you don't pay attention, you may be turned into a pig.  And then you get your name on the board.

Lightwarden.name: Lightwarden
Lightwarden.text: Whenever a character is healed, gain +2 Attack.
Lightwarden.flavor: She’s smaller than her sisters Mediumwarden and Heavywarden.

Inner Fire.name: Inner Fire
Inner Fire.text: Change a minion's Attack to be equal to its Health.
Inner Fire.flavor: Good idea: Buffing your minions.  Bad idea: Starting a conversation in the Barrens.

Archmage Antonidas.name: Archmage Antonidas
Archmage Antonidas.text: Whenever you cast a spell, add a 'Fireball' spell to your hand.
Archmage Antonidas.flavor: Antonidas was the Grand Magus of the Kirin Tor, and Jaina's mentor.  This was a big step up from being Grand Magus of Jelly Donuts.

Mini-Mage.name: Mini-Mage
Mini-Mage.flavor: He is sometimes found hiding in the treasure chest in the Gurubashi Arena.

Warsong Commander.name: Warsong Commander
Warsong Commander.flavor: The Warsong clan is such drama. It's really not worth it to become a commander.

Silent Knight.name: Silent Knight
Silent Knight.flavor: He used to be a librarian.  Old habits die hard.

Windfury Harpy.name: Windfury Harpy
Windfury Harpy.flavor: Harpies are not pleasant sounding.  That's the nicest I can put it.

Lakkari Sacrifice.name: Lakkari Sacrifice
Lakkari Sacrifice.flavor: They asked, “And what must we give in return?” Gul’dan lowered his hood and answered: “Six… cards…”

Burly Rockjaw Trogg.name: Burly Rockjaw Trogg
Burly Rockjaw Trogg.text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, gain +2 Attack.
Burly Rockjaw Trogg.flavor: He's burly because he does CrossFit.

Jade Idol.name: Jade Idol
Jade Idol.collectionText: Choose One - Summon a Jade Golem; or Shuffle 3 copies of this card into your deck.
Jade Idol.text: Choose One - Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem; or Shuffle 3 copies of this card into your deck.

Arcane Missiles.name: Arcane Missiles
Arcane Missiles.text: Deal $3 damage randomly split among all enemies.
Arcane Missiles.flavor: You'd think you'd be able to control your missiles a little better since you're a powerful mage and all.

Fireguard Destroyer.name: Fireguard Destroyer
Fireguard Destroyer.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Fireguard Destroyer.flavor: Ragnaros interviews hundreds of Fire Elementals for the position of "Destroyer" but very few have what it takes.
Fireguard Destroyer.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Redemption.name: Redemption
Redemption.text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, return it to life with 1 Health.
Redemption.flavor: I am not sure how you get demptioned the first time.  It’s a mystery!

Book Wyrm.name: Book Wyrm
Book Wyrm.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, destroy an enemy minion with 3 or less Attack.
Book Wyrm.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
Book Wyrm.flavor: His favorites are classic tragedies like "The Hobbit" and "Grendel".
Book Wyrm.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.

Volcanic Lumberer.name: Volcanic Lumberer
Volcanic Lumberer.text: Taunt Costs (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
Volcanic Lumberer.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Volcanic Lumberer.flavor: The roots, the roots, the roots is on fire!
Volcanic Lumberer.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Bomb Squad.name: Bomb Squad
Bomb Squad.text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to an enemy minion. Deathrattle: Deal 5 damage to your hero.
Bomb Squad.flavor: Please don't explode!  Please don't explode!  Please don't explode!

Arcane Anomaly.name: Arcane Anomaly
Arcane Anomaly.text:
Whenever you cast a spell, give this minion
+1 Health.
Arcane Anomaly.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
Arcane Anomaly.flavor: He used to get work as a Spatial Anomaly, but he got tired of having his polarity reversed.
Arcane Anomaly.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.

Shadowbomber.name: Shadowbomber
Shadowbomber.flavor: Shadowbomber does her job, but she's kind of phoning it in at this point.

Dark Iron Dwarf.name: Dark Iron Dwarf
Dark Iron Dwarf.text: Battlecry: Give a minion +2 Attack this turn.
Dark Iron Dwarf.flavor: Guardians of Dark Iron Ore.  Perhaps the most annoying ore, given where you have to forge it.

Frost Shock.name: Frost Shock
Frost Shock.text: Deal $1 damage to an enemy character and Freeze it.

Astral Communion.name: Astral Communion
Astral Communion.text: Gain 10 Mana Crystals. Discard your hand.
Astral Communion.flavor: Hey!  Moon!  Can I have some mana crystals?

Firelands Portal.name: Firelands Portal
Firelands Portal.text:
Deal $5 damage. Summon a random
5-Cost minion.
Firelands Portal.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Prologue, in One Night in Karazhan.
Firelands Portal.flavor: Come to beautiful Firelands! Where it's "Way nicer than the Abyssal Maw!"
Firelands Portal.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Prologue, in One Night in Karazhan.

Mysterious Challenger.name: Mysterious Challenger
Mysterious Challenger.text: Battlecry: Put one of each Secret from your deck into the battlefield.
Mysterious Challenger.flavor: He may sound surly and antisocial, but he's actually just really shy.

Shade of Naxxramas.name: Shade of Naxxramas
Shade of Naxxramas.text: Stealth. At the start of your turn, gain +1/+1.
Shade of Naxxramas.howToEarn: Unlocked in Frostwyrm Lair, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Shade of Naxxramas.flavor: The Shades of Naxxramas hate the living. They even have a slur they use to refer them: Livers.
Shade of Naxxramas.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Frostwyrm Lair, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Addled Grizzly.name: Addled Grizzly
Addled Grizzly.text: After you summon a minion, give it +1/+1.
Addled Grizzly.flavor: Druids who spend too long in bear form are more susceptible to the whispers of the Old Gods.  Right now they are whispering the lyrics to "La Bamba".

Luckydo Buccaneer.name: Luckydo Buccaneer
Luckydo Buccaneer.text: Battlecry: If your weapon has at least 3 Attack, gain +4/+4.
Luckydo Buccaneer.flavor: You can't just leave a Luckydo somewhere.  You gotta keep 'em with you!  Especially in Gadgetzan!

Mana Bind.name: Mana Bind
Mana Bind.text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, add a copy to your hand that costs (0).

Fierce Monkey.name: Fierce Monkey
Fierce Monkey.howToEarn: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Fierce Monkey.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Argent Protector.name: Argent Protector
Argent Protector.flavor: "I'm not saying you can dodge fireballs.  I'm saying with this shield, you won't have to."

Stone Sentinel.name: Stone Sentinel
Stone Sentinel.text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, summon two 2/3 Elementals with Taunt.
Stone Sentinel.flavor: He and his friends just want to rock out.

Felfire Potion.name: Felfire Potion
Felfire Potion.flavor: Kazakus has a squad of imps bottling Felfire round-the-clock and he *still* can't keep up with demand.

Amani Berserker.name: Amani Berserker
Amani Berserker.flavor: If an Amani berserker asks "Joo lookin' at me?!", the correct response is "Nah, mon".

Tuskarr Totemic.name: Tuskarr Totemic
Tuskarr Totemic.flavor: Turns out the tuskarr aren't real choosy about their totems.

Bilefin Tidehunter.name: Bilefin Tidehunter
Bilefin Tidehunter.flavor: Bile actually makes for surprisingly sturdy fins.

Equality.name: Equality
Equality.text: Change the Health of ALL minions to 1.
Equality.flavor: We are all special unique snowflakes... with 1 Health.

Twilight Elder.name: Twilight Elder
Twilight Elder.text: At the end of your turn, give your C'Thun +1/+1 (wherever it is).
Twilight Elder.flavor: Just doesn't understand those Twilight Youngsters any more - with their comic books and their rock music.

Skeram Cultist.name: Skeram Cultist
Skeram Cultist.flavor: Just before he comes into play, there is an AWESOME training montage with C'Thun.

Spectral Knight.name: Spectral Knight
Spectral Knight.text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
Spectral Knight.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Spectral Knight.flavor: What do Faerie Dragons and Spectral Knights have in common?  They both love pasta!
Spectral Knight.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Rockbiter Weapon.name: Rockbiter Weapon
Rockbiter Weapon.text: Give a friendly character +3 Attack this turn.
Rockbiter Weapon.flavor: This would be real handy if your enemy is made of rock.

Giant Anaconda.name: Giant Anaconda
Giant Anaconda.text: Deathrattle: Summon a minion from your hand with 5 or more Attack.

Kabal Courier.name: Kabal Courier
Kabal Courier.text: Battlecry: Discover a Mage, Priest, or Warlock card.
Kabal Courier.flavor: Hey, you park your kodo under a harpy nest, you get what you deserve.

Resurrect.name: Resurrect
Resurrect.text: Summon a random friendly minion that died this game.
Resurrect.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Resurrect.flavor: I walked into the dungeon and noticed a slain adventurer. In his final moments, he had scrawled out a message in the dust on the wall beside him. Two words: "rez plz"
Resurrect.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Totem Golem.name: Totem Golem
Totem Golem.flavor: What happens when you glue a buncha totems together.

Novice Engineer.name: Novice Engineer
Novice Engineer.flavor: "Half of this class will not graduate… since they'll have been turned to chickens." - Tinkmaster Overspark, teaching Gizmos 101.

Gang Up.name: Gang Up
Gang Up.text: Choose a minion. Shuffle 3 copies of it into your deck.
Gang Up.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Gang Up.flavor: If you are thinking about visiting Moonbrook, you better roll deep.
Gang Up.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Tyrantus.name: Tyrantus
Tyrantus.text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
Tyrantus.flavor: Millennia of evolutionary pressures turned his species into the Faerie Dragons we know today.

Illuminator.name: Illuminator
Illuminator.text: If you control a Secret at the end of your turn, restore 4 Health to your hero.
Illuminator.flavor: "LUMOS!" is not what they yell. What do you think this is, Hogwarts?

Cult Sorcerer.name: Cult Sorcerer
Cult Sorcerer.text: [x]Spell Damage +1 After you cast a spell, give your C'Thun +1/+1 (wherever it is).
Cult Sorcerer.flavor: No matter how many times we tell her not to, she keeps feeding C'Thun scraps under the table.

Infest.name: Infest
Infest.text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Add a random Beast to your hand."
Infest.flavor: The best part is the look on their face when you jump out of the cake! Err… corpse.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.text: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn. Gain 2 Armor.
Claw.flavor: The claw decides who will stay and who will go.

Steward of Darkshire.name: Steward of Darkshire
Steward of Darkshire.text: Whenever you summon a 1-Health minion, give it Divine Shield.
Steward of Darkshire.flavor: Turns out divine shields are way cheaper if you buy in bulk.

Counterfeit Coin.name: Counterfeit Coin
Counterfeit Coin.text: Gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.
Counterfeit Coin.flavor: There is something funny about this coin… can't quite put my finger on it…

Silence.name: Silence
Silence.flavor: Reserved for enemy spellcasters, evil liches from beyond the grave, and karaoke nights at the Grim Guzzler.

Fan of Knives.name: Fan of Knives
Fan of Knives.text: Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions. Draw a card.
Fan of Knives.flavor: I wouldn't say I LOVE knives, but I'm definitely a fan.

Reno Jackson.name: Reno Jackson
Reno Jackson.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, fully heal your hero.
Reno Jackson.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Reno Jackson.flavor: Reno is a four-time winner of the 'Best Accessorized Explorer' award.
Reno Jackson.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Counterspell.name: Counterspell
Counterspell.text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, Counter it.
Counterspell.flavor: What's the difference between a mage playing with Counterspell and a mage who isn't?  The mage who isn't is getting Pyroblasted in the face.

Bloodsail Corsair.name: Bloodsail Corsair
Bloodsail Corsair.text: [x]Battlecry: Remove 1 Durability from your opponent's weapon.
Bloodsail Corsair.flavor: Every pirate uses the same four digits to access Automated Gold Dispensers.  It's called the "Pirate's Code".

Freezing Trap.name: Freezing Trap
Freezing Trap.text: Secret: When an enemy minion attacks, return it to its owner's hand. It costs (2) more.
Freezing Trap.flavor: "Dang, that's cold." - appropriate response to Freezing Trap, or a mean joke.

Madder Bomber.name: Madder Bomber
Madder Bomber.text: Battlecry: Deal 6 damage randomly split between all other characters.

Hot Spring Guardian.name: Hot Spring Guardian
Hot Spring Guardian.flavor: NONE SHALL PASS until at least an hour after eating.

Shieldmaiden.name: Shieldmaiden
Shieldmaiden.flavor: She has three shieldbearers in her party to supply her with back ups when she gets low on durability.

Shadow Visions.name: Shadow Visions
Shadow Visions.text: Discover a copy of a spell in your deck.
Shadow Visions.flavor: This one’s a bird. And here’s a bunny!

Echo of Medivh.name: Echo of Medivh
Echo of Medivh.text: Put a copy of each friendly minion into your hand.
Echo of Medivh.flavor: Medivh's echo haunts Karazhan, eternally cheating at chess and Hearthstone.

Tortollan Forager.name: Tortollan Forager
Tortollan Forager.text: Battlecry: Add a random minion with 5 or more Attack to your hand.
Tortollan Forager.flavor: In the Tortollan tongue, Un’goro is known as the “Land of the Lost and Found.”

Dreadscale.name: Dreadscale
Dreadscale.text: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all other minions.
Dreadscale.flavor: Let's be clear about this:  ACIDMAW is the sidekick.

Stonehill Defender.name: Stonehill Defender
Stonehill Defender.flavor: Briefly tried stand-up comedy under the name "Stonehill Offender", but turtles are just too thin-skinned.

Master Swordsmith.name: Master Swordsmith
Master Swordsmith.text: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Attack.
Master Swordsmith.flavor: He's currently trying to craft a "flail-axe", but all the other swordsmiths say it can't be done.

Dark Arakkoa.name: Dark Arakkoa
Dark Arakkoa.flavor: There's a whole gradient of Arakkoa! This one is on the darker side.

Street Trickster.name: Street Trickster
Street Trickster.flavor: His first trick: making your wallet disappear!

Acidmaw.name: Acidmaw
Acidmaw.text: Whenever another minion takes damage, destroy it.
Acidmaw.flavor: With the help of his trusty sidekick Dreadscale, the giant jormungar Acidmaw is ready to face any knight!

Worgen Infiltrator.name: Worgen Infiltrator
Worgen Infiltrator.flavor: If you want to stop a worgen from infiltrating, just yell, "No! Bad boy!"

Blazecaller.name: Blazecaller
Blazecaller.text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, deal 5 damage.
Blazecaller.flavor: For when a flamecaller just won't do.

Spider Tank.name: Spider Tank
Spider Tank.flavor: "What if we put guns on it?" -Fizzblitz, staring at the spider-transportation-machine

Ogre Ninja.name: Ogre Ninja
Ogre Ninja.text: Stealth 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
Ogre Ninja.flavor: He didn't have the grades to get into ninja school, but his dad pulled some strings.

Volcanosaur.name: Volcanosaur
Volcanosaur.flavor: Always fun to say out loud "VOL-CA-NO-SAUUUR!"

Ancient Watcher.name: Ancient Watcher
Ancient Watcher.flavor: Why do its eyes seem to follow you as you walk by?

Vicious Fledgling.name: Vicious Fledgling
Vicious Fledgling.text: After this minion attacks a hero, Adapt.
Vicious Fledgling.flavor: A youngster who is truly hungry for self-improvement.

Kabal Lackey.name: Kabal Lackey
Kabal Lackey.text: [x]Battlecry: The next Secret you play this turn costs (0).
Kabal Lackey.flavor: I'll tell you one thing he doesn't lack: GUMPTION.

Assassin's Blade.name: Assassin's Blade
Assassin's Blade.flavor: Guaranteed to have been owned by a real assassin.   Certificate of authenticity included.

Grimestreet Smuggler.name: Grimestreet Smuggler
Grimestreet Smuggler.text: Battlecry: Give a random minion in your hand +1/+1.
Grimestreet Smuggler.flavor: She's got anything you want.  Need the latest derpinger?  No problem!

Majordomo Executus.name: Majordomo Executus
Majordomo Executus.text: Deathrattle: Replace your hero with Ragnaros, the Firelord.
Majordomo Executus.howToEarn: Unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Majordomo Executus.flavor: You thought Executus turned you into Ragnaros, but really Ragnaros was in you the whole time.
Majordomo Executus.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Poisoned Blade.name: Poisoned Blade
Poisoned Blade.text: Your Hero Power gives this weapon +1 Attack instead of replacing it.
Poisoned Blade.flavor: How much more poisoned can a blade get?  The answer is a lot.  A lot more poisoned.

Ship's Cannon.name: Ship's Cannon
Ship's Cannon.text: After you summon a Pirate, deal 2 damage to a random enemy.
Ship's Cannon.flavor: If you hear someone yell, "Cannonball!" you're about to get wet. Or crushed.

Sneed's Old Shredder.name: Sneed's Old Shredder
Sneed's Old Shredder.flavor: When Sneed was defeated in the Deadmines, his shredder was sold at auction to an anonymous buyer. (Probably Hogger.)

Arathi Weaponsmith.name: Arathi Weaponsmith
Arathi Weaponsmith.flavor: 50% off fist weapons, limited time only!

Chillwind Yeti.name: Chillwind Yeti
Chillwind Yeti.flavor: He always dreamed of coming down from the mountains and opening a noodle shop, but he never got the nerve.

Imp Master.name: Imp Master
Imp Master.text:
[x]At the end of your turn, deal
1 damage to this minion
 and summon a 1/1 Imp.
Imp Master.flavor: She would enjoy the job a lot more if she just could get the imps to QUIT BITING HER.

Eerie Statue.name: Eerie Statue
Eerie Statue.text: Can’t attack unless it’s the only minion in the battlefield.
Eerie Statue.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Eerie Statue.flavor: Don't blink!  Don't turn your back, don't look away, and DON'T BLINK.
Eerie Statue.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Blood Warriors.name: Blood Warriors
Blood Warriors.text: Add a copy of each damaged friendly minion to your hand.
Blood Warriors.flavor: They have an uneasy rivalry with the Blood Paladins.

Al'Akir the Windlord.name: Al'Akir the Windlord
Al'Akir the Windlord.flavor: He is the weakest of the four Elemental Lords.  And the other three don't let him forget it.

Coldlight Seer.name: Coldlight Seer
Coldlight Seer.flavor: The Coldlight murlocs reside in the darkest pits of the Abyssal Depths.  So no, there's no getting away from murlocs.

Flametongue Totem.name: Flametongue Totem
Flametongue Totem.flavor: Totemsmiths like to use the rarest woods for their totems.  There are even rumors of totems made of Ironbark Protectors.

Jade Behemoth.name: Jade Behemoth
Jade Behemoth.flavor: I think we should talk about the jade elephant in the room.

Dust Devil.name: Dust Devil
Dust Devil.flavor: Westfall is full of dust devils. And buzzards. And crazed golems. And pirates. Why does anyone live here?

Summoning Stone.name: Summoning Stone
Summoning Stone.text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a random minion of the same Cost.
Summoning Stone.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Summoning Stone.flavor: Sometimes it feels like it's always the same slackers that are waiting for a summon.
Summoning Stone.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Betrayal.name: Betrayal
Betrayal.text: Force an enemy minion to deal its damage to the minions next to it.
Betrayal.flavor: Everyone has a price. Gnomes, for example, can be persuaded by stuffed animals and small amounts of chocolate.

Holy Champion.name: Holy Champion
Holy Champion.text: Whenever a character is healed, gain +2 Attack.
Holy Champion.flavor: She really likes seeing people get better.  That's why she hurts them in the first place.

Crowd Favorite.name: Crowd Favorite
Crowd Favorite.text: Whenever you play a card with Battlecry, gain +1/+1.

Ancient Mage.name: Ancient Mage
Ancient Mage.flavor: Sometimes he forgets and just wanders into someone else's game.

SI:7 Agent.name: SI:7 Agent
SI:7 Agent.flavor: The agents of SI:7 are responsible for Stormwind's covert activities.  Their duties include espionage, assassination, and throwing surprise birthday parties for the royal family.

Deadly Fork.name: Deadly Fork
Deadly Fork.text: Deathrattle: Add a 3/2 weapon to your hand.
Deadly Fork.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
Deadly Fork.flavor: For a proper setting, place the deadly fork after the salad fork, but before the dinner fork.
Deadly Fork.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.

Humility.name: Humility
Humility.flavor: This card makes something really damp.  Oh wait.  That's "Humidity."

Twilight Geomancer.name: Twilight Geomancer
Twilight Geomancer.flavor: "Ok C'Thun, repeat after me: 'Your mother was a hamster.'"

Fire Plume Harbinger.name: Fire Plume Harbinger
Fire Plume Harbinger.text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of Elementals in your hand by (1).
Fire Plume Harbinger.flavor: Good for summoning elementals. Great for making s'mores.

Animated Armor.name: Animated Armor
Animated Armor.text: Your hero can only take 1 damage at a time.
Animated Armor.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Animated Armor.flavor: Try putting it on.  Wait, let me get my camera.
Animated Armor.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

C'Thun.name: C'Thun
C'Thun.text: Battlecry: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack randomly split among all enemies.
C'Thun.howToEarn: Unlocked when opening a Whispers of the Old Gods pack.
C'Thun.flavor: C'Thun's least favorite Hearthstone card: Eye for an Eye.
C'Thun.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked after opening a Whispers of the Old Gods pack.

Snowchugger.name: Snowchugger
Snowchugger.text: Freeze any character damaged by this minion.
Snowchugger.flavor: Do the slow chant when he waddles by: "Chug! Chug! Chug!"

Goblin Sapper.name: Goblin Sapper
Goblin Sapper.text: Has +4 Attack while your opponent has 6 or more cards in hand.
Goblin Sapper.flavor: He’s not such a binge exploder anymore. These days, he only explodes socially.

Backstab.name: Backstab
Backstab.text: Deal $2 damage to an undamaged minion.
Backstab.flavor: It's funny how often yelling "Look over there!" gets your opponent to turn around.

Obsidian Destroyer.name: Obsidian Destroyer
Obsidian Destroyer.text: At the end of your turn, summon a 1/1 Scarab with Taunt.
Obsidian Destroyer.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Obsidian Destroyer.flavor: No obsidian is safe around the Obsidian Destroyer!
Obsidian Destroyer.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Piloted Sky Golem.name: Piloted Sky Golem
Piloted Sky Golem.flavor: The pinnacle of goblin engineering. Includes an espresso machine and foot massager.

Polymorph: Boar.name: Polymorph: Boar
Polymorph: Boar.text: Transform a minion into a 4/2 Boar with Charge.

Goblin Auto-Barber.name: Goblin Auto-Barber
Goblin Auto-Barber.flavor: This guy is excellent at adjusting your haircut and/or height.

Holy Fire.name: Holy Fire
Holy Fire.text: Deal $5 damage. Restore #5 Health to your hero.

Lightwell.name: Lightwell
Lightwell.text: At the start of your turn, restore 3 Health to a damaged friendly character.
Lightwell.flavor: It isn't clear if people ignore the Lightwell, or if it is just invisible.

Skycap'n Kragg.name: Skycap'n Kragg
Skycap'n Kragg.text: Charrrrrge Costs (1) less for each friendly Pirate.
Skycap'n Kragg.flavor: What's more boss than riding a parrot with a jawbone for a shoulderpad while wielding a giant hook-lance-thing and wearing a pirate hat?  NOTHING.

Target Dummy.name: Target Dummy
Target Dummy.flavor: The engineering equivalent of a "Kick Me" sticker.

Tidal Surge.name: Tidal Surge
Tidal Surge.text: Deal $4 damage to a minion. Restore #4 Health to your hero.
Tidal Surge.flavor: Also good for removing pesky stains.

Anub'arak.name: Anub'arak
Anub'arak.text: Deathrattle: Return this to your hand and summon a 4/4 Nerubian.
Anub'arak.flavor: Was actually a pretty nice guy before, you know, the whole Lich King thing.

Explosive Shot.name: Explosive Shot
Explosive Shot.text: Deal $5 damage to a minion and $2 damage to adjacent ones.
Explosive Shot.flavor: Pull the pin, count to 5, then shoot.  Then duck.

Bolf Ramshield.name: Bolf Ramshield
Bolf Ramshield.text: Whenever your hero takes damage, this minion takes it instead.
Bolf Ramshield.flavor: Bolf keeps coming in 2nd at the Grand Tournament.  It might be his year this year, if Lebron doesn't enter.

Kabal Crystal Runner.name: Kabal Crystal Runner
Kabal Crystal Runner.text: Costs (2) less for each Secret you've played this game.
Kabal Crystal Runner.flavor: "Listen, I can cut you in on a little of this premium mana, but you can't tell my boss."

Shado-Pan Rider.name: Shado-Pan Rider
Shado-Pan Rider.flavor: He needed a break after that business in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms. Naturally, he chose to spend his vacation in an icy snowscape killing monsters.

Eternal Sentinel.name: Eternal Sentinel
Eternal Sentinel.flavor: Just try to avoid eye contact.

Bittertide Hydra.name: Bittertide Hydra
Bittertide Hydra.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, deal 3 damage to your hero.
Bittertide Hydra.flavor: It's actually only the middle head that's bitter. The others are sweet and spicy.

Whirlwind.name: Whirlwind
Whirlwind.flavor: The way to tell seasoned warriors from novice ones: the novices yell "wheeeee" while whirlwinding.

Forked Lightning.name: Forked Lightning
Forked Lightning.text: Deal $2 damage to 2 random enemy minions. Overload: (2)
Forked Lightning.flavor: If you combine it with Spooned Lightning and Knived Lightning, you have the full dining set.

Anub'ar Ambusher.name: Anub'ar Ambusher
Anub'ar Ambusher.text: Deathrattle: Return a random friendly minion to your hand.
Anub'ar Ambusher.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Anub'ar Ambusher.flavor: Originally he was called "Anub'ar Guy who bounces a guy back to your hand", but it lacked a certain zing.
Anub'ar Ambusher.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Emperor Cobra.name: Emperor Cobra
Emperor Cobra.flavor: The Sholazar Basin is home to a lot of really horrible things. If you're going to visit, wear bug spray.  And plate armor.

Grimestreet Pawnbroker.name: Grimestreet Pawnbroker
Grimestreet Pawnbroker.text: Battlecry: Give a random weapon in your hand +1/+1.
Grimestreet Pawnbroker.flavor: "I don't know a lot about used GvG cards, so I'm going to have to call in an expert."

Tol'vir Warden.name: Tol'vir Warden
Tol'vir Warden.text: Battlecry: Draw two 1-Cost minions from your deck.
Tol'vir Warden.flavor: Ferocious in combat… and even more terrifying in pet battles.

Big Game Hunter.name: Big Game Hunter
Big Game Hunter.text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion with 7 or more Attack.
Big Game Hunter.targetingArrowText: Destroy a minion with an Attack of 7 or more.
Big Game Hunter.flavor: Mere devilsaurs no longer excite him.  Soon he'll be trying to catch Onyxia with only a dull Krol Blade.

Hidden Cache.name: Hidden Cache
Hidden Cache.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, give a random minion in your hand +2/+2.
Hidden Cache.flavor: There is an urban legend that the first Toxic Sewer Ooze was born because a rookie Goon stashed an open container of milk in a Hidden Cache.

Gelbin Mekkatorque.name: Gelbin Mekkatorque
Gelbin Mekkatorque.flavor: He's the leader of the gnomes, and an incredible inventor.  He's getting better, too; He turns things into chickens WAY less than he used to.
Gelbin Mekkatorque.howToEarnGolden: This was rewarded to players who helped test the Store during the Beta.

Twilight Darkmender.name: Twilight Darkmender
Twilight Darkmender.text: Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, restore 10 Health to your hero.
Twilight Darkmender.flavor: First she separates them from the lights, washes them in cold water, and hang-dries.

Demonfire.name: Demonfire
Demonfire.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If it’s a friendly Demon, give it +2/+2 instead.
Demonfire.flavor: Demonfire is like regular fire except for IT NEVER STOPS BURNING HELLLPPP

Mad Bomber.name: Mad Bomber
Mad Bomber.text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage randomly split between all other characters.
Mad Bomber.flavor: He's not really all that crazy, he is just not as careful with explosives as he should be.

Dark Iron Skulker.name: Dark Iron Skulker
Dark Iron Skulker.text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all undamaged enemy minions.
Dark Iron Skulker.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Dark Iron Skulker.flavor: He loves skulking. He skulks after hours just for the joy of it, but his friends are pretty worried he'll get burnt out.
Dark Iron Skulker.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Icehowl.name: Icehowl
Icehowl.flavor: This massive yeti just closes his eyes and charges at the nearest target.  The nearest Target is a couple blocks away and has sick deals on skateboards.

Buccaneer.name: Buccaneer
Buccaneer.text: Whenever you equip a weapon, give it +1 Attack.
Buccaneer.flavor: The best part of buccaneering is the pants.

Celestial Dreamer.name: Celestial Dreamer
Celestial Dreamer.text: [x]Battlecry: If you control a minion with 5 or more Attack, gain +2/+2.
Celestial Dreamer.flavor: If you think her job is easy, YOU try falling asleep on cue.

Doomsayer.name: Doomsayer
Doomsayer.text: At the start of your turn, destroy ALL minions.
Doomsayer.flavor: He's almost been right so many times. He was sure it was coming during the Cataclysm.

Mal'Ganis.name: Mal'Ganis
Mal'Ganis.text: Your other Demons have +2/+2. Your hero is Immune.
Mal'Ganis.flavor: Mal'Ganis doesn't like being betrayed, so if you discard him, watch out.

Polymorph.name: Polymorph
Polymorph.text:
Transform a minion
into a 1/1 Sheep.
Polymorph.flavor: There was going to be a pun in this flavor text, but it just came out baa-d.

Hammer of Wrath.name: Hammer of Wrath
Hammer of Wrath.flavor: A good paladin has many tools.  Hammer of Wrath, Pliers of Vengeance, Hacksaw of Justice, etc.

Medivh, the Guardian.name: Medivh, the Guardian
Medivh, the Guardian.text: Battlecry: Equip Atiesh, Greatstaff of the Guardian.
Medivh, the Guardian.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
Medivh, the Guardian.flavor: If you think the party's great now, just wait 'til he invites the orcs over!
Medivh, the Guardian.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.

Starving Buzzard.name: Starving Buzzard
Starving Buzzard.text: Whenever you summon a Beast, draw a card.
Starving Buzzard.flavor: If you feed him, he loses his whole identity.

Hired Gun.name: Hired Gun
Hired Gun.flavor: He loves his job and would do it for free!  (But don't tell his boss!)

Onyx Bishop.name: Onyx Bishop
Onyx Bishop.text: Battlecry: Summon a friendly minion that died this game.
Onyx Bishop.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
Onyx Bishop.flavor: B4 is a nice place to visit, but he wouldn't want to live there.
Onyx Bishop.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.

Gadgetzan Auctioneer.name: Gadgetzan Auctioneer
Gadgetzan Auctioneer.text: Whenever you cast a spell, draw a card.
Gadgetzan Auctioneer.flavor: He used to run the black market auction house, but there was just too much violence and he had to move.

Echoing Ooze.name: Echoing Ooze
Echoing Ooze.text: Battlecry: Summon an exact copy of this minion at the end of the turn.
Echoing Ooze.howToEarn: Unlocked in Frostwyrm Lair, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Echoing Ooze.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Frostwyrm Lair, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Siltfin Spiritwalker.name: Siltfin Spiritwalker
Siltfin Spiritwalker.text: Whenever another friendly Murloc dies, draw a card. Overload: (1)
Siltfin Spiritwalker.flavor: The elements respond to anyone who calls them for a worthy cause, even if you call them by yelling, "MRGHRGLGLGL!"

Sylvanas Windrunner.name: Sylvanas Windrunner
Sylvanas Windrunner.text: Deathrattle: Take control of a random enemy minion.
Sylvanas Windrunner.flavor: Sylvanas was turned into the Banshee Queen by Arthas, but he probably should have just killed her because it just pissed her off.

Maexxna.name: Maexxna
Maexxna.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Maexxna.flavor: Maexxna gets super mad when people introduce her as "Maxina" or "Maxxy".
Maexxna.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Fire Plume Phoenix.name: Fire Plume Phoenix
Fire Plume Phoenix.flavor: This is what happens when you use a volcano as a bird bath.

Darkshire Alchemist.name: Darkshire Alchemist
Darkshire Alchemist.flavor: The secret ingredient: liquified funnel cake.

Onyxia.name: Onyxia
Onyxia.text: Battlecry: Summon 1/1 Whelps until your side of the battlefield is full.
Onyxia.flavor: Onyxia long manipulated the Stormwind Court by disguising herself as Lady Katrana Prestor.   You would have thought that the giant wings and scales would have been a giveaway.

Acolyte of Pain.name: Acolyte of Pain
Acolyte of Pain.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, draw a card.
Acolyte of Pain.flavor: He trained when he was younger to be an acolyte of joy, but things didn’t work out like he thought they would.

Hozen Healer.name: Hozen Healer
Hozen Healer.text: Battlecry: Restore a minion to full Health.
Hozen Healer.flavor: He didn't go to school for healing, but we keep losing all the good healers to Ratchet, so I guess we'll take him.

Feral Rage.name: Feral Rage
Feral Rage.text: Choose One - Give your hero +4 Attack this turn; or Gain 8 Armor.
Feral Rage.flavor: Let's be honest. One option is a lot ragier than the other.

I Know a Guy.name: I Know a Guy
I Know a Guy.flavor: Well… a guy who knows a guy.

Lightning Bolt.name: Lightning Bolt
Lightning Bolt.flavor: Lightning Bolt! Lightning Bolt! Lightning Bolt!

Midnight Drake.name: Midnight Drake
Midnight Drake.text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack for each other card in your hand.

Alarm-o-Bot.name: Alarm-o-Bot
Alarm-o-Bot.text:
[x]At the start of your turn,
swap this minion with a
   random one in your hand.

Frostbolt.name: Frostbolt
Frostbolt.text: Deal $3 damage to a character and Freeze it.
Frostbolt.flavor: It is customary to yell "Chill out!" or "Freeze!" or "Ice ice, baby!" when you play this card.

Mirage Caller.name: Mirage Caller
Mirage Caller.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Summon a 1/1 copy of it.
Mirage Caller.flavor: Mirage is actually the name of its long-lost cat.

Mark of Y'Shaarj.name: Mark of Y'Shaarj
Mark of Y'Shaarj.text:
Give a minion +2/+2.
If it's a Beast, draw
a card.
Mark of Y'Shaarj.flavor: Y'Shaarj had three sons: Mark, Theodore, and Chris.

Archmage.name: Archmage
Archmage.flavor: You earn the title of Archmage when you can destroy anyone who calls you on it.

Hallazeal the Ascended.name: Hallazeal the Ascended
Hallazeal the Ascended.text: Whenever your spells deal damage, restore that much Health to your hero.

Faceless Summoner.name: Faceless Summoner
Faceless Summoner.flavor: They never get the recognition they deserve.

Gladiator's Longbow.name: Gladiator's Longbow
Gladiator's Longbow.flavor: The longbow allows shots to be fired from farther away and is useful for firing on particularly odorous targets.

Goldshire Footman.name: Goldshire Footman
Goldshire Footman.flavor: If 1/2 minions are all that is defending Goldshire, you would think it would have been overrun years ago.

Sorcerer's Apprentice.name: Sorcerer's Apprentice
Sorcerer's Apprentice.flavor: Apprentices are great for bossing around.  "Conjure me some mana buns! And a coffee!  Make that a mana coffee!"

Pit Lord.name: Pit Lord
Pit Lord.flavor: Mannoroth, Magtheridon, and Brutallus may be dead, but it turns out there are a LOT of pit lords.

Obsidian Shard.name: Obsidian Shard
Obsidian Shard.text:
[x]Costs (1) less for each
card you've played from
another class.
Obsidian Shard.flavor: You know you’re a Rogue when a sharp rock makes you go “Ooh!  Dagger!”

Kindly Grandmother.name: Kindly Grandmother
Kindly Grandmother.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
Kindly Grandmother.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.

Elven Archer.name: Elven Archer
Elven Archer.flavor: Don't bother asking her out on a date.  She'll shoot you down.

Daring Reporter.name: Daring Reporter
Daring Reporter.text: Whenever your opponent draws a card, gain +1/+1.
Daring Reporter.flavor: She's working on a story!  While skydiving!

Mayor Noggenfogger.name: Mayor Noggenfogger
Mayor Noggenfogger.flavor: This flavor text was randomly generated.  If it happens to form words and make sense, that is purely by chance.

Sunfury Protector.name: Sunfury Protector
Sunfury Protector.flavor: She carries a shield, but only so she can give it to someone she can stand behind.

Sunkeeper Tarim.name: Sunkeeper Tarim
Sunkeeper Tarim.text: Taunt Battlecry: Set all other minions' Attack and Health to 3.

White Eyes.name: White Eyes
White Eyes.text: Taunt Deathrattle: Shuffle 'The Storm Guardian' into your deck.

Elemental Destruction.name: Elemental Destruction
Elemental Destruction.flavor: I'm not a shaman or anything, but isn't Elemental Destruction the opposite of what they want to do?

Cenarius.name: Cenarius
Cenarius.text: Choose One - Give your other minions +2/+2; or Summon two 2/2 Treants with Taunt.
Cenarius.flavor: Yes, he's a demigod. No, he doesn't need to wear a shirt.

Rat Pack.name: Rat Pack
Rat Pack.text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a number of 1/1 Rats equal  to this minion's Attack.
Rat Pack.flavor: He's gonna do it his way.

Unleash the Hounds.name: Unleash the Hounds
Unleash the Hounds.text: For each enemy minion, summon a 1/1 Hound with Charge.
Unleash the Hounds.flavor: You must read the name of this card out loud each time you play it.

Chillmaw.name: Chillmaw
Chillmaw.text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage to all minions.
Chillmaw.flavor: Chillmaw keeps trying to ruin the Grand Tournament, and she would've done it too, if it weren't for those dang kids!

Murloc Tinyfin.name: Murloc Tinyfin
Murloc Tinyfin.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Murloc Tinyfin.flavor: High mortality rate, from often being hugged to death.
Murloc Tinyfin.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Embrace the Shadow.name: Embrace the Shadow
Embrace the Shadow.text: This turn, your healing effects deal damage instead.
Embrace the Shadow.flavor: For when your Auchenai Soulpriests call in sick.

Seadevil Stinger.name: Seadevil Stinger
Seadevil Stinger.text: [x]Battlecry: The next Murloc you play this turn costs  Health instead of Mana.
Seadevil Stinger.flavor: Pretty harmless unless you're a Seadevil.

Windfury.name: Windfury
Windfury.flavor: Windfury is like Earthfury and Firefury, but more light and airy.

Scaled Nightmare.name: Scaled Nightmare
Scaled Nightmare.text: At the start of your turn, double this minion's Attack.
Scaled Nightmare.flavor: I like it because it scales.

Backstreet Leper.name: Backstreet Leper
Backstreet Leper.text: [x]Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
Backstreet Leper.flavor: Quit playing games with his heart. And his fingers. And foot. It's rude.

Truesilver Champion.name: Truesilver Champion
Truesilver Champion.text: Whenever your hero attacks, restore 2 Health to it.
Truesilver Champion.flavor: It Slices, it Dices. You can cut a tin can with it. (But you wouldn't want to.)

Thunder Bluff Valiant.name: Thunder Bluff Valiant
Thunder Bluff Valiant.flavor: Allowing totems to attack is not cheating.  I mean, there isn't anything in the rule books about it.

Dinomancy.name: Dinomancy
Dinomancy.text: Your Hero Power becomes 'Give a Beast +2/+2.'
Dinomancy.flavor: Anyone can dinomance. Just put your lips together and RAAWWWAARGGGH.

Frothing Berserker.name: Frothing Berserker
Frothing Berserker.text: Whenever a minion takes damage, gain +1 Attack.
Frothing Berserker.flavor: He used to work as an accountant before he tried his hand at Berserkering.

Patches the Pirate.name: Patches the Pirate
Patches the Pirate.text: [x]Charge After you play a Pirate, summon this minion from your deck.
Patches the Pirate.flavor: What do sailors yell when Patches steals their treasure chest full of laws and other things being transported to parliament for a vote?  "The Eyes have it!"

Dalaran Mage.name: Dalaran Mage
Dalaran Mage.flavor: You don't see a lot of Dalaran warriors.

Grim Patron.name: Grim Patron
Grim Patron.text: Whenever this minion survives damage, summon another Grim Patron.
Grim Patron.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Grim Patron.flavor: If you love getting your face punched, come to the Grim Guzzler!
Grim Patron.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Entomb.name: Entomb
Entomb.text:
Choose an enemy minion.
Shuffle it into your deck.
Entomb.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Entomb.flavor: It's perfectly safe as long as you remember to put in air holes.
Entomb.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Ogre Brute.name: Ogre Brute
Ogre Brute.text: 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
Ogre Brute.flavor: Ogres have really terrible short-term chocolate.

Shield Block.name: Shield Block
Shield Block.flavor: Shields were invented because Face Block is USELESS.

Tuskarr Jouster.name: Tuskarr Jouster
Tuskarr Jouster.text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, restore 7 Health to your hero.
Tuskarr Jouster.flavor: Just could not be talked out of using his turtle for the joust...

Lock and Load.name: Lock and Load
Lock and Load.text: Each time you cast a spell this turn, add a random Hunter card to your hand.
Lock and Load.flavor:
Rexxar narrowed his eyes, grabbed his machine gun, and said: "It's go time.  Lock and load."
This card pays homage to that special moment.

Enhance-o Mechano.name: Enhance-o Mechano
Enhance-o Mechano.text: Battlecry: Give your other minions Windfury, Taunt, or Divine Shield (at random).

Hogger.name: Hogger
Hogger.text: At the end of your turn, summon a 2/2 Gnoll with Taunt.
Hogger.flavor: Hogger is super powerful. If you kill him, it's because he let you.

Perdition's Blade.name: Perdition's Blade
Perdition's Blade.flavor: Perdition's Blade is Ragnaros's back-up weapon while Sulfuras is in the shop.

Lunar Visions.name: Lunar Visions
Lunar Visions.text: Draw 2 cards. Minions drawn cost (2) less.
Lunar Visions.flavor: The true mystery of lunar visions is how there is nothing to watch when there are so many channels.

Bloodlust.name: Bloodlust
Bloodlust.text: Give your minions +3 Attack this turn.

Mindgames.name: Mindgames
Mindgames.text:
Put a copy of
a random minion from
your opponent's deck into the battlefield.
Mindgames.flavor: Sometimes it feels like this is all a game.

Renounce Darkness.name: Renounce Darkness
Renounce Darkness.text: Replace your Hero Power and Warlock cards with another class's. The cards cost (1) less.

Wailing Soul.name: Wailing Soul
Wailing Soul.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Wailing Soul.flavor: This soul just wails on you. Dang, soul, let up already.
Wailing Soul.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Toshley.name: Toshley
Toshley.text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Add a Spare Part card to your hand.

Sludge Belcher.name: Sludge Belcher
Sludge Belcher.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Sludge Belcher.flavor: DO NOT GIVE HIM A ROOT BEER.
Sludge Belcher.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Ancestral Healing.name: Ancestral Healing
Ancestral Healing.text: Restore a minion to full Health and give it Taunt.
Ancestral Healing.flavor: I personally prefer some non-ancestral right-the-heck-now healing, but maybe that is just me.

Fandral Staghelm.name: Fandral Staghelm
Fandral Staghelm.text: Your Choose One cards have both effects combined.
Fandral Staghelm.flavor: Always manages to mention "Back when I was creating the World Tree…" in EVERY conversation. Sheesh! Enough already.

Lotus Agents.name: Lotus Agents
Lotus Agents.text: Battlecry: Discover a Druid, Rogue, or Shaman card.
Lotus Agents.flavor: Mostly, they stand around and look cool.

Angry Chicken.name: Angry Chicken
Angry Chicken.flavor: There is no beast more frightening (or ridiculous) than a fully enraged chicken.

King Mukla.name: King Mukla
King Mukla.flavor: King Mukla wanders Jaguero Isle, searching for love.

Voidwalker.name: Voidwalker
Voidwalker.flavor: No relation to "The Voidsteppers", the popular Void-based dance troupe.

Bolster.name: Bolster
Bolster.flavor: The best offense is a good defense.

Jeeves.name: Jeeves
Jeeves.text: At the end of each player's turn, that player draws until they have 3 cards.
Jeeves.flavor: This robot is a lean, mean, butlerin' machine.

Wrath.name: Wrath
Wrath.text: Choose One - Deal $3 damage to a minion; or $1 damage and draw a card.
Wrath.flavor: The talk around the Ratchet Inn is that this card is too good and should be a Legendary.

Explosive Trap.name: Explosive Trap
Explosive Trap.text: Secret: When your hero is attacked, deal $2 damage to all enemies.
Explosive Trap.flavor: It traps your food AND cooks it for you!

Barnes.name: Barnes
Barnes.text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 copy of a random minion in your deck.
Barnes.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
Barnes.flavor: He used to play every part, until Moroes confiscated his Orb of Deception.
Barnes.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.

Recruiter.name: Recruiter
Recruiter.text: Inspire: Add a 2/2 Squire to your hand.
Recruiter.flavor: Join the Argent Crusade!  We have attractive tabards and you get to carry really nice swords!

Shimmering Tempest.name: Shimmering Tempest
Shimmering Tempest.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Mage spell to your hand.
Shimmering Tempest.flavor: HATES being summoned for Kirin Tor party lighting.

Netherspite Historian.name: Netherspite Historian
Netherspite Historian.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, Discover a Dragon.
Netherspite Historian.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
Netherspite Historian.flavor: She can tell you all about the history of people not STANDING IN THE GREEN BEAM!
Netherspite Historian.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.

Air Elemental.name: Air Elemental
Air Elemental.text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.

Shadow Strike.name: Shadow Strike
Shadow Strike.text: Deal $5 damage to an undamaged character.
Shadow Strike.flavor: It's like a backstab, only from the front. And with two more stabs.

Bloodsail Cultist.name: Bloodsail Cultist
Bloodsail Cultist.text: Battlecry: If you control another Pirate, give your weapon +1/+1.
Bloodsail Cultist.flavor: They're really just in it for the Blood Parrot.

Hobgoblin.name: Hobgoblin
Hobgoblin.text: Whenever you play a 1-Attack minion, give it +2/+2.
Hobgoblin.flavor: Hobgoblins are meeting next week to discuss union benefits.  First on the list: dental plan.

Coliseum Manager.name: Coliseum Manager
Coliseum Manager.text: Inspire: Return this minion to your hand.
Coliseum Manager.flavor: Meets monthly with the gladiators to discuss career goals.

Meanstreet Marshal.name: Meanstreet Marshal
Meanstreet Marshal.text: Deathrattle: If this minion has 2 or more Attack, draw a card.
Meanstreet Marshal.flavor: Remember, submit your bribes directly to the Marshal - it's the law!

A Light in the Darkness.name: A Light in the Darkness
A Light in the Darkness.flavor: Wait, how can you have a light in the dark?  If you turn on a light while it’s dark, doesn’t that mean it’s no longer dark?

Evolve.name: Evolve
Evolve.text: Transform your minions into random minions that cost (1) more.
Evolve.flavor: So you say you want an evolution. Well, you know. We all want to change the board.

Puddlestomper.name: Puddlestomper
Puddlestomper.flavor: He pays homage to Morgl, the great murloc oracle! (Who doesn't??)

Spirit Echo.name: Spirit Echo
Spirit Echo.text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Return  this to your hand."
Spirit Echo.flavor: I guess you can say they’re… “soul survivors.”

Dirty Rat.name: Dirty Rat
Dirty Rat.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Your opponent summons a random minion from their hand.
Dirty Rat.flavor: It's not his fault…  Someone keeps stealing his soap!

Blood Knight.name: Blood Knight
Blood Knight.text: Battlecry: All minions lose Divine Shield. Gain +3/+3 for each Shield lost.
Blood Knight.flavor: The Blood Knights get their holy powers from the Sunwell, which you should NOT bathe in.

Volcanic Drake.name: Volcanic Drake
Volcanic Drake.text: Costs (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
Volcanic Drake.howToEarn: Unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Volcanic Drake.flavor: Volcanic Drakes breathe lava instead of fire. The antacid vendor at Thorium Point does a brisk business with them.
Volcanic Drake.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Wild Growth.name: Wild Growth
Wild Growth.flavor: Grow your own mana crystals with this Mana Crystal Growth Kit, only 39.99!

Iron Hide.name: Iron Hide
Iron Hide.flavor: Week 6. I remain covered head to toe with scales. They do not yet realize that I am not a dinosaur.

Hooded Acolyte.name: Hooded Acolyte
Hooded Acolyte.text: Whenever a character is healed, give your C'Thun +1/+1 (wherever it is).
Hooded Acolyte.flavor: Wait, what kind of acolyte doesn't wear a hood?

Dragonhawk Rider.name: Dragonhawk Rider
Dragonhawk Rider.flavor: Check it out.  You can do barrel rolls on this thing.

Malchezaar's Imp.name: Malchezaar's Imp
Malchezaar's Imp.text: Whenever you discard a card, draw a card.
Malchezaar's Imp.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
Malchezaar's Imp.flavor: Malchezaar used to have an imp named Dobby working for him, but there was a tragic accident.
Malchezaar's Imp.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.

Darkspeaker.name: Darkspeaker
Darkspeaker.text: Battlecry: Swap stats with a friendly minion.
Darkspeaker.flavor: People often think that Darkspeaker is the arch nemesis of Lightspeaker, but that title actually belongs to Heavyspeaker.

Eater of Secrets.name: Eater of Secrets
Eater of Secrets.text: Battlecry: Destroy all enemy Secrets. Gain +1/+1 for each.
Eater of Secrets.flavor: You don't want to be around after it has eaten an explosive trap.  You thought Sludge Belcher was bad...

Moroes.name: Moroes
Moroes.text: Stealth At the end of your turn, summon a 1/1 Steward.
Moroes.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
Moroes.flavor: Moroes runs an army of stewards, but still ends up inflating the balloons himself.
Moroes.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.

Bog Creeper.name: Bog Creeper
Bog Creeper.flavor: He's tried other things, but bog sidling, bog ambling, and bog trundling just aren't as effective as bog creeping.

Azure Drake.name: Azure Drake
Azure Drake.flavor: They initially planned to be the Beryl or Cerulean drakes, but those felt a tad too pretentious.

On the Hunt.name: On the Hunt
On the Hunt.flavor: The mastiff giggles if you don't hit any ducks.

Friendly Bartender.name: Friendly Bartender
Friendly Bartender.text: At the end of your turn, restore 1 Health to your hero.
Friendly Bartender.flavor: "What'll it be?  A Jade Brew?  A Grimy Goose?  A Kabal Manatini?"

Siphon Soul.name: Siphon Soul
Siphon Soul.text: Destroy a minion. Restore #3 Health to your hero.
Siphon Soul.flavor: You probably should avoid siphoning your own soul.  You might create some kind of weird infinite loop.

Bloodhoof Brave.name: Bloodhoof Brave
Bloodhoof Brave.flavor: He thought the set was called "Flippers of the Old Cods" and hungrily volunteered to be in it.  He is definitely going to get his hearing checked.

Cleave.name: Cleave
Cleave.text:
[x]Deal $2 damage to
two random enemy
minions.
Cleave.flavor: Hey you two…could you stand next to each other for a second…

Mogor the Ogre.name: Mogor the Ogre
Mogor the Ogre.text: All minions have a 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
Mogor the Ogre.flavor: Mogor helped reopen the Dark Portal once. You know you're in trouble when you have to rely on an ogre.

Siege Engine.name: Siege Engine
Siege Engine.text: Whenever you gain Armor, give this minion +1 Attack.

Fire Fly.name: Fire Fly
Fire Fly.text: Battlecry: Add a 1/2 Elemental to your hand.
Fire Fly.flavor: Arch nemeses: small children with glass jars.

Twisted Worgen.name: Twisted Worgen
Twisted Worgen.flavor: Sometimes the Old Gods' corruptions gives you power untold, sometimes you get +1 Attack. We can’t all be winners in the Eldritch lottery.

Alexstrasza's Champion.name: Alexstrasza's Champion
Alexstrasza's Champion.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Charge.
Alexstrasza's Champion.flavor: "Put more spikes on her.  No, more spikes.  What part of 'more spikes' do you not understand?  MORE SPIKES!" - Alexstrasza

Mass Dispel.name: Mass Dispel
Mass Dispel.text: Silence all enemy minions. Draw a card.
Mass Dispel.flavor: It dispels buffs, powers, hopes, and dreams.

Illidan Stormrage.name: Illidan Stormrage
Illidan Stormrage.text: Whenever you play a card, summon a 2/1 Flame of Azzinoth.
Illidan Stormrage.flavor: Illidan's brother, Malfurion, imprisoned him beneath Hyjal for 10,000 years.  Stormrages are not good at letting go of grudges.

Polluted Hoarder.name: Polluted Hoarder
Polluted Hoarder.flavor: Roll ‘greed’ OR THIS COULD HAPPEN TO YOU.

Light's Justice.name: Light's Justice
Light's Justice.flavor: Prince Malchezaar was a collector of rare weapons. He'd animate them and have them dance for him.

Demonfuse.name: Demonfuse
Demonfuse.text: Give a Demon +3/+3. Give your opponent a Mana Crystal.
Demonfuse.flavor: Very dangerous when attached to a demonbomb.

Tol'vir Stoneshaper.name: Tol'vir Stoneshaper
Tol'vir Stoneshaper.text: [x]Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, gain  Taunt and Divine Shield.
Tol'vir Stoneshaper.flavor: He spends a lot of time keeping himself in stoneshape.

Devilsaur Egg.name: Devilsaur Egg
Devilsaur Egg.flavor: A key ingredient in all discerning Funnel Cake recipes.

Bladed Cultist.name: Bladed Cultist
Bladed Cultist.flavor: He has a poor understanding of the law of diminishing returns.

Hallucination.name: Hallucination
Hallucination.text: Discover a card from your opponent's class.
Hallucination.flavor: It's the good kind of hallucination.

Fireball.name: Fireball
Fireball.flavor: This spell is useful for burning things.  If you're looking for spells that toast things, or just warm them a little, you're in the wrong place.

Darkbomb.name: Darkbomb
Darkbomb.flavor: If you're looking to make an "Emo" deck, this card is perfect!

Darkscale Healer.name: Darkscale Healer
Darkscale Healer.text: Battlecry: Restore 2 Health to all friendly characters.
Darkscale Healer.flavor: Healing is just something she does in her free time.  It's more of a hobby really.

Fearsome Doomguard.name: Fearsome Doomguard
Fearsome Doomguard.flavor: They were originally called Cuddleguards, but they were not inspiring the proper amount of fear.

Y'Shaarj, Rage Unbound.name: Y'Shaarj, Rage Unbound
Y'Shaarj, Rage Unbound.text: At the end of your turn, put a minion from your deck into the battlefield.
Y'Shaarj, Rage Unbound.flavor: When he's working out, he binds all that rage back into a ponytail.

Raging Worgen.name: Raging Worgen
Raging Worgen.flavor: If he's raging now, just wait until he gets nerfed.

Deadly Shot.name: Deadly Shot
Deadly Shot.flavor: Accuracy is not a highly valued trait among the mok'nathal.  Deadliness is near the top, though.

Faerie Dragon.name: Faerie Dragon
Faerie Dragon.text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
Faerie Dragon.flavor: Adorable.  Immune to Magic.  Doesn't pee on the rug.  The perfect pet!

Gahz'rilla.name: Gahz'rilla
Gahz'rilla.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, double its Attack.
Gahz'rilla.flavor: The Sen'jin High football team is The Gahz'rillas.

Priestess of Elune.name: Priestess of Elune
Priestess of Elune.flavor: If she threatens to "moon" you, it's not what you think.

Clutchmother Zavas.name: Clutchmother Zavas
Clutchmother Zavas.text: Whenever you discard this, give it +2/+2 and return it to your hand.
Clutchmother Zavas.flavor: A bit of a snob: still refuses to drive anything with automatic transmission.

Magnataur Alpha.name: Magnataur Alpha
Magnataur Alpha.text:
Also damages the minions next to whomever
he attacks.
Magnataur Alpha.flavor: Playing him also gets you into the Magnataur Beta.

Stampeding Kodo.name: Stampeding Kodo
Stampeding Kodo.text: Battlecry: Destroy a random enemy minion with 2 or less Attack.
Stampeding Kodo.flavor: This Kodo is so big that he can stampede by himself.

Kooky Chemist.name: Kooky Chemist
Kooky Chemist.text: Battlecry: Swap the Attack and Health of a minion.

Muster for Battle.name: Muster for Battle
Muster for Battle.text: Summon three 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits. Equip a 1/4 Weapon.
Muster for Battle.flavor: "I'm bringing the guacamole!" – One of the most successful (yet rare) Silver Hand rallying cries

Pit Fighter.name: Pit Fighter
Pit Fighter.flavor: What did the pits ever do to you?

Undercity Huckster.name: Undercity Huckster
Undercity Huckster.text: Deathrattle: Add a random class card to your hand (from your opponent's class).
Undercity Huckster.flavor: Psst! Wanna buy a random class card (from your opponent's class)?

Cutpurse.name: Cutpurse
Cutpurse.text: Whenever this minion attacks a hero, add the Coin to your hand.
Cutpurse.flavor: He has a giant collection of purses now.  One for every outfit!

Molten Giant.name: Molten Giant
Molten Giant.text: Costs (1) less for each damage your hero has taken.
Molten Giant.flavor: He gets terrible heartburn.  BECAUSE HE IS FULL OF LAVA.

Cruel Taskmaster.name: Cruel Taskmaster
Cruel Taskmaster.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it +2 Attack.
Cruel Taskmaster.flavor: "I'm going to need you to come in on Sunday." - Cruel Taskmaster

Small-Time Buccaneer.name: Small-Time Buccaneer
Small-Time Buccaneer.text: Has +2 Attack while you have a weapon equipped.
Small-Time Buccaneer.flavor: "Oh, I'm not serious about it.  I only pirate on the weekends."

Battle Rage.name: Battle Rage
Battle Rage.text: Draw a card for each damaged friendly character.
Battle Rage.flavor: "You won't like me when I'm angry."

Soggoth the Slitherer.name: Soggoth the Slitherer
Soggoth the Slitherer.text: Taunt Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
Soggoth the Slitherer.flavor: Don't tell Soggoth, but in the future he gets totally owned by the Master's Glaive and his skull becomes a tourist attraction.

Thistle Tea.name: Thistle Tea
Thistle Tea.text: Draw a card. Add 2 extra copies of it to your hand.
Thistle Tea.flavor: Aren't Thistles prickly?  Why would you drink them? I don't get Rogues.

Dread Corsair.name: Dread Corsair
Dread Corsair.text: Taunt Costs (1) less per Attack of your weapon.
Dread Corsair.flavor: "Yarrrr" is a pirate word that means "Greetings, milord."

Stalagg.name: Stalagg
Stalagg.text: Deathrattle: If Feugen also died this game, summon Thaddius.
Stalagg.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Stalagg.flavor: Stalagg want to write own flavor text.  "STALAGG AWESOME!"
Stalagg.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Hydrologist.name: Hydrologist
Hydrologist.flavor: Murloc hydrologists are pretty rare.  Most murloc undergrads pick computer science.

Bomb Lobber.name: Bomb Lobber
Bomb Lobber.text: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage to a random enemy minion.
Bomb Lobber.flavor: He lobbies Orgrimmar daily on behalf of bombs.

Cornered Sentry.name: Cornered Sentry
Cornered Sentry.text: Taunt. Battlecry: Summon three 1/1 Raptors for your opponent.
Cornered Sentry.flavor: The Draenei are seriously considering cancelling "Bring Your Murderous Pet to Work Day."

Neptulon.name: Neptulon
Neptulon.text: Battlecry: Add 4 random Murlocs to your hand. Overload: (3)
Neptulon.flavor: Neptulon is "The Tidehunter". He’s one of the four elemental lords. And he and Ragnaros get together and make really amazing saunas.

Finja, the Flying Star.name: Finja, the Flying Star
Finja, the Flying Star.text: [x]Stealth Whenever this attacks and kills a minion, summon 2  Murlocs from your deck.
Finja, the Flying Star.flavor: The last true master of Finjitsu.

Gazlowe.name: Gazlowe
Gazlowe.text: Whenever you cast a 1-mana spell, add a random Mech to your hand.
Gazlowe.flavor: Gazlowe was voted "Most Likely to Explode" in high school.

Wrathguard.name: Wrathguard
Wrathguard.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, also deal that amount to your hero.
Wrathguard.flavor: After playing against 5 Annoy-O-Trons, any normal guard will become a Wrathguard.

Thrallmar Farseer.name: Thrallmar Farseer
Thrallmar Farseer.flavor: He's stationed in the Hellfire Peninsula, but he's hoping for a reassignment closer to Orgrimmar, or really anywhere the ground is less on fire.

Ravasaur Runt.name: Ravasaur Runt
Ravasaur Runt.text: Battlecry: If you control at least 2 other minions, Adapt.
Ravasaur Runt.flavor: Doesn't like to adapt unless others are watching. Some minions are such show-offs.

Kezan Mystic.name: Kezan Mystic
Kezan Mystic.text: Battlecry: Take control of a random enemy Secret.
Kezan Mystic.flavor: They pretend to be wise and enlightened, but they mostly just hate to be left out of a secret.

Spirit Claws.name: Spirit Claws
Spirit Claws.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
