Spirit Claws.flavor: They'll be MUCH easier to use once they add the spiritthumb.
Spirit Claws.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.

Lance Carrier.name: Lance Carrier
Lance Carrier.flavor: Lance Carrier is an obscure entry level position in orcish armies.  A mystery, since orcs don't generally use lances.

Innervate.name: Innervate
Innervate.text: Gain 2 Mana Crystals this turn only.
Innervate.flavor: Some druids still have flashbacks from strangers yelling "Innervate me!!" at them.

Bright-Eyed Scout.name: Bright-Eyed Scout
Bright-Eyed Scout.text: Battlecry: Draw a card. Change its Cost to (5).

Divine Favor.name: Divine Favor
Divine Favor.text: Draw cards until you have as many in hand as your opponent.
Divine Favor.flavor: This is not just a favor, but a divine one, like helping someone move a couch with a fold out bed!

Giant Mastodon.name: Giant Mastodon
Giant Mastodon.flavor: Still salty about it not being the "Year of the Mastodon."

Druid of the Saber.name: Druid of the Saber
Druid of the Saber.flavor: That's saberTEETH, not like curved pirate blades.  That's a different kind of druid.  Druid of the Curved Pirate Blades.

Toxic Sewer Ooze.name: Toxic Sewer Ooze
Toxic Sewer Ooze.text: Battlecry: Remove 1 Durability from your opponent's weapon.
Toxic Sewer Ooze.flavor: When Sergeant Sally shows up unexpectedly, DO NOT FLUSH YOUR MANA CRYSTALS DOWN THE TOILET.

Abyssal Enforcer.name: Abyssal Enforcer
Abyssal Enforcer.text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to all other characters.
Abyssal Enforcer.flavor: The Kabal print this on every package of illicit Mana Crystals: WARNING - DO NOT PUT WITHIN REACH OF ABYSSALS. THIS IS NOT APPROVED FOR USE BY FLAMING DEMONS OF ANY KIND.

Void Crusher.name: Void Crusher
Void Crusher.text: Inspire: Destroy a random minion for each player.

Unstable Ghoul.name: Unstable Ghoul
Unstable Ghoul.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Unstable Ghoul.flavor: Filling your Ghouls with Rocket Fuel is all the rage at Necromancer school.
Unstable Ghoul.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Southsea Squidface.name: Southsea Squidface
Southsea Squidface.flavor: Quick! Before I drown! Let me sharpen your sword for you.

Demonheart.name: Demonheart
Demonheart.text: Deal $5 damage to a minion.  If it's a friendly Demon, give it +5/+5 instead.
Demonheart.flavor: Virtually every member of the pro demon lobby is a warlock. Weird.

Blackwing Corruptor.name: Blackwing Corruptor
Blackwing Corruptor.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage.
Blackwing Corruptor.howToEarn: Unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackwing Corruptor.flavor: He got his name when he gave Blackwing some comic books and rock & roll records.
Blackwing Corruptor.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Explorer's Hat.name: Explorer's Hat
Explorer's Hat.text: Give a minion +1/+1 and "Deathrattle: Add an Explorer's Hat to your hand."
Explorer's Hat.howToEarn: Unlocked by starting the League of Explorers adventure.
Explorer's Hat.flavor: Harrison Jones was disappointed that he didn't get to be part of the League of Explorers, but his hat did.
Explorer's Hat.howToEarnGolden: Can be crafted after starting the League of Explorers adventure.

Velen's Chosen.name: Velen's Chosen
Velen's Chosen.flavor: Velen wrote a "Lovely Card" for Tyrande with a picture of the Deeprun Tram that said "I Choo-Choo-Choose you!"

Boulderfist Ogre.name: Boulderfist Ogre
Boulderfist Ogre.flavor: "ME HAVE GOOD STATS FOR THE COST"

One-eyed Cheat.name: One-eyed Cheat
One-eyed Cheat.text: Whenever you summon a Pirate, gain Stealth.
One-eyed Cheat.flavor: When pirates say there is no "Eye" in "team," they are very literal about it.

King's Elekk.name: King's Elekk
King's Elekk.text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, draw it.

Rhonin.name: Rhonin
Rhonin.text: Deathrattle: Add 3 copies of Arcane Missiles to your hand.

Ice Rager.name: Ice Rager
Ice Rager.flavor: He's a lot cooler than Magma Rager.

Grimestreet Informant.name: Grimestreet Informant
Grimestreet Informant.text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a Hunter, Paladin, or Warrior card.
Grimestreet Informant.flavor: "Naw, naw.  You're talkin' about Grime BOULEVARD.  I ain't know nuthin' 'bout that."

Fool's Bane.name: Fool's Bane
Fool's Bane.text: Unlimited attacks each turn. Can't attack heroes.
Fool's Bane.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
Fool's Bane.flavor: A fool and his bane are soon parted.
Fool's Bane.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.

Jeweled Macaw.name: Jeweled Macaw
Jeweled Macaw.text: Battlecry: Add a random Beast to your hand.
Jeweled Macaw.flavor: It’s not LITERALLY jeweled. The goblins were terribly disappointed.

Hogger, Doom of Elwynn.name: Hogger, Doom of Elwynn
Hogger, Doom of Elwynn.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 2/2 Gnoll with Taunt.
Hogger, Doom of Elwynn.flavor: When C'thun went to sleep, he checked under his bed for Hogger.

Timber Wolf.name: Timber Wolf
Timber Wolf.flavor: Other beasts totally dig hanging out with timber wolves.

Rend Blackhand.name: Rend Blackhand
Rend Blackhand.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, destroy a Legendary minion.
Rend Blackhand.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Rend Blackhand.flavor: Rend believes he is the True Warchief of the Horde and he keeps editing the wikipedia page for "Warchief of the Horde" to include his picture.
Rend Blackhand.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Harvest Golem.name: Harvest Golem
Harvest Golem.flavor: "Overheat threshold exceeded. System failure. Wheat clog in port two. Shutting down."

Doomhammer.name: Doomhammer
Doomhammer.flavor: Orgrim Doomhammer gave this legendary weapon to Thrall.  His name is a total coincidence.

Grook Fu Master.name: Grook Fu Master
Grook Fu Master.flavor: Grook Fu, the ancient Hozen art of bashing heads with a stick.

Ancient of War.name: Ancient of War
Ancient of War.flavor: Young Night Elves love to play "Who can get the Ancient of War to Uproot?"  You lose if you get crushed to death.

Defias Cleaner.name: Defias Cleaner
Defias Cleaner.flavor: His house cleaning service is quite thorough.  Not a spot to be found... or any of your stuff!

Fiery Bat.name: Fiery Bat
Fiery Bat.text: Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy.

Open the Waygate.name: Open the Waygate
Open the Waygate.text: [x]Quest: Cast 6 spells that didn't start in your deck. Reward: Time Warp.
Open the Waygate.flavor: Although powerful, the incantation is simple. It’s just a jump to the left, and then a step to the right.

Shadow Word: Death.name: Shadow Word: Death
Shadow Word: Death.text: Destroy a minion with 5 or more Attack.
Shadow Word: Death.flavor: If you miss, it leaves a lightning-bolt-shaped scar on your target.

Cult Apothecary.name: Cult Apothecary
Cult Apothecary.text: Battlecry: For each enemy minion, restore 2 Health to your hero.

N'Zoth's First Mate.name: N'Zoth's First Mate
N'Zoth's First Mate.flavor: Hates when N'Zoth yells "Ahoy Matey!!", but there's not really much he can do about it.

Ancient of Lore.name: Ancient of Lore
Ancient of Lore.text: Choose One - Draw a card; or Restore 5 Health.
Ancient of Lore.flavor: Go ahead, carve your initials in him.

Scarlet Purifier.name: Scarlet Purifier
Scarlet Purifier.text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all minions with Deathrattle.
Scarlet Purifier.flavor: The Scarlet Crusade is doing market research to find out if the "Mauve Crusade" would be better received.

Ozruk.name: Ozruk
Ozruk.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Gain +5 Health for each Elemental you played last turn.
Ozruk.flavor: Between you and me, Ozruk is a bit obsessed with his body.

Avenging Wrath.name: Avenging Wrath
Avenging Wrath.text: Deal $8 damage randomly split among all enemies.
Avenging Wrath.flavor: Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham!

Spellslinger.name: Spellslinger
Spellslinger.text: Battlecry: Add a random spell to each player's hand.
Spellslinger.flavor: Does he sling spells, or do his spells linger about.  Who can say?

Scavenging Hyena.name: Scavenging Hyena
Scavenging Hyena.text: Whenever a friendly Beast dies, gain +2/+1.
Scavenging Hyena.flavor: Hyenas prefer the bones of kodos or windserpents, but they'll eat pretty much anything.  Even Brussels sprouts.

Warbot.name: Warbot
Warbot.flavor: Mass production of warbots was halted when it was discovered that they were accidentally being produced at "sample size."

Keeper of the Grove.name: Keeper of the Grove
Keeper of the Grove.text: Choose One - Deal 2 damage; or Silence a minion.
Keeper of the Grove.flavor: These guys just show up and start Keeping your Groves without even asking.

Stablemaster.name: Stablemaster
Stablemaster.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Beast Immune this turn.
Stablemaster.flavor: Takes way better care of her pets than her brother, Unstablemaster.

Primalfin Lookout.name: Primalfin Lookout
Primalfin Lookout.text: Battlecry: If you control another Murloc, Discover a Murloc.
Primalfin Lookout.flavor: Lookout is a self-appointed title that's mostly an excuse to beat things up.

Troggzor the Earthinator.name: Troggzor the Earthinator
Troggzor the Earthinator.text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, summon a Burly Rockjaw Trogg.
Troggzor the Earthinator.flavor: He keeps earthinating the countryside despite attempts to stop him.

Servant of Kalimos.name: Servant of Kalimos
Servant of Kalimos.text: [x]Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn,  Discover an Elemental.
Servant of Kalimos.flavor: He's doing his best, but his mom thinks that if he had just applied himself in school Kalimos would be working for HIM.

Whirling Zap-o-matic.name: Whirling Zap-o-matic
Whirling Zap-o-matic.flavor: If you pay a little extra, you can get it in "candy-apple red."

Call Pet.name: Call Pet
Call Pet.text:
Draw a card.
If it's a Beast, it costs (4) less.

Dinosize.name: Dinosize
Dinosize.text: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 10.
Dinosize.flavor: Comes with fries and a drink.

Malorne.name: Malorne
Malorne.text: Deathrattle: Shuffle this minion into your deck.
Malorne.flavor: When Malorne isn't mauling hordes of demons, he enjoys attending parties, though he prefers to go stag.

Gadgetzan Socialite.name: Gadgetzan Socialite
Gadgetzan Socialite.flavor: Comment on her height, and she'll go from flapper to kneecapper in seconds flat.

Museum Curator.name: Museum Curator
Museum Curator.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Museum Curator.flavor: He is forever cursing the kids who climb on the rails and the evil archeologists who animate the exhibits.
Museum Curator.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Sunwalker.name: Sunwalker
Sunwalker.flavor: She doesn’t ACTUALLY walk on the Sun.  It's just a name.  Don’t worry!

Saboteur.name: Saboteur
Saboteur.text: Battlecry: Your opponent's Hero Power costs (5) more next turn.
Saboteur.flavor: Listen all y'all it's a saboteur!

The Skeleton Knight.name: The Skeleton Knight
The Skeleton Knight.text: Deathrattle: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, return this to your hand.
The Skeleton Knight.flavor: Apparently it really was just a flesh wound.

Nozdormu.name: Nozdormu
Nozdormu.text: Players only have 15 seconds to take their turns.
Nozdormu.flavor: Time to write some flavor text.

Doomguard.name: Doomguard
Doomguard.flavor: Summoning a doomguard is risky. Someone is going to die.

Power of the Wild.name: Power of the Wild
Power of the Wild.text: Choose One - Give your minions +1/+1; or Summon a 3/2 Panther.
Power of the Wild.flavor: Never look a panther in the eye.  Or is it 'Always look a panther in the eye'?  Well, it's one of those.

Manic Soulcaster.name: Manic Soulcaster
Manic Soulcaster.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Shuffle a copy into your deck.
Manic Soulcaster.flavor: When casting a tournament, you really have to put your soul into it!

Shadow Bolt.name: Shadow Bolt
Shadow Bolt.flavor: It’s a Bolt.   It's made out of Shadow.   What more do you need to know!

Ivory Knight.name: Ivory Knight
Ivory Knight.text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a spell. Restore Health to your hero equal to its Cost.
Ivory Knight.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
Ivory Knight.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.

Argent Commander.name: Argent Commander
Argent Commander.flavor: The Argent Dawn stands vigilant against the Scourge, as well as people who cut in line at coffee shops.

Backroom Bouncer.name: Backroom Bouncer
Backroom Bouncer.text: Whenever a friendly minion dies, gain +1 Attack.
Backroom Bouncer.flavor: "WHY ARE YOU IN THE BACK ROOM?  WHO IS WATCHING THE FRONT?!"

Fire Elemental.name: Fire Elemental
Fire Elemental.flavor: He can never take a bath. Ewww.

Twilight Flamecaller.name: Twilight Flamecaller
Twilight Flamecaller.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
Twilight Flamecaller.flavor: Make sure you summon a Twilight Marshmallowcaller too! Mmmm Mmm Mmm!!

Savage Roar.name: Savage Roar
Savage Roar.text: Give your characters +2 Attack this turn.
Savage Roar.flavor: What do they roar? Nobody can quite tell, but it sounds like "Elephant Macho Breeze".  It's probably not that, though.

Pyroblast.name: Pyroblast
Pyroblast.flavor: Take the time for an evil laugh after you draw this card.

Mad Scientist.name: Mad Scientist
Mad Scientist.text: Deathrattle: Put a Secret from your deck into the battlefield.
Mad Scientist.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Mad Scientist.flavor: His mother wanted him to be a mage or a warlock, but noooooooo, he had to go and be a scientist like his father.
Mad Scientist.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Voodoo Doctor.name: Voodoo Doctor
Voodoo Doctor.flavor: Voodoo is an oft-misunderstood art. But it is art.

Knife Juggler.name: Knife Juggler
Knife Juggler.text:
[x]After you summon a
minion, deal 1 damage
to a random enemy.
Knife Juggler.flavor: Ambitious Knife Jugglers sometimes graduate to Bomb Jugglers.    They never last long enough to make it onto a card though.

Shady Dealer.name: Shady Dealer
Shady Dealer.text: Battlecry: If you have a Pirate, gain +1/+1.
Shady Dealer.flavor: I have great deal for you... for 4 damage to your face!

Potion of Polymorph.name: Potion of Polymorph
Potion of Polymorph.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, transform it into a 1/1 Sheep.

Corruption.name: Corruption
Corruption.text: Choose an enemy minion. At the start of your turn, destroy it.
Corruption.flavor: It starts with stealing a pen from work, and before you know it, BOOM!  Corrupted!

Pantry Spider.name: Pantry Spider
Pantry Spider.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
Pantry Spider.flavor: You have to admit, they make a cute couple.
Pantry Spider.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.

Gentle Megasaur.name: Gentle Megasaur
Gentle Megasaur.flavor: "Low, low rents! Must enjoy a nomadic lifestyle. Quasi-sentient, bipedal, amphibious humanoids ONLY!"

Anima Golem.name: Anima Golem
Anima Golem.text: At the end of each turn, destroy this minion if it's your only one.
Anima Golem.flavor: The Dark Animus is evil and mysterious and huge and unable to write sentences that utilize proper grammar.

Tinkmaster Overspark.name: Tinkmaster Overspark
Tinkmaster Overspark.text: [x]Battlecry: Transform another random minion into a 5/5 Devilsaur or a 1/1 Squirrel.
Tinkmaster Overspark.targetingArrowText: Transform a minion into a 5/5 or a 1/1 at random.
Tinkmaster Overspark.flavor: Tinkmaster Overspark nearly lost his Tinker's license after the Great Ironforge Squirrel Stampede of '09.

Bloodsail Raider.name: Bloodsail Raider
Bloodsail Raider.text: Battlecry: Gain Attack equal to the Attack of your weapon.
Bloodsail Raider.flavor: "I only plunder on days that end in 'y'."

Fire Plume's Heart.name: Fire Plume's Heart
Fire Plume's Heart.flavor: Why does an active volcano need to be defended? To save its ash.

Stormwind Knight.name: Stormwind Knight
Stormwind Knight.flavor: They're still embarrassed about "The Deathwing Incident".

Arcanosmith.name: Arcanosmith
Arcanosmith.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
Arcanosmith.flavor: He’s really just a Blacksmith, but he thought the fancy title would bring in more business.
Arcanosmith.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.

Cone of Cold.name: Cone of Cold
Cone of Cold.text: Freeze a minion and the minions next to it, and deal $1 damage to them.
Cone of Cold.flavor: Magi of the Kirin Tor were casting Cubes of Cold for many years before Cones came into fashion some 90 years ago.

Sated Threshadon.name: Sated Threshadon
Sated Threshadon.flavor: Bet you can't eat just one murloc!

Greater Arcane Missiles.name: Greater Arcane Missiles
Greater Arcane Missiles.text: Shoot three missiles at random enemies that deal $3 damage each.
Greater Arcane Missiles.flavor: Wow, and I thought Arcane Missiles was great!

Auctionmaster Beardo.name: Auctionmaster Beardo
Auctionmaster Beardo.text: After you cast a spell, refresh your Hero Power.
Auctionmaster Beardo.flavor: Gadgetzan has always run an under-the-table auction house, and business has been PRETTY good for Beardo since the population explosion.  And since the explosion that destroyed the competing auction houses in the city.

Fist of Jaraxxus.name: Fist of Jaraxxus
Fist of Jaraxxus.text: When you play or discard this, deal $4 damage to a random enemy.

Nexus-Champion Saraad.name: Nexus-Champion Saraad
Nexus-Champion Saraad.text: Inspire: Add a random spell to your hand.
Nexus-Champion Saraad.flavor: The ethereals have their own jousting tournament, and Saraad is the reigning champion.  Also he won the ethereal hot dog eating contest.

Mirror Entity.name: Mirror Entity
Mirror Entity.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, summon a copy of it.
Mirror Entity.flavor: "You go first." - Krush'gor the Behemoth, to his pet boar.

Kabal Trafficker.name: Kabal Trafficker
Kabal Trafficker.text:
[x]At the end of your turn,
add a random Demon
to your hand.
Kabal Trafficker.flavor: She ships illicit mana crystals around the world in packages marked: FUNNEL CAKE.

Frostwolf Grunt.name: Frostwolf Grunt
Frostwolf Grunt.flavor: Grunting is what his father did and his father before that.   It's more than just a job.

Hellfire.name: Hellfire
Hellfire.flavor: It's spells like these that make it hard for Warlocks to get decent help.

Murloc Raider.name: Murloc Raider
Murloc Raider.flavor: Mrrraggglhlhghghlgh, mrgaaag blarrghlgaahahl mrgggg glhalhah a bghhll graggmgmg Garrosh mglhlhlh mrghlhlhl!!

Mind Vision.name: Mind Vision
Mind Vision.text: Put a copy of a random card in your opponent's hand into your hand.
Mind Vision.flavor: I see what you did there.

Kazakus.name: Kazakus
Kazakus.text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates,  create a custom spell.
Kazakus.flavor: The mysterious leader of the Kabal is NOT a dragon, and does NOT deal in illegal potions.  Any public statements to the contrary will be met with litigation and Dragonfire Potions.

Lava Shock.name: Lava Shock
Lava Shock.text: Deal $2 damage. Unlock your Overloaded Mana Crystals.
Lava Shock.howToEarn: Unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Lava Shock.flavor: Chocolate lava cake is shockingly delicious.
Lava Shock.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Cloaked Huntress.name: Cloaked Huntress
Cloaked Huntress.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
Cloaked Huntress.flavor: She's practically GIVING your secrets away!
Cloaked Huntress.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.

Leeroy Jenkins.name: Leeroy Jenkins
Leeroy Jenkins.text: Charge. Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Whelps for your opponent.
Leeroy Jenkins.flavor: At least he has Angry Chicken.

Golakka Crawler.name: Golakka Crawler
Golakka Crawler.flavor: Universally adored by both control decks and ninjas.

Blood of The Ancient One.name: Blood of The Ancient One
Blood of The Ancient One.text:
If you control two of these
at the end of your turn, merge them into 'The Ancient One'.
Blood of The Ancient One.flavor: Add two cups of Blood of the Ancient One to one cup of lemon juice. Add just a dash of sugar and stir. Delicious!

Kirin Tor Mage.name: Kirin Tor Mage
Kirin Tor Mage.text: [x]Battlecry: The next Secret you play this turn costs (0).
Kirin Tor Mage.flavor: The Kirin Tor reside in the floating city of Dalaran.  How do you make a Dalaran float?  Two scoops of ice cream, one scoop of Dalaran.

Earth Shock.name: Earth Shock
Earth Shock.text: Silence a minion, then deal $1 damage to it.
Earth Shock.flavor: Earth Shock? Shouldn't it be "Azeroth Shock"?

Vol'jin.name: Vol'jin
Vol'jin.flavor: Vol'jin is a shadow hunter, which is like a shadow priest except more voodoo.

Stampede.name: Stampede
Stampede.text: Each time you play a Beast this turn, add a random Beast to your hand.
Stampede.flavor: Many hunters long for the pitter-patter of enormous feet.

Stubborn Gastropod.name: Stubborn Gastropod
Stubborn Gastropod.flavor: Stubbornly pursuing its dream to become Azeroth's fastest animal!

Mana Geode.name: Mana Geode
Mana Geode.text: Whenever this minion is healed, summon a 2/2 Crystal.
Mana Geode.flavor: Gadgetzan, where even the pet rocks have pet rocks.

Captain Greenskin.name: Captain Greenskin
Captain Greenskin.flavor: He was this close to piloting a massive juggernaut into Stormwind Harbor. If it weren't for those pesky kids!

Sea Reaver.name: Sea Reaver
Sea Reaver.text: When you draw this, deal 1 damage to your minions.
Sea Reaver.flavor: A little better than Sea Minus Reaver.

Arcane Giant.name: Arcane Giant
Arcane Giant.text:
[x]Costs (1) less for each spell
you've cast this game.
Arcane Giant.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
Arcane Giant.flavor: Claims to be drawn to Karazhan because of the ley lines. Actually, just loves Moroes’ cooking.
Arcane Giant.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.

Gnomish Inventor.name: Gnomish Inventor
Gnomish Inventor.flavor: She's never quite sure what she's making, she just knows it's AWESOME!

Knight of the Wild.name: Knight of the Wild
Knight of the Wild.text: Whenever you summon a Beast, reduce the Cost of this card by (1).
Knight of the Wild.flavor: He gets a discount on the tournament entry fee because he is his own horse.

Evil Heckler.name: Evil Heckler
Evil Heckler.flavor: To be honest, heckling is not the most effective form of evil.

Spellbender.name: Spellbender
Spellbender.text: Secret: When an enemy casts a spell on a minion, summon a 1/3 as the new target.
Spellbender.flavor: While it's fun to intercept enemy lightning bolts, a spellbender much prefers to intercept opposing Marks of the Wild.  It just feels meaner.  And blood elves... well, they're a little mean.

Ironbeak Owl.name: Ironbeak Owl
Ironbeak Owl.flavor: Their wings are silent but their screech is... whatever the opposite of silent is.

Kodorider.name: Kodorider
Kodorider.flavor: Someone called her a Rhinorider, and she's NOT HAPPY.

Rumbling Elemental.name: Rumbling Elemental
Rumbling Elemental.text: After you play a Battlecry minion, deal 2 damage to a random enemy.
Rumbling Elemental.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Rumbling Elemental.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Mind Blast.name: Mind Blast
Mind Blast.text: Deal $5 damage to the enemy hero.
Mind Blast.flavor: This spell blasts you directly in the MIND.

Sea Giant.name: Sea Giant
Sea Giant.text: Costs (1) less for each other minion on the battlefield.

Twilight Guardian.name: Twilight Guardian
Twilight Guardian.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Taunt.
Twilight Guardian.flavor: A result of magical experiments carried out by the Black Dragonflight, it's not his fault that he's a vicious killer.

Forbidden Flame.name: Forbidden Flame
Forbidden Flame.text: Spend all your Mana. Deal that much damage to a minion.
Forbidden Flame.flavor: WARNING: This flame is not to be used unless you are a licensed acolyte of the Old Gods.

Nat Pagle.name: Nat Pagle
Nat Pagle.text: At the start of your turn, you have a 50% chance to draw an extra card.
Nat Pagle.flavor: Nat Pagle, Azeroth's premier fisherman!  He invented the Auto-Angler 3000, the Extendo-Pole 3000, and the Lure-o-matic 2099 (still in testing).

Warhorse Trainer.name: Warhorse Trainer
Warhorse Trainer.text: Your Silver Hand Recruits have +1 Attack.
Warhorse Trainer.flavor: He doesn't even get Sundays off.  Every day he's hostling.

The Beast.name: The Beast
The Beast.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/3 Finkle Einhorn for your opponent.
The Beast.flavor: He lives in Blackrock Mountain.  He eats Gnomes.  That's pretty much it.

Cruel Dinomancer.name: Cruel Dinomancer
Cruel Dinomancer.text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a random minion you discarded this game.
Cruel Dinomancer.flavor: As that old saying goes: "you don't get into dinomancing to make friends."

Spreading Madness.name: Spreading Madness
Spreading Madness.text: Deal $9 damage randomly split among ALL characters.
Spreading Madness.flavor: Most citizens of Darkshire wear those surgical masks to prevent spreading Madness to tourists.

Curse of Rafaam.name: Curse of Rafaam
Curse of Rafaam.text:
Give your opponent a 'Cursed!' card.
While they hold it, they take 2 damage on their turn.
Curse of Rafaam.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Curse of Rafaam.flavor: This is what happens when Rafaam stubs his toe unexpectedly.
Curse of Rafaam.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Fel Orc Soulfiend.name: Fel Orc Soulfiend
Fel Orc Soulfiend.text: At the start of your turn, deal 2 damage to this minion.
Fel Orc Soulfiend.flavor: "Doc says the persistent burning sensation in my soul is probably just an ulcer."

Nightbane Templar.name: Nightbane Templar
Nightbane Templar.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, summon two 1/1 Whelps.
Nightbane Templar.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
Nightbane Templar.flavor: Originally joined to be Arcanagos’ Templar, but has to admit that ordering pizza has become waaaay easier.
Nightbane Templar.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.

Kalimos, Primal Lord.name: Kalimos, Primal Lord
Kalimos, Primal Lord.text: [x]Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, cast an Elemental Invocation.
Kalimos, Primal Lord.flavor: All that's missing is a little heart.

Sleep with the Fishes.name: Sleep with the Fishes
Sleep with the Fishes.text: Deal $3 damage to all damaged minions.
Sleep with the Fishes.flavor: If you're sleeping with the fishes, we highly suggest not bringing an electric blanket.

Dark Wispers.name: Dark Wispers
Dark Wispers.text: Choose One - Summon 5 Wisps; or Give a minion +5/+5 and Taunt.
Dark Wispers.flavor: Don't worry; we fired the person who named this card.

Bear Trap.name: Bear Trap
Bear Trap.text: Secret: After your hero is attacked, summon a 3/3 Bear with Taunt.
Bear Trap.flavor: You'll never guess what's in that conveniently bear-sized, bear-smelling box.

Shadowflame.name: Shadowflame
Shadowflame.text: Destroy a friendly minion and deal its Attack damage to all enemy minions.
Shadowflame.flavor: Start with a powerful minion and stir in Shadowflame and you have a good time!

Shieldbearer.name: Shieldbearer
Shieldbearer.flavor: Have you seen the size of the shields in this game??  This is no easy job.

Ravenous Pterrordax.name: Ravenous Pterrordax
Ravenous Pterrordax.text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion to Adapt twice.
Ravenous Pterrordax.flavor: For better results, feed your pterrordax low-fat, high-fiber minions.

Awaken the Makers.name: Awaken the Makers
Awaken the Makers.text: Quest: Summon 7 Deathrattle minions. Reward: Amara, Warden of Hope.
Awaken the Makers.flavor: They keep hitting the Snooze button.

Spawn of Shadows.name: Spawn of Shadows
Spawn of Shadows.flavor: What did you expect to happen?  He's a Spawn.  Of Shadows.

Tunnel Trogg.name: Tunnel Trogg
Tunnel Trogg.text: Whenever you Overload, gain +1 Attack per locked Mana Crystal.
Tunnel Trogg.howToEarn: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Tunnel Trogg.flavor: Sure, they're ugly, but they live in tunnels.  You try your beauty routine without natural light.
Tunnel Trogg.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Flamewaker.name: Flamewaker
Flamewaker.text: After you cast a spell, deal 2 damage randomly split among all enemies.
Flamewaker.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Flamewaker.flavor: Flamewakers HATE being confused for Flamewalkers. They just wake up fire, they don’t walk on it. Walking on fire is CRAZY.
Flamewaker.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Assassinate.name: Assassinate
Assassinate.flavor: If you don't want to be assassinated, move to the Barrens and change your name. Good luck!

Lil' Exorcist.name: Lil' Exorcist
Lil' Exorcist.flavor: Warlocks have the town exorcist on speed dial in case they unleash the wrong demon.

Dragonfire Potion.name: Dragonfire Potion
Dragonfire Potion.text:
[x]Deal $5 damage to all
minions except Dragons.
Dragonfire Potion.flavor: No one was brave enough to fire the dragon in person… so they made the potion do it.

Leatherclad Hogleader.name: Leatherclad Hogleader
Leatherclad Hogleader.text: Battlecry: If your opponent has 6 or more cards in hand, gain Charge.
Leatherclad Hogleader.flavor: The Hogchoppers, the terrors of Tanaris, can always be found at one tavern or another in Gadgetzan, refueling for totally real and legit adventures that they go on.

Lotus Assassin.name: Lotus Assassin
Lotus Assassin.text: Stealth. Whenever this attacks and kills a minion, gain Stealth.
Lotus Assassin.flavor: For 5000g, you can just give the Jade Lotus any name and they will assassinate and/or embarrass them.

Deadly Poison.name: Deadly Poison
Deadly Poison.flavor: Rogues guard the secrets to poison-making carefully, lest magi start incorporating poison into their spells.  Poisonbolt? Rain of Poison?  Poison Elemental?  Nobody wants that.

Blingtron 3000.name: Blingtron 3000
Blingtron 3000.text: Battlecry: Equip a random weapon for each player.
Blingtron 3000.flavor: PREPARE PARTY SERVOS FOR IMMEDIATE DEPLOYMENT.

Giant Sand Worm.name: Giant Sand Worm
Giant Sand Worm.text: Whenever this attacks and kills a minion, it may attack again.
Giant Sand Worm.flavor: Banned from every all-you-can-eat buffet on Azeroth.

Brawl.name: Brawl
Brawl.text: Destroy all minions except one. (chosen randomly)
Brawl.flavor: Do you know the first rule of Brawl Club?

Murloc Tidecaller.name: Murloc Tidecaller
Murloc Tidecaller.text: Whenever you summon a Murloc, gain +1 Attack.
Murloc Tidecaller.flavor: This guy gets crazy strong at family reunions.

Smuggler's Crate.name: Smuggler's Crate
Smuggler's Crate.text: Give a random Beast in your hand +2/+2.
Smuggler's Crate.flavor: Are you sure these are the crates that are supposed to go to the Gadgetzan petting zoo?

Mech-Bear-Cat.name: Mech-Bear-Cat
Mech-Bear-Cat.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, add a Spare Part card to your hand.
Mech-Bear-Cat.flavor: Crushes buildings with his BEAR hands.

Headcrack.name: Headcrack
Headcrack.text: Deal $2 damage to the enemy hero. Combo: Return this to your hand next turn.
Headcrack.flavor: When all else fails, nothing beats a swift whack upside the head.

Wickerflame Burnbristle.name: Wickerflame Burnbristle
Wickerflame Burnbristle.text: [x]Divine Shield. Taunt. Damage dealt by this minion also heals your hero.
Wickerflame Burnbristle.flavor: Wickerflame spent years as a recruit for the Goons, never making the big-time because he always fired his chest-cannon too slowly.  "Hey," he thought, "maybe if I keep my beard lit on fire, I can do this faster."  BOOM, promoted.

Micro Machine.name: Micro Machine
Micro Machine.text: At the start of each turn, gain +1 Attack.
Micro Machine.flavor: This card is the real thing.

Consecration.name: Consecration
Consecration.flavor: Consecrated ground glows with Holy energy.  But it smells a little, too.

King's Defender.name: King's Defender
King's Defender.text: Battlecry: If you have a minion with Taunt, gain +1 Durability.
King's Defender.flavor: "King's Attacker" is a shield.  Funny, huh?

Stand Against Darkness.name: Stand Against Darkness
Stand Against Darkness.flavor: Or if you're too tired, you can just kind of lean against the darkness.

King of Beasts.name: King of Beasts
King of Beasts.text: Taunt. Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack for each other Beast you have.
King of Beasts.flavor: He never sleeps.  Not even in the mighty jungle.

Shaky Zipgunner.name: Shaky Zipgunner
Shaky Zipgunner.text: [x]Deathrattle: Give a random minion in your hand +2/+2.
Shaky Zipgunner.flavor: The Grimy Goons can get you any weapon you want but if you want it to not explode you gotta pay extra.

Gorillabot A-3.name: Gorillabot A-3
Gorillabot A-3.text: Battlecry: If you control another Mech, Discover a Mech.
Gorillabot A-3.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Gorillabot A-3.flavor: A-1 and A-2 went nuts, when they should have gone bolts.
Gorillabot A-3.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Holy Nova.name: Holy Nova
Holy Nova.text: Deal $2 damage to all enemies. Restore #2 Health to all friendly characters.
Holy Nova.flavor: If the Holy Light forsakes you, good luck casting this spell.  Also, you're probably a jerk.

Clockwork Gnome.name: Clockwork Gnome
Clockwork Gnome.text: Deathrattle: Add a Spare Part card to your hand.
Clockwork Gnome.flavor: Clockwork gnomes are always asking what time it is.

Murloc Knight.name: Murloc Knight
Murloc Knight.flavor: Hee hee!  Look at his cute little feet.

Kabal Talonpriest.name: Kabal Talonpriest
Kabal Talonpriest.flavor: Inkmaster Solia had to figure out how to tattoo feathers.

Convert.name: Convert
Convert.text: Put a copy of an enemy minion into your hand.

Prophet Velen.name: Prophet Velen
Prophet Velen.text: Double the damage and healing of your spells and Hero Power.
Prophet Velen.flavor: He's been exiled from his home, and all his brothers turned evil, but otherwise he doesn't have a lot to complain about.

Fiery War Axe.name: Fiery War Axe
Fiery War Axe.flavor: During times of tranquility and harmony, this weapon was called by its less popular name, Chilly Peace Axe.

Binding Heal.name: Binding Heal
Binding Heal.text: Restore #5 Health to a minion and your hero.
Binding Heal.flavor: By accepting this healing, you agree to the following terms…

Varian Wrynn.name: Varian Wrynn
Varian Wrynn.text: Battlecry: Draw 3 cards. Put any minions you drew directly into the battlefield.
Varian Wrynn.flavor: Leader of the Alliance!  Father of Anduin!  Also he likes to play Arena, and he averages 12 wins.

Forgotten Torch.name: Forgotten Torch
Forgotten Torch.text: Deal $3 damage. Shuffle a 'Roaring Torch' into your deck that deals 6 damage.
Forgotten Torch.howToEarn: Unlocked by starting the League of Explorers adventure.
Forgotten Torch.flavor: Why does a forgotten torch turn into a roaring torch with no provocation?  It's one of life's many mysteries.
Forgotten Torch.howToEarnGolden: Can be crafted after starting the League of Explorers adventure.

Master of Ceremonies.name: Master of Ceremonies
Master of Ceremonies.text: Battlecry: If you have a minion with Spell Damage, gain +2/+2.

Maelstrom Portal.name: Maelstrom Portal
Maelstrom Portal.text:
Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions. Summon a random
1-Cost minion.
Maelstrom Portal.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
Maelstrom Portal.flavor: They bill this as a popular resort attraction, but they try and get your money up front.
Maelstrom Portal.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.

Wisp.name: Wisp
Wisp.flavor: If you hit an Eredar Lord with enough Wisps, it will explode.   But why?

Vaporize.name: Vaporize
Vaporize.text: Secret: When a minion attacks your hero, destroy it.
Vaporize.flavor: Rumor has it that Deathwing brought about the Cataclysm after losing a game to this card.  We may never know the truth.

Pterrordax Hatchling.name: Pterrordax Hatchling
Pterrordax Hatchling.flavor: Aww.  So cute.  Want to feed him another finger?

Loatheb.name: Loatheb
Loatheb.text: Battlecry: Enemy spells cost (5) more next turn.
Loatheb.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Loatheb.flavor: Loatheb used to be a simple Bog Beast.  This is why we need stricter regulations on mining and agriculture.
Loatheb.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Leper Gnome.name: Leper Gnome
Leper Gnome.text: Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
Leper Gnome.flavor: He really just wants to be your friend, but the constant rejection is starting to really get to him.

Grimestreet Enforcer.name: Grimestreet Enforcer
Grimestreet Enforcer.text: At the end of your turn, give all minions in your hand +1/+1.
Grimestreet Enforcer.flavor: "Sir, you don't have a permit to park your mount here."

Wilfred Fizzlebang.name: Wilfred Fizzlebang
Wilfred Fizzlebang.text: Cards you draw from your Hero Power cost (0).
Wilfred Fizzlebang.flavor:
He can summon anything, even a FEARSOME DOOMGUARD*.
*He's pretty sure this is going to work out.

Shifter Zerus.name: Shifter Zerus
Shifter Zerus.text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a random minion.
Shifter Zerus.flavor: It's like being able to play with THREE angry chickens!

Grove Tender.name: Grove Tender
Grove Tender.text: Choose One - Give each player a Mana Crystal; or Each player draws a card.
Grove Tender.flavor: Likes: Hiking and the great outdoors. Dislikes: Goblin shredders and sandals. (Can’t find any that fit!).

Lord Jaraxxus.name: Lord Jaraxxus
Lord Jaraxxus.text: Battlecry: Destroy your hero and replace it with Lord Jaraxxus.
Lord Jaraxxus.flavor: "TRIFLING GNOME! YOUR ARROGANCE WILL BE YOUR UNDOING!!!!"

Corrupted Seer.name: Corrupted Seer
Corrupted Seer.text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all non-Murloc minions.
Corrupted Seer.flavor: For seers, it's very handy to have your crystal ball hanging right in front of your face.

Gilblin Stalker.name: Gilblin Stalker
Gilblin Stalker.flavor:
"Shhh, I think I hear something."
"Ah, it's probably nothing." - Every Henchman

Lost Tallstrider.name: Lost Tallstrider
Lost Tallstrider.flavor: The message, "If found, please return to Mulgore," is tattooed on his rear.

Druid of the Claw.name: Druid of the Claw
Druid of the Claw.flavor: Cat or Bear?  Cat or Bear?!  I just cannot CHOOSE!

Sacrificial Pact.name: Sacrificial Pact
Sacrificial Pact.text: Destroy a Demon. Restore #5 Health to your hero.
Sacrificial Pact.flavor: This is the reason that Demons never really become friends with Warlocks.

Mark of the Wild.name: Mark of the Wild
Mark of the Wild.text: Give a minion Taunt and +2/+2. (+2 Attack/+2 Health)
Mark of the Wild.flavor: Not to be confused with Jim of the Wild.

Silvermoon Guardian.name: Silvermoon Guardian
Silvermoon Guardian.flavor: The first time they tried to guard Silvermoon against the scourge, it didn’t go so well…

Webspinner.name: Webspinner
Webspinner.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Beast card to your hand.
Webspinner.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Webspinner.flavor: Spider cocoons are like little piñatas!
Webspinner.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Mana Wyrm.name: Mana Wyrm
Mana Wyrm.text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +1 Attack.
Mana Wyrm.flavor: These wyrms feed on arcane energies, and while they are generally considered a nuisance rather than a real threat, you really shouldn't leave them alone with a bucket of mana.

Poison Seeds.name: Poison Seeds
Poison Seeds.text: Destroy all minions and summon 2/2 Treants to replace them.
Poison Seeds.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Poison Seeds.flavor: "Poisonseed Bagel" is the least popular bagel at McTiggin's Druidic Bagel Emporium.
Poison Seeds.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Flame Lance.name: Flame Lance
Flame Lance.flavor: It's on the rack next to ice lance, acid lance, and English muffin lance.

Tauren Warrior.name: Tauren Warrior
Tauren Warrior.flavor: Tauren Warrior: Champion of Mulgore, Slayer of Quilboar, Rider of Thunderbluff Elevators.

Commanding Shout.name: Commanding Shout
Commanding Shout.text: Your minions can't be reduced below 1 Health this turn. Draw a card.
Commanding Shout.flavor: "Shout! Shout! Let it all out!" - Advice to warriors-in-training

Babbling Book.name: Babbling Book
Babbling Book.text: Battlecry: Add a random Mage spell to your hand.
Babbling Book.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
Babbling Book.flavor: His idol is the Green Hills of Stranglethorn, and he won't shut up about it.
Babbling Book.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.

Haunted Creeper.name: Haunted Creeper
Haunted Creeper.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Haunted Creeper.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Dragon's Breath.name: Dragon's Breath
Dragon's Breath.text: Deal $4 damage. Costs (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
Dragon's Breath.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Dragon's Breath.flavor: Dragons breathe fire, sure, but did you know they can also breathe Cotton Candy?  It's harder to give them a reason to do that, though.
Dragon's Breath.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Tree of Life.name: Tree of Life
Tree of Life.text: Restore all characters to full Health.

Shifting Shade.name: Shifting Shade
Shifting Shade.text: [x]Deathrattle: Copy a card from your opponent's deck  and add it to your hand.
Shifting Shade.flavor: Yeah, it's cooler in the shade, but you're also more likely to get JACKED.

Ragnaros, Lightlord.name: Ragnaros, Lightlord
Ragnaros, Lightlord.text: At the end of your turn, restore 8 Health to a damaged friendly character.
Ragnaros, Lightlord.flavor: What happens when you try and corrupt a corrupted firelord? DOUBLE NEGATIVE, INSECT!

Unearthed Raptor.name: Unearthed Raptor
Unearthed Raptor.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Gain a copy of its Deathrattle.
Unearthed Raptor.howToEarn: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Unearthed Raptor.flavor: Still hunting for the ones who earthed him.
Unearthed Raptor.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Forbidden Ancient.name: Forbidden Ancient
Forbidden Ancient.text: Battlecry: Spend all your Mana. Gain +1/+1 for each mana spent.
Forbidden Ancient.flavor: This Ancient was banned from the local tavern after tucking a 'Dr. Boom' up its sleeve.

The Last Kaleidosaur.name: The Last Kaleidosaur
The Last Kaleidosaur.text: Quest: Cast 6 spells on your minions. Reward: Galvadon.
The Last Kaleidosaur.flavor: “Impossible!” exclaimed the Silver Hand Recruit, his eyes filled with fear. Uther shook his head, turning the crystal until it caught the light: “Life finds a way.”

Bouncing Blade.name: Bouncing Blade
Bouncing Blade.text: Deal $1 damage to a random minion. Repeat until a minion dies.
Bouncing Blade.flavor: Only goblins would think this was a good idea. Even they are starting to have their doubts.

Ultrasaur.name: Ultrasaur
Ultrasaur.flavor: Evolved the really long neck to spy on its neighbors.

Dread Infernal.name: Dread Infernal
Dread Infernal.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to ALL other characters.
Dread Infernal.flavor: "INFERNOOOOOOOOOO!" - Jaraxxus, Eredar Lord of the Burning Legion

Twin Emperor Vek'lor.name: Twin Emperor Vek'lor
Twin Emperor Vek'lor.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, summon another Emperor.
Twin Emperor Vek'lor.flavor: Do they make decisions based on age? "I'm two minutes older therefore we burn this village."

Wicked Witchdoctor.name: Wicked Witchdoctor
Wicked Witchdoctor.text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a random basic Totem.
Wicked Witchdoctor.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
Wicked Witchdoctor.flavor: You can easily defeat her by either dealing 4 damage, or dropping a house on her.
Wicked Witchdoctor.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.

Beckoner of Evil.name: Beckoner of Evil
Beckoner of Evil.howToEarn: Unlocked when opening a Whispers of the Old Gods pack.
Beckoner of Evil.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked after opening a Whispers of the Old Gods pack.

Fel Reaver.name: Fel Reaver
Fel Reaver.text: Whenever your opponent plays a card, remove the top 3 cards of your deck.

Mind Control.name: Mind Control
Mind Control.text: Take control of an enemy minion.
Mind Control.flavor: Nominated as "Spell Most Likely to Make Your Opponent Punch the Wall."

Bloodmage Thalnos.name: Bloodmage Thalnos
Bloodmage Thalnos.flavor: He's in charge of the Annual Scarlet Monastery Blood Drive!

Steam Surger.name: Steam Surger
Steam Surger.text: [x]Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, add a 'Flame Geyser' to your hand.
Steam Surger.flavor: Explorers nicknamed him the Teapot Elemental.

Crazed Worshipper.name: Crazed Worshipper
Crazed Worshipper.text: Taunt. Whenever this minion takes damage, give your C'Thun +1/+1 (wherever it is).
Crazed Worshipper.flavor: Every month they share a pancake breakfast with the Perfectly Rational Worshippers.

Unite the Murlocs.name: Unite the Murlocs
Unite the Murlocs.flavor: Form feet and legs!  Form arms and body!  Oh.  Sorry.  I was thinking about Mechafin.

Rallying Blade.name: Rallying Blade
Rallying Blade.text: Battlecry: Give +1/+1 to your minions with Divine Shield.
Rallying Blade.flavor: As far as blades go, this one is pretty great in the motivation department.

Sword of Justice.name: Sword of Justice
Sword of Justice.text: After you summon a minion, give it +1/+1 and this loses 1 Durability.
Sword of Justice.flavor: I dub you Sir Loin of Beef!

Primordial Drake.name: Primordial Drake
Primordial Drake.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all other minions.
Primordial Drake.flavor: Before he became a rap artist.

Flame Leviathan.name: Flame Leviathan
Flame Leviathan.text: When you draw this, deal 2 damage to all characters.
Flame Leviathan.flavor: Mimiron likes to take the Flame Leviathan out on some sweet joyrides.

Thing from Below.name: Thing from Below
Thing from Below.text: [x]Taunt Costs (1) less for each Totem you've summoned this game.
Thing from Below.flavor: Just can't resist the opportunity to hang around with a bunch of totems.

Shadowcaster.name: Shadowcaster
Shadowcaster.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Add a 1/1 copy to your hand that costs (1).
Shadowcaster.flavor: I mean, it's not creepy if you ASK before you steal their shadow to make a small replica of them to keep on your shelf.

Prince Malchezaar.name: Prince Malchezaar
Prince Malchezaar.text: [x]When the game starts, add 5 extra Legendary minions to your deck.
Prince Malchezaar.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
Prince Malchezaar.flavor: He was super excited to acquire Gorehowl at a garage sale!  Then super disappointed to find out it was a foam reproduction.
Prince Malchezaar.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.

Wisps of the Old Gods.name: Wisps of the Old Gods
Wisps of the Old Gods.text: Choose One - Summon seven 1/1 Wisps; or Give your minions +2/+2.
Wisps of the Old Gods.flavor: They're just normal wisps, actually. The "Of the Old Gods" bit is just marketing.

Menagerie Magician.name: Menagerie Magician
Menagerie Magician.text: Battlecry: Give a random friendly Beast, Dragon, and Murloc +2/+2.
Menagerie Magician.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
Menagerie Magician.flavor: Just between us, if things get tight the Menagerie Magician position will probably be the first to go.
Menagerie Magician.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.

Foe Reaper 4000.name: Foe Reaper 4000
Foe Reaper 4000.text: Also damages the minions next to whomever it attacks.
Foe Reaper 4000.flavor: Foe reaping is really not so different from harvest reaping, at the end of the day.

Heroic Strike.name: Heroic Strike
Heroic Strike.text: Give your hero +4 Attack this turn.
Heroic Strike.flavor: Really, if you're a hero, this is every strike.

Harrison Jones.name: Harrison Jones
Harrison Jones.text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon and draw cards equal to its Durability.
Harrison Jones.flavor: “That belongs in the Hall of Explorers!”

Stonesplinter Trogg.name: Stonesplinter Trogg
Stonesplinter Trogg.text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, gain +1 Attack.
Stonesplinter Trogg.flavor: The only thing worse than smelling troggs is listening to their poetry.

Giant Wasp.name: Giant Wasp
Giant Wasp.flavor: Float like a butterfly, sting like a giant wasp!

Silithid Swarmer.name: Silithid Swarmer
Silithid Swarmer.text: Can only attack if your hero attacked this turn.
Silithid Swarmer.flavor: If your hero doesn't attack, it's just "Silithid Loner".

Felguard.name: Felguard
Felguard.text: Taunt Battlecry: Destroy one of your Mana Crystals.
Felguard.flavor: Yes, he'll fight for you.  BUT HE'S NOT GOING TO LIKE IT.

Hunter's Mark.name: Hunter's Mark
Hunter's Mark.flavor: Never play 'Hide and Go Seek' with a Hunter.

Enter the Coliseum.name: Enter the Coliseum
Enter the Coliseum.text: Destroy all minions except each player's highest Attack minion.
Enter the Coliseum.flavor: You have to get past the vendors first.  So many are lost to shopping...

Burgle.name: Burgle
Burgle.text: Add 2 random class cards to your hand (from your opponent's class).

Eggnapper.name: Eggnapper
Eggnapper.flavor: Often misunderstood, it's just that he likes to use the eggs as pillows.

Snipe.name: Snipe
Snipe.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, deal $4 damage to it.
Snipe.flavor: A great sniper hits the spot.  Just like a delicious flank of boar. Mmmmm.

Bash.name: Bash
Bash.flavor: You might think bashing doesn't take a lot of practice.  It doesn't.

Anyfin Can Happen.name: Anyfin Can Happen
Anyfin Can Happen.text: Summon 7 Murlocs that died this game.
Anyfin Can Happen.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Anyfin Can Happen.flavor: Theme song by Ellie Goldfin and Blagghghlrlrl Harris.
Anyfin Can Happen.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Jeweled Scarab.name: Jeweled Scarab
Jeweled Scarab.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Jeweled Scarab.flavor: It's amazing what you can do with super glue!
Jeweled Scarab.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Weasel Tunneler.name: Weasel Tunneler
Weasel Tunneler.text: Deathrattle: Shuffle this minion into your opponent's deck.
Weasel Tunneler.flavor: He's the reason the First Bank of Gadgetzan has steel floors.

Master of Evolution.name: Master of Evolution
Master of Evolution.text: Battlecry: Transform a friendly minion into a random one that costs (1) more.
Master of Evolution.flavor: Will be really useful in the new "Hearthémon" game.

Edwin VanCleef.name: Edwin VanCleef
Edwin VanCleef.text: Combo: Gain +2/+2 for each other card you've played this turn.
Edwin VanCleef.flavor: He led the Stonemasons in the reconstruction of Stormwind, and when the nobles refused to pay, he founded the Defias Brotherhood to, well, deconstruct Stormwind.

Ethereal Arcanist.name: Ethereal Arcanist
Ethereal Arcanist.text: If you control a Secret at the end of your turn, gain +2/+2.
Ethereal Arcanist.flavor: The ethereals are wrapped in cloth to give form to their non-corporeal bodies. Also because it's nice and soft.

Voidcaller.name: Voidcaller
Voidcaller.text: Deathrattle: Put a random Demon from your hand into the battlefield.
Voidcaller.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Voidcaller.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Servant of Yogg-Saron.name: Servant of Yogg-Saron
Servant of Yogg-Saron.text: Battlecry: Cast a random spell that costs (5) or less (targets chosen randomly).
Servant of Yogg-Saron.flavor: Yogg-Saron always likes to complain about how he has too many servants and there are too many mouths to feed.

Unbound Elemental.name: Unbound Elemental
Unbound Elemental.text: Whenever you play a card with Overload, gain +1/+1.
Unbound Elemental.flavor: Unlike bound elementals, Unbound ones really enjoy a night on the town.

Lava Burst.name: Lava Burst
Lava Burst.flavor: It's like an ocean of liquid magma in your mouth!

Ogre Magi.name: Ogre Magi
Ogre Magi.flavor: Training Ogres in the art of spellcasting is a questionable decision.

Malygos.name: Malygos
Malygos.flavor: Malygos hates it when mortals use magic.  He gets so mad!

Anubisath Sentinel.name: Anubisath Sentinel
Anubisath Sentinel.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Anubisath Sentinel.flavor: He's actually a 1/1 who picked up the hammer from the last guy.
Anubisath Sentinel.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Excavated Evil.name: Excavated Evil
Excavated Evil.text:
Deal $3 damage to all minions.
Shuffle this card into your opponent's deck.
Excavated Evil.howToEarn: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Excavated Evil.flavor: MOM! DAD! DON'T TOUCH IT! IT'S EVIL!!!!!!
Excavated Evil.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Small-Time Recruits.name: Small-Time Recruits
Small-Time Recruits.flavor: Now we know why they wear tiny watches.

Arcane Golem.name: Arcane Golem
Arcane Golem.text: Battlecry: Give your opponent a Mana Crystal.
Arcane Golem.flavor: Having Arcane golems at home really classes up the place, and as a bonus they are great conversation pieces.

Nerub'ar Weblord.name: Nerub'ar Weblord
Nerub'ar Weblord.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Nerub'ar Weblord.flavor: Weblords spend all day making giant trampoline parks.
Nerub'ar Weblord.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Starfire.name: Starfire
Starfire.flavor: Balance is important to druids.  This card is perfectly balanced.

Disciple of C'Thun.name: Disciple of C'Thun
Disciple of C'Thun.text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage. Give your C'Thun +2/+2 (wherever it is).
Disciple of C'Thun.flavor: C’Thun’s recruiting pitch involves cookies, which is why it’s the most popular Old God.

Forbidden Shaping.name: Forbidden Shaping
Forbidden Shaping.text: Spend all your Mana. Summon a random minion that costs that much.
Forbidden Shaping.flavor: But the minion arrives covered in goo.

Flame Juggler.name: Flame Juggler
Flame Juggler.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
Flame Juggler.flavor: At first he liked juggling chain saws, but then he thought, "Flames are better!  Because FIRE!"

N'Zoth, the Corruptor.name: N'Zoth, the Corruptor
N'Zoth, the Corruptor.text: Battlecry: Summon your Deathrattle minions that died this game.
N'Zoth, the Corruptor.flavor: Has not been able to get "Under the Sea" out of his head for like FIVE THOUSAND YEARS.

Defias Ringleader.name: Defias Ringleader
Defias Ringleader.flavor: He stole the deed to town years ago, so technically the town is his. He just calls people Scrub to be mean.

Unstable Portal.name: Unstable Portal
Unstable Portal.text: Add a random minion to your hand. It costs (3) less.
Unstable Portal.flavor: The denizens of Azeroth have no idea how much work goes into stabilizing portals.  We spend like 30% of GDP on portal upkeep.

Fight Promoter.name: Fight Promoter
Fight Promoter.text: [x]Battlecry: If you control a minion with 6 or more  Health, draw two cards.
Fight Promoter.flavor: "Yeah, I can get you Knuckles.  No, no, he's been clean for *weeks*."

Tournament Attendee.name: Tournament Attendee
Tournament Attendee.flavor: He was so excited to get season tickets to this year's Grand Tournament.  He normally doesn't get them at first and has to buy them from Ogre scalpers.

Cogmaster.name: Cogmaster
Cogmaster.text: Has +2 Attack while you have a Mech.
Cogmaster.flavor: After a while, you don't see the cogs and sprockets. All you see is a robot, a spider tank, a deathray...

Blastcrystal Potion.name: Blastcrystal Potion
Blastcrystal Potion.text: Destroy a minion and one of your Mana Crystals.
Blastcrystal Potion.flavor: There's a fine line between "potion" and "grenade". Wait. Actually, there's not.

Captured Jormungar.name: Captured Jormungar
Captured Jormungar.flavor: You can keep him, but you have to promise to feed him and clean out his tank every day!

Bestial Wrath.name: Bestial Wrath
Bestial Wrath.text: Give a friendly Beast +2 Attack and Immune this turn.
Bestial Wrath.flavor: The seething wrath is just beneath the surface.  Beneath that is wild abandon, followed by slight annoyance.

Jungle Giants.name: Jungle Giants
Jungle Giants.text: [x]Quest: Summon 5 minions with 5 or more Attack. Reward: Barnabus.
Jungle Giants.flavor: Forming the Golakka Crater was the end of Barnabus' disastrous career as a dancer.

Stranglethorn Tiger.name: Stranglethorn Tiger
Stranglethorn Tiger.flavor: The wonderful thing about tigers is tigers are wonderful things!

Lorewalker Cho.name: Lorewalker Cho
Lorewalker Cho.text: Whenever a player casts a spell, put a copy into the other player’s hand.
Lorewalker Cho.flavor: Lorewalker Cho archives and shares tales from the land of Pandaria, but his favorite story is the one where Joey and Phoebe go on a road trip.

Moonglade Portal.name: Moonglade Portal
Moonglade Portal.text:
Restore #6 Health. Summon a random
6-Cost minion.
Moonglade Portal.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
Moonglade Portal.flavor: Ain't no party like a Moonglade party ‘cause a Moonglade party got bears.
Moonglade Portal.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.

Void Terror.name: Void Terror
Void Terror.text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy both adjacent minions and gain their Attack and Health.
Void Terror.flavor: If you put this into your deck, you WILL lose the trust of your other minions.

Ice Block.name: Ice Block
Ice Block.text: Secret: When your hero takes fatal damage, prevent it and become Immune this turn.
Ice Block.flavor: Ice is nice, and will suffice!

Feign Death.name: Feign Death
Feign Death.flavor: The hardest part about doing a "Feign Death" convincingly is learning how to make the right smell. It takes a lot of commitment.

Blubber Baron.name: Blubber Baron
Blubber Baron.text: Whenever you summon a Battlecry minion while this is in your hand, gain +1/+1.
Blubber Baron.flavor: When oil, railroad, steel, robber, and red are all already taken, your options are limited.

Earthen Scales.name: Earthen Scales
Earthen Scales.text: Give a friendly minion +1/+1, then gain Armor equal to its Attack.
Earthen Scales.flavor: You can make your own Earthen Scales at home. Step 1: Roll around in the dirt. Step 2: Magic.

Lord of the Arena.name: Lord of the Arena
Lord of the Arena.flavor: He used to be a 2100+ rated arena player, but that was years ago and nobody can get him to shut up about it.

Nat, the Darkfisher.name: Nat, the Darkfisher
Nat, the Darkfisher.text: At the start of your opponent's turn, they have a 50% chance to draw an extra card.
Nat, the Darkfisher.flavor: You can take away his humanity, but you will never take away his fishing pole.

Kvaldir Raider.name: Kvaldir Raider
Kvaldir Raider.flavor: Coming soon... to a tuskarr village near you!

Dunemaul Shaman.name: Dunemaul Shaman
Dunemaul Shaman.text: Windfury, Overload: (1) 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
Dunemaul Shaman.flavor: He just closes his eyes and goes for it. Raarararrrarar!

Pompous Thespian.name: Pompous Thespian
Pompous Thespian.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
Pompous Thespian.flavor: Alas poor Annoy-o-Tron! A fellow of infinite jest, of most excellent fancy!
Pompous Thespian.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.

Druid of the Fang.name: Druid of the Fang
Druid of the Fang.text: Battlecry: If you have a Beast, transform this minion into a 7/7.
Druid of the Fang.flavor: The Druids of the Fang live in the Wailing Caverns. They wear cool snake shirts and tell snake jokes and say "bro" a lot.

North Sea Kraken.name: North Sea Kraken
North Sea Kraken.flavor: You have no idea how tired this guy is of being released.

Vitality Totem.name: Vitality Totem
Vitality Totem.text: At the end of your turn, restore 4 Health to your hero.
Vitality Totem.flavor: You can usually find these at the totemist's market on Saturdays.

Arcane Intellect.name: Arcane Intellect
Arcane Intellect.flavor: Playing this card makes you SMARTER.  And let's face it: we could all stand to be a little smarter.

Volatile Elemental.name: Volatile Elemental
Volatile Elemental.text: Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy minion.
Volatile Elemental.flavor: Currently in an anger management class with Raging Worgen, Grommash Hellscream, and The Angry Chicken. It isn't helping.

Deathwing, Dragonlord.name: Deathwing, Dragonlord
Deathwing, Dragonlord.text: Deathrattle: Put all Dragons from your hand into the battlefield.
Deathwing, Dragonlord.flavor: To his credit, Deathwing really took to heart the feedback he was receiving that he needed to be "more of a team player".

Duskboar.name: Duskboar
Duskboar.flavor: Often excluded from dinner parties.  To be fair, he is very boaring.

Animal Companion.name: Animal Companion
Animal Companion.flavor: You could summon Misha, Leokk, or Huffer!  Huffer is more trouble than he's worth.

Upgraded Repair Bot.name: Upgraded Repair Bot
Upgraded Repair Bot.flavor: It's the same as the previous generation but they slapped the word "upgraded" on it to sell it for double.

Molten Reflection.name: Molten Reflection
Molten Reflection.text: Choose a friendly minion. Summon a copy of it.

Injured Kvaldir.name: Injured Kvaldir
Injured Kvaldir.flavor: Don't worry.  With a little skin cream he's going to clear right up.

Grotesque Dragonhawk.name: Grotesque Dragonhawk
Grotesque Dragonhawk.flavor: They say that "grotesque is in the eye of the beholder," but that's just because they've never seen a Grotesque Dragonhawk. Yikes!

Bane of Doom.name: Bane of Doom
Bane of Doom.text: Deal $2 damage to a character. If that kills it, summon a random Demon.
Bane of Doom.flavor: My advice to you is to avoid Doom, if possible.

Gadgetzan Ferryman.name: Gadgetzan Ferryman
Gadgetzan Ferryman.text: Combo: Return a friendly minion to your hand.
Gadgetzan Ferryman.flavor: Is it just me, or is there something fishy about that ferryman?

Cold Blood.name: Cold Blood
Cold Blood.text: Give a minion +2 Attack. Combo: +4 Attack instead.
Cold Blood.flavor: "I'm cold blooded, check it and see!"

Zombie Chow.name: Zombie Chow
Zombie Chow.text: Deathrattle: Restore 5 Health to the enemy hero.
Zombie Chow.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Zombie Chow.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Shellshifter.name: Shellshifter
Shellshifter.flavor: Master of the Three Shell Monte.

Madam Goya.name: Madam Goya
Madam Goya.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Swap it with a minion in your deck.
Madam Goya.flavor: She has set up her Black Market here in Gadgetzan for one purpose, to make a KILLING when Beanie Babies make their inevitable comeback.

Coldlight Oracle.name: Coldlight Oracle
Coldlight Oracle.flavor: They can see the future.   In that future both players draw more cards.   Spoooky.

Metaltooth Leaper.name: Metaltooth Leaper
Metaltooth Leaper.flavor: Don't leave them out in the rain. In Un'Goro Crater there is a whole colony of rust-tooth leapers.

Temple Enforcer.name: Temple Enforcer
Temple Enforcer.flavor: He also moonlights Thursday nights as a bouncer at the Pig and Whistle Tavern.

Ice Lance.name: Ice Lance
Ice Lance.text: Freeze a character. If it was already Frozen, deal $4 damage instead.
Ice Lance.flavor: The trick is not to break the lance.  Otherwise, you have "Ice Pieces."  Ice Pieces aren't as effective.

Corrupting Mist.name: Corrupting Mist
Corrupting Mist.text: Corrupt every minion. Destroy them at the start of your next turn.
Corrupting Mist.flavor: The most terrifying of Un’goro magics is both silent… AND deadly.

Razorpetal Lasher.name: Razorpetal Lasher
Razorpetal Lasher.text: [x]Battlecry: Add a Razorpetal to your hand that deals 1 damage.
Razorpetal Lasher.flavor: The reason why there are no zombies in Un'goro.

War Golem.name: War Golem
War Golem.flavor: Golems are not afraid, but for some reason they still run when you cast Fear on them.  Instinct, maybe?  A desire to blend in?

Quartermaster.name: Quartermaster
Quartermaster.flavor: His specialty? Dividing things into four pieces.

Blade Flurry.name: Blade Flurry
Blade Flurry.text: Destroy your weapon and deal its damage to all enemy minions.
Blade Flurry.flavor: "Look, it's not just about waving daggers around really fast.  It's a lot more complicated than that." - Shan, Rogue Trainer

Lyra the Sunshard.name: Lyra the Sunshard
Lyra the Sunshard.text: Whenever you cast a spell, add a random Priest spell to your hand.
Lyra the Sunshard.flavor: Arise, fair sun, and kill my envious foes. They don't have a legendary as beautiful as you.

Arcanite Reaper.name: Arcanite Reaper
Arcanite Reaper.flavor: No… actually you should fear the Reaper.

Stolen Goods.name: Stolen Goods
Stolen Goods.text: Give a random Taunt minion in your hand +3/+3.
Stolen Goods.flavor: It fell off a kodo, I promise!

Mana Wraith.name: Mana Wraith
Mana Wraith.flavor: They come out at night to eat leftover mana crystals. "Mmmmmm," they say.

Medivh's Valet.name: Medivh's Valet
Medivh's Valet.text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, deal 3 damage.
Medivh's Valet.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
Medivh's Valet.flavor: "Magus Medivh sir, I've brought the flaming balloons, as you requested."
Medivh's Valet.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.

Maiden of the Lake.name: Maiden of the Lake
Maiden of the Lake.flavor: Not a good basis for a system of government.

Razorpetal Volley.name: Razorpetal Volley
Razorpetal Volley.text: Add two Razorpetals to your hand that deal 1 damage.
Razorpetal Volley.flavor: The result of a fundamental misunderstanding of the phrase "flower power".

Pint-Size Potion.name: Pint-Size Potion
Pint-Size Potion.text:
[x]Give all enemy minions
-3 Attack this turn only.
Pint-Size Potion.flavor: I hope you didn't disenchant your Shadow Word: Horror!

Power Word: Glory.name: Power Word: Glory
Power Word: Glory.text:
Choose a minion. Whenever it attacks, restore 4 Health to
your hero.
Power Word: Glory.flavor: The promise of glory is a powerful tool to get minions to do your bidding.  Only slightly less powerful than the promise of an ice cream bar!

Garrison Commander.name: Garrison Commander
Garrison Commander.text: You can use your Hero Power twice a turn.
Garrison Commander.flavor: He'll never admit it, but he pushes you hard because he really cares about you.

Igneous Elemental.name: Igneous Elemental
Igneous Elemental.text: Deathrattle: Add two 1/2 Elementals to your hand.
Igneous Elemental.flavor: We wanted to name him "Ingenious Elemental", but he just wasn't that bright.

Blessing of Wisdom.name: Blessing of Wisdom
Blessing of Wisdom.text: Choose a minion. Whenever it attacks, draw a card.
Blessing of Wisdom.flavor: Apparently with wisdom comes the knowledge that you should probably be attacking every turn.

Volcanic Potion.name: Volcanic Potion
Volcanic Potion.flavor: The secret ingredient in Kazakus's award-winning chili recipe.

Corrupted Healbot.name: Corrupted Healbot
Corrupted Healbot.text: Deathrattle: Restore 8 Health to the enemy hero.
Corrupted Healbot.flavor: Not so much "corrupted" as "has terrible aim".

Vilespine Slayer.name: Vilespine Slayer
Vilespine Slayer.flavor: 'Cause slayers gonna slay, slay, slay, slay, slay.

DOOM!.name: DOOM!
DOOM!.text: Destroy all minions. Draw a card for each.
DOOM!.flavor: We ran out of space for "DOOOOOOOOOOOM!!!!!"

Dire Wolf Alpha.name: Dire Wolf Alpha
Dire Wolf Alpha.flavor: We are pretty excited about the upcoming release of Dire Wolf Beta, just repost this sign for a chance at a key.

Divine Spirit.name: Divine Spirit
Divine Spirit.flavor: Double the trouble. Double the fun!

Flamecannon.name: Flamecannon
Flamecannon.text: Deal $4 damage to a random enemy minion.
Flamecannon.flavor: Calling something a flamecannon really doesn't do much to distinguish it from other goblin devices.

Free From Amber.name: Free From Amber
Free From Amber.text: Discover a minion that costs (8) or more. Summon it.

Solemn Vigil.name: Solemn Vigil
Solemn Vigil.text: Draw 2 cards. Costs (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
Solemn Vigil.howToEarn: Unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Solemn Vigil.flavor: Each year, folk gather in front of Blackrock Mountain to mourn those who were mind-controlled into the lava.
Solemn Vigil.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Don Han'Cho.name: Don Han'Cho
Don Han'Cho.text: Battlecry: Give a random minion in your hand +5/+5.
Don Han'Cho.flavor: The brilliant mastermind of the Grimy Goons, Han sometimes thinks about ditching the idiot Cho, but that would just tear him apart.

Ragnaros the Firelord.name: Ragnaros the Firelord
Ragnaros the Firelord.text: Can't attack. At the end of your turn, deal 8 damage to a random enemy.
Ragnaros the Firelord.flavor: Ragnaros was summoned by the Dark Iron dwarves, who were eventually enslaved by the Firelord.  Summoning Ragnaros often doesn’t work out the way you want it to.

Youthful Brewmaster.name: Youthful Brewmaster
Youthful Brewmaster.text: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion from the battlefield to your hand.
Youthful Brewmaster.targetingArrowText: Return a minion to your hand.
Youthful Brewmaster.flavor: His youthful enthusiasm doesn’t always equal excellence in his brews.   Don’t drink the Mogu Stout!

Primal Fusion.name: Primal Fusion
Primal Fusion.text: Give a minion +1/+1 for each of your Totems.
Primal Fusion.flavor: Golce and Dabbana have a new line of Earth Totems available at vendors everywhere this holiday season.

Powermace.name: Powermace
Powermace.flavor: People assume that shamans control the elements, but really, they have to ask them stuff and the elements are like, "Yeah ok, sure."

Jade Chieftain.name: Jade Chieftain
Jade Chieftain.flavor: Seeing his Jade Golem grow up into the tall, handsome 6/6 standing before him was the proudest moment of his life.

Bluegill Warrior.name: Bluegill Warrior
Bluegill Warrior.flavor: He just wants a hug.   A sloppy... slimy... hug.

Ancient Brewmaster.name: Ancient Brewmaster
Ancient Brewmaster.text: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion from the battlefield to your hand.
Ancient Brewmaster.targetingArrowText: Return a minion to your hand.
Ancient Brewmaster.flavor: Most pandaren say his brew tastes like yak.  But apparently that's a compliment.

Antique Healbot.name: Antique Healbot
Antique Healbot.flavor: They don't make 'em like they used to! (Because of explosions, mostly.)

Argent Lance.name: Argent Lance
Argent Lance.text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, +1 Durability.
Argent Lance.flavor: The stripes make it look like a candy cane, but we recommend against licking it.

Hex.name: Hex
Hex.text: Transform a minion into a 0/1 Frog with Taunt.
Hex.flavor: If you Hex a Murloc... it really isn't much of a change, is it?

Fencing Coach.name: Fencing Coach
Fencing Coach.text: Battlecry: The next time you use your Hero Power, it costs (2) less.
Fencing Coach.flavor: Good fencers make good neighbors, right?

Dark Peddler.name: Dark Peddler
Dark Peddler.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Dark Peddler.flavor: I'm offering you a bargain here!  This amazing vacuum cleaner for your soul!
Dark Peddler.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Patient Assassin.name: Patient Assassin
Patient Assassin.flavor: He’s not really that patient. It just takes a while for someone to walk by that he can actually reach.

Wyrmrest Agent.name: Wyrmrest Agent
Wyrmrest Agent.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Taunt.
Wyrmrest Agent.flavor: Keeping tabs on the Grand Tournament is priority #1 for the five mighty Dragonflights!

Force-Tank MAX.name: Force-Tank MAX
Force-Tank MAX.flavor: There is a factory in Tanaris for crafting force-tanks, but it only ever made two, because of cost overruns.

Far Sight.name: Far Sight
Far Sight.text: Draw a card. That card costs (3) less.
Far Sight.flavor: Drek'thar can't see, but he can see. You know what I mean? It's ok if you don't.

Recycle.name: Recycle
Recycle.text: Shuffle an enemy minion into your opponent's deck.
Recycle.flavor: Druidic recycling involves putting plastics in one bin and enemy minions in another bin.

Savannah Highmane.name: Savannah Highmane
Savannah Highmane.flavor: In the jungle, the mighty jungle, the lion gets slowly consumed by hyenas.

Tundra Rhino.name: Tundra Rhino
Tundra Rhino.flavor: Tundra rhinos are often mistaken for kodos.  Or am I mistaken?

Imp Gang Boss.name: Imp Gang Boss
Imp Gang Boss.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 1/1 Imp.
Imp Gang Boss.howToEarn: Unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Imp Gang Boss.flavor: His imp gang likes to sneak into Stormwind to spraypaint "Ragnaros Rulez" on the Mage Tower.
Imp Gang Boss.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Argent Squire.name: Argent Squire
Argent Squire.flavor: "I solemnly swear to uphold the Light, purge the world of darkness, and to eat only burritos." - The Argent Dawn Oath

Crystalweaver.name: Crystalweaver
Crystalweaver.flavor: The trick is soaking the crystals in warm milk to soften them up.

Mekgineer Thermaplugg.name: Mekgineer Thermaplugg
Mekgineer Thermaplugg.text: Whenever an enemy minion dies, summon a Leper Gnome.
Mekgineer Thermaplugg.flavor: He was obsessed with explosives until he discovered knitting. Now he yells, “SWEATERS! MORE SWEATERS!”

King Krush.name: King Krush
King Krush.flavor: The best defense against King Krush is to have someone you don’t like standing in front of you.

Recombobulator.name: Recombobulator
Recombobulator.text: Battlecry: Transform a friendly minion into a random minion with the same Cost.
Recombobulator.flavor: For when you didn’t combobulate quite right the first time around.

Magma Rager.name: Magma Rager
Magma Rager.flavor: He likes to think he is powerful, but pretty much anyone can solo Molten Core now.

Cabalist's Tome.name: Cabalist's Tome
Cabalist's Tome.text: Add 3 random Mage spells to your hand.
Cabalist's Tome.flavor: What's in there? I bet it's cookie recipes!

Ethereal Peddler.name: Ethereal Peddler
Ethereal Peddler.text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding any non-Rogue class cards,  reduce their Cost by (2).
Ethereal Peddler.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
Ethereal Peddler.flavor: Yeah, sure. That Ragnaros "fell off the back of a truck".
Ethereal Peddler.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.

Ravaging Ghoul.name: Ravaging Ghoul
Ravaging Ghoul.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all other minions.
Ravaging Ghoul.flavor: But goes by "Ravishing Ghoul" when he hits the club.

Malkorok.name: Malkorok
Malkorok.flavor: Garrosh's best buddy. It's true. Look it up.

Windspeaker.name: Windspeaker
Windspeaker.flavor: Is there anything worse than a Windspeaker with halitosis?

Annoy-o-Tron.name: Annoy-o-Tron
Annoy-o-Tron.flavor: The inventor of the Annoy-o-Tron was immediately expelled from Tinkerschool, Tinkertown, and was eventually exiled from the Eastern Kingdoms altogether.

Sabretooth Stalker.name: Sabretooth Stalker
Sabretooth Stalker.flavor: It's gotten a bit long in the tooth.

Nerubian Egg.name: Nerubian Egg
Nerubian Egg.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Nerubian Egg.flavor: Eggs are a good source of protein and Nerubians.
Nerubian Egg.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Jade Spirit.name: Jade Spirit
Jade Spirit.flavor: "He's so cute!  I just want to squeeze him, then use him for Jade Golem parts!" - Aya Blackpaw

Savage Combatant.name: Savage Combatant
Savage Combatant.text: Inspire: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn.
Savage Combatant.flavor: Maybe if you whistle a tune it will soothe him.  Yeah...  Try that.

Eye for an Eye.name: Eye for an Eye
Eye for an Eye.text: Secret: When your hero takes damage, deal that much damage to the enemy hero.
Eye for an Eye.flavor: Justice sometimes takes the form of a closed fist into a soft cheek.

Light of the Naaru.name: Light of the Naaru
Light of the Naaru.text: Restore #3 Health. If the target is still damaged, summon a Lightwarden.
Light of the Naaru.flavor: "Light it up!" - Command given to both Lightwardens and Goblins holding Flamecannons.

Power Word: Tentacles.name: Power Word: Tentacles
Power Word: Tentacles.flavor: Because you're wrapped in a protective layer of… tentacles?

Anodized Robo Cub.name: Anodized Robo Cub
Anodized Robo Cub.flavor: It's adorable! AND OH MY GOODNESS WHY IS IT EATING MY FACE

Soul of the Forest.name: Soul of the Forest
Soul of the Forest.text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Treant."

Purify.name: Purify
Purify.text: Silence a friendly minion. Draw a card.
Purify.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
Purify.flavor: Even better than a hot shower with vigorous scrubbing!
Purify.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.

Lakkari Felhound.name: Lakkari Felhound
Lakkari Felhound.flavor: Guaranteed to track tar all over your carpet.

Raptor Hatchling.name: Raptor Hatchling
Raptor Hatchling.text: Deathrattle: Shuffle a 4/3 Raptor into your deck.
Raptor Hatchling.flavor: They’re just baby teeth. Lots and lots of baby teeth.

Coldarra Drake.name: Coldarra Drake
Coldarra Drake.text: You can use your Hero Power any number of times.
