Coldarra Drake.flavor: The Grand Tournament has a "No dragons allowed" policy, but it's rarely enforced.

Argent Watchman.name: Argent Watchman
Argent Watchman.text: Can't attack. Inspire: Can attack as normal this turn.
Argent Watchman.flavor: Who argent watches the Argent Watchman?

Mukla's Champion.name: Mukla's Champion
Mukla's Champion.flavor: An elegant gorilla, for a more civilized age.

Drain Life.name: Drain Life
Drain Life.text: Deal $2 damage. Restore #2 Health to your hero.
Drain Life.flavor: "I've just sucked one year of your life away."

Bloodfury Potion.name: Bloodfury Potion
Bloodfury Potion.text:
[x]Give a minion +3 Attack.
If it's a Demon, also
give it +3 Health.
Bloodfury Potion.flavor: You know what really makes my blood boil? The skyrocketing price of Bloodfury potions!

Kabal Songstealer.name: Kabal Songstealer
Kabal Songstealer.flavor: Gadgetzan Writer’s Award goes to the player who writes the most compelling fanfic about why this Arakkoa has a golden frog in his hand!

Armored Warhorse.name: Armored Warhorse
Armored Warhorse.text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, gain Charge.
Armored Warhorse.flavor: Yep.  It's a horse... wearing armor... going to war.

Cho'gall.name: Cho'gall
Cho'gall.text: Battlecry: The next spell you cast this turn costs Health instead of Mana.
Cho'gall.flavor: Even after all this time, Gul'dan still makes Cho'gall go get donuts and coffee.

Curious Glimmerroot.name: Curious Glimmerroot
Curious Glimmerroot.text: [x]Battlecry: Look at 3 cards. Guess which one started in your opponent's deck to get a copy of it.
Curious Glimmerroot.flavor: George promised to be good. But it's easy for little Glimmerroots to forget.

Tiny Knight of Evil.name: Tiny Knight of Evil
Tiny Knight of Evil.text: Whenever you discard a card, gain +1/+1.
Tiny Knight of Evil.flavor: "No, no, no. I asked for a tiny JESTER of evil."

Piloted Shredder.name: Piloted Shredder
Piloted Shredder.flavor: Once upon a time, only goblins piloted shredders. These days, everyone from Doomsayer to Lorewalker Cho seems to ride one.

Mark of the Lotus.name: Mark of the Lotus
Mark of the Lotus.flavor: The mark of the Lotus is a little flower drawn in permanent marker on the ankle.

Guardian of Kings.name: Guardian of Kings
Guardian of Kings.flavor: Holy beings from the beyond are so cliché!

Mounted Raptor.name: Mounted Raptor
Mounted Raptor.howToEarn: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Mounted Raptor.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Jade Swarmer.name: Jade Swarmer
Jade Swarmer.flavor: He's so good at swarming, he can swarm all by himself!

Darkshire Councilman.name: Darkshire Councilman
Darkshire Councilman.text: After you summon a minion, gain +1 Attack.

Twilight Summoner.name: Twilight Summoner
Twilight Summoner.flavor: If you strike him down, he shall become more powerful than you can possibly imagine.

Tar Lurker.name: Tar Lurker
Tar Lurker.text: Taunt Has +3 Attack during your opponent's turn.
Tar Lurker.flavor: Hi, Tar here. Long time lurking, first time taunting…

Silver Hand Regent.name: Silver Hand Regent
Silver Hand Regent.flavor: The Silver Hand is the best paladin organization.  The Argent Crusaders are super jealous.

Oasis Snapjaw.name: Oasis Snapjaw
Oasis Snapjaw.flavor: His dreams of flying and breathing fire like his idol will never be realized.

Baron Rivendare.name: Baron Rivendare
Baron Rivendare.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Baron Rivendare.flavor: There used to be five Horsemen but one of them left because a job opened up in the deadmines and the benefits were better.
Baron Rivendare.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

The Boogeymonster.name: The Boogeymonster
The Boogeymonster.text: Whenever this attacks and kills a minion, gain +2/+2.
The Boogeymonster.flavor: Has 20 years of training in classical ballet, but ALLLLLL he ever gets asked to do is boogie.

Streetwise Investigator.name: Streetwise Investigator
Streetwise Investigator.flavor: "Hmmmm…  Call it a hunch, but I'm starting to think that there may be some kind of criminal activity going on in Gadgetzan."

Reliquary Seeker.name: Reliquary Seeker
Reliquary Seeker.text: Battlecry: If you have 6 other minions, gain +4/+4.
Reliquary Seeker.howToEarn: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Reliquary Seeker.flavor: The Reliquary considers itself the equal of the League of Explorers.  The League of Explorers doesn't.
Reliquary Seeker.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Shattered Sun Cleric.name: Shattered Sun Cleric
Shattered Sun Cleric.flavor: They always have a spare flask of Sunwell Energy Drink™!

Abusive Sergeant.name: Abusive Sergeant
Abusive Sergeant.text: Battlecry: Give a minion +2 Attack this turn.
Abusive Sergeant.flavor: ADD ME TO YOUR DECK, MAGGOT!

Sir Finley Mrrgglton.name: Sir Finley Mrrgglton
Sir Finley Mrrgglton.text: Battlecry: Discover a new basic Hero Power.
Sir Finley Mrrgglton.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Sir Finley Mrrgglton.flavor: In addition to fluent Common, he also speaks fourteen dialects of 'mrgl'.
Sir Finley Mrrgglton.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Sacred Trial.name: Sacred Trial
Sacred Trial.text: Secret: After your opponent has at least 3 minions and plays another, destroy it.
Sacred Trial.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Sacred Trial.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Shadow Word: Pain.name: Shadow Word: Pain
Shadow Word: Pain.text: Destroy a minion with 3 or less Attack.
Shadow Word: Pain.flavor: A step up from a spell cast by many beginning acolytes: "Shadow Word: Annoy".

Defender of Argus.name: Defender of Argus
Defender of Argus.flavor: You wouldn’t think that Argus would need this much defending.  But it does.

Crystalline Oracle.name: Crystalline Oracle
Crystalline Oracle.text: [x]Deathrattle: Copy a card from your opponent's deck  and add it to your hand.
Crystalline Oracle.flavor: Being made of light has its disadvantages, but at least it's always looking on the bright side.

Frost Elemental.name: Frost Elemental
Frost Elemental.flavor: When a Water elemental and an Ice elemental love each other VERY much...

Elise Starseeker.name: Elise Starseeker
Elise Starseeker.text: Battlecry: Shuffle the 'Map to the Golden Monkey' into your deck.
Elise Starseeker.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Elise Starseeker.flavor: A large part of her job entails not mixing up the Map to the Golden Monkey with the Map to Monkey Island.
Elise Starseeker.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Humongous Razorleaf.name: Humongous Razorleaf
Humongous Razorleaf.flavor: Loves goblins.  In a light cream sauce.

Piranha Launcher.name: Piranha Launcher
Piranha Launcher.text:
[x]After your hero attacks,
summon a 1/1 Piranha.
Piranha Launcher.flavor: A great improvement over the guppy launcher.

Red Mana Wyrm.name: Red Mana Wyrm
Red Mana Wyrm.text: Whenever  you cast a spell, gain +2 Attack.
Red Mana Wyrm.flavor: It has double the Attack.  "Go on."  And double the Health.  "Yes??"  And its trigger has twice the effect.  "WHAT???"  And it costs…  Five times more.

Dr. Boom.name: Dr. Boom
Dr. Boom.text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Boom Bots. WARNING: Bots may explode.

Eldritch Horror.name: Eldritch Horror
Eldritch Horror.flavor: Often wonders what path his life might have taken if he wasn't named, you know, "Eldritch Horror".

Bloodbloom.name: Bloodbloom
Bloodbloom.text: The next spell you cast this turn costs Health instead of Mana.
Bloodbloom.flavor: Help save mana.  Donate blood today!

Screwjank Clunker.name: Screwjank Clunker
Screwjank Clunker.flavor: If it breaks, just kick it a couple of times while yelling "Durn thing!"

Keeper of Uldaman.name: Keeper of Uldaman
Keeper of Uldaman.text: Battlecry: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 3.
Keeper of Uldaman.howToEarn: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Keeper of Uldaman.flavor: U da man!  No, U da man!
Keeper of Uldaman.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Powershot.name: Powershot
Powershot.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion and the minions next to it.

Power Overwhelming.name: Power Overwhelming
Power Overwhelming.text: Give a friendly minion +4/+4 until end of turn. Then, it dies. Horribly.
Power Overwhelming.flavor: We cannot even describe how horrible the death is.  It's CRAZY bad!  Maybe worse than that.  Just don't do it.

Revenge.name: Revenge
Revenge.text: Deal $1 damage to all minions. If you have 12 or less Health, deal $3 damage instead.
Revenge.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Revenge.flavor: This is better than Arcane Explosion, so I guess warriors are finally getting revenge on mages for Mortal Strike being worse than Fireball.
Revenge.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Silverback Patriarch.name: Silverback Patriarch
Silverback Patriarch.flavor: He likes to act like he's in charge, but the silverback matriarch actually runs things.

Genzo, the Shark.name: Genzo, the Shark
Genzo, the Shark.text: Whenever this attacks, both players draw until they have 3 cards.
Genzo, the Shark.flavor: Infamous in the seedy underground card rooms of Gadgetzan, he got his nickname winning the coveted Shark Plushie in the city's first Hearthstone tournament.

Misdirection.name: Misdirection
Misdirection.text: Secret: When an enemy attacks your hero, instead it attacks another random character.
Misdirection.flavor: Sometimes it's as simple as putting on a fake mustache and pointing at someone else.

Squirming Tentacle.name: Squirming Tentacle
Squirming Tentacle.flavor: Yeah, I think we can agree that killing the squirming tentacle first is a good idea.

Forbidden Ritual.name: Forbidden Ritual
Forbidden Ritual.text: Spend all your Mana. Summon that many 1/1 Tentacles.
Forbidden Ritual.flavor: Actually, C'Thun gives his full support for this ritual.

Ancient Shade.name: Ancient Shade
Ancient Shade.text: Battlecry: Shuffle an 'Ancient Curse' into your deck that deals 7 damage to you when drawn.
Ancient Shade.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Ancient Shade.flavor: Warning: Do not expose to direct sunlight.
Ancient Shade.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Seal of Light.name: Seal of Light
Seal of Light.text: Restore #4 Health to your hero and gain +2 Attack this turn.
Seal of Light.flavor: The walrus of Light restores EIGHT Health.

Grimestreet Outfitter.name: Grimestreet Outfitter
Grimestreet Outfitter.text: Battlecry: Give all minions in your hand +1/+1.
Grimestreet Outfitter.flavor: If you bargain hard, he'll throw in the hat.

Tirion Fordring.name: Tirion Fordring
Tirion Fordring.flavor: If you haven't heard the Tirion Fordring theme song, it's because it doesn't exist.

Ice Barrier.name: Ice Barrier
Ice Barrier.text: Secret: When your hero is attacked, gain 8 Armor.
Ice Barrier.flavor: This is Rank 1.  Rank 2 is Chocolate Milk Barrier.

Ancient Shieldbearer.name: Ancient Shieldbearer
Ancient Shieldbearer.text: Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, gain 10 Armor.
Ancient Shieldbearer.flavor: Back in her day, each shield weighed two tons and she had to carry four of them on each arm!

Spikeridged Steed.name: Spikeridged Steed
Spikeridged Steed.text: Give a minion +2/+6 and Taunt. When it dies, summon a Stegodon.

Moonfire.name: Moonfire
Moonfire.flavor: "Cast Moonfire, and never stop." - How to Be a Druid, Chapter 5, Section 3

Second-Rate Bruiser.name: Second-Rate Bruiser
Second-Rate Bruiser.text: [x]Taunt Costs (2) less if your opponent has at least three minions.
Second-Rate Bruiser.flavor: He'll be a first-rate bruiser once he gets used to his contacts.

Preparation.name: Preparation
Preparation.text: The next spell you cast this turn costs (3) less.

Verdant Longneck.name: Verdant Longneck
Verdant Longneck.flavor: Always sticking its neck into other people’s business.

Tomb Spider.name: Tomb Spider
Tomb Spider.howToEarn: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Tomb Spider.flavor: Less serious than its cousin, the Grave Spider.
Tomb Spider.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Wolfrider.name: Wolfrider
Wolfrider.flavor: Orcish raiders ride wolves because they are well adapted to harsh environments, and because they are soft and cuddly.

Silverware Golem.name: Silverware Golem
Silverware Golem.text: If you discard this minion, summon it.
Silverware Golem.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
Silverware Golem.flavor: From the secret research labs of the Swiss Army.
Silverware Golem.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.

Shadow Word: Horror.name: Shadow Word: Horror
Shadow Word: Horror.text: Destroy all minions with 2 or less Attack.
Shadow Word: Horror.flavor: It's more succinct than "Shadow Word: Suck Into Vortex."

Master Jouster.name: Master Jouster
Master Jouster.text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, gain Taunt and Divine Shield.
Master Jouster.flavor: Needs just a few more ratings points to become Grandmaster Jouster.

Cobalt Guardian.name: Cobalt Guardian
Cobalt Guardian.text: Whenever you summon a Mech, gain Divine Shield.
Cobalt Guardian.flavor: Guardians used to be built out of Adamantium, but production got moved to Gadgetzan and Cobalt was cheap.

Molten Blade.name: Molten Blade
Molten Blade.text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a new weapon.
Molten Blade.flavor: It’s a sword! It’s a knife! It’s a swizzle-stick!

Inkmaster Solia.name: Inkmaster Solia
Inkmaster Solia.text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, the next spell you cast this turn costs (0).
Inkmaster Solia.flavor: Solia marks the Kabal with intricate tattoos that grant immense power. Also it makes it harder for other gangs to recruit from their numbers. BACK OFF, GOONS.

Steamwheedle Sniper.name: Steamwheedle Sniper
Steamwheedle Sniper.text: Your Hero Power can target minions.
Steamwheedle Sniper.flavor: Goblins seldom have the patience for sniping. Most prefer lobbing explosives.

The Voraxx.name: The Voraxx
The Voraxx.text:
[x]After you cast a spell on
this minion, summon a
1/1 Plant and cast
another copy on it.
The Voraxx.flavor: I am the Voraxx.  I speak for the weeds.

Dalaran Aspirant.name: Dalaran Aspirant
Dalaran Aspirant.flavor: Is he aspiring or inspiring?  Make up your mind!

Brann Bronzebeard.name: Brann Bronzebeard
Brann Bronzebeard.howToEarn: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Brann Bronzebeard.flavor: Contains 75% more fiber than his brother Magni!
Brann Bronzebeard.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Naturalize.name: Naturalize
Naturalize.text:
Destroy a minion.
Your opponent draws 2 cards.

Dispatch Kodo.name: Dispatch Kodo
Dispatch Kodo.text: Battlecry: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack.
Dispatch Kodo.flavor: "Crime reported at First Bank of Gadgetzan.  Huge quantities of Jade being carried away by what looks like a bunch of Hozen.  Kodo 77 can you make it over there now?"

Naga Sea Witch.name: Naga Sea Witch
Naga Sea Witch.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Naga Sea Witch.flavor: If she had studied harder, she would have been a C+ witch.
Naga Sea Witch.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Grimy Gadgeteer.name: Grimy Gadgeteer
Grimy Gadgeteer.text: At the end of your turn, give a random minion in your hand +2/+2.
Grimy Gadgeteer.flavor: "You look like a Gadgetgun 3000-Mark IV man, am I right?"

Nightblade.name: Nightblade
Nightblade.flavor: Your face is the place you'd probably least like a dagger, and where rogues are most likely to deliver them.

Arcane Blast.name: Arcane Blast
Arcane Blast.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. This spell gets double bonus from Spell Damage.

Summoning Portal.name: Summoning Portal
Summoning Portal.text: Your minions cost (2) less, but not less than (1).
Summoning Portal.flavor: NOT LESS THAN 1!  Don't get any ideas!

Razorfen Hunter.name: Razorfen Hunter
Razorfen Hunter.flavor: Someone did mess with Tuskerr once.  ONCE.

Potion of Madness.name: Potion of Madness
Potion of Madness.text: Gain control of an enemy minion with 2 or less Attack until end of turn.
Potion of Madness.flavor: You'd be insane NOT to drink it!

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If it survives, draw a card.
Slam.flavor: "Dun da dun, dun da dun": if you've heard an ogre sing this, it's too late.

Orgrimmar Aspirant.name: Orgrimmar Aspirant
Orgrimmar Aspirant.flavor: "Four out of three orcs struggle with math." - Angry Zurge

Naga Corsair.name: Naga Corsair
Naga Corsair.flavor: Hook-tails are nice and all but she keeps getting stuck on things.

Chittering Tunneler.name: Chittering Tunneler
Chittering Tunneler.text: Battlecry: Discover a spell. Deal damage to your hero equal to its Cost.
Chittering Tunneler.flavor: Ear to the ground, he carefully interpreted the chittering noises: “You wanna cast a spell? I wanna cast a spell!”

Mind Control Tech.name: Mind Control Tech
Mind Control Tech.text: [x]Battlecry: If your opponent has 4 or more minions, take control of one at random.
Mind Control Tech.flavor: Mind Control technology is getting better, but that's not saying much.

Mulch.name: Mulch
Mulch.text:
Destroy a minion.
Add a random minion to your opponent's hand.
Mulch.flavor: Is this a noun or a verb?  We will never know.

Death's Bite.name: Death's Bite
Death's Bite.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Death's Bite.flavor: "Take a bite outta Death." - McScruff the Deathlord
Death's Bite.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Dark Cultist.name: Dark Cultist
Dark Cultist.text: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion +3 Health.
Dark Cultist.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Dark Cultist.flavor: The Cult of the Damned has found it's best not to mention their name when recruiting new cultists.
Dark Cultist.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Thunder Lizard.name: Thunder Lizard
Thunder Lizard.text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, Adapt.

Fen Creeper.name: Fen Creeper
Fen Creeper.flavor: He used to be called Bog Beast, but it confused people because he wasn't an actual beast.   Boom, New Name!

Earthen Ring Farseer.name: Earthen Ring Farseer
Earthen Ring Farseer.flavor: He can see really far, and he doesn't use a telescope like those filthy pirates.

Infested Tauren.name: Infested Tauren
Infested Tauren.flavor: The Overmind and the Old Gods are surprisingly similar.

Tomb Pillager.name: Tomb Pillager
Tomb Pillager.text: Deathrattle: Add a Coin to your hand.
Tomb Pillager.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Tomb Pillager.flavor: After the guild broke up, he could no longer raid the tombs.
Tomb Pillager.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Alexstrasza.name: Alexstrasza
Alexstrasza.text: Battlecry: Set a hero's remaining Health to 15.
Alexstrasza.flavor: Alexstrasza the Life-Binder brings life and hope to everyone.  Except Deathwing.  And Malygos.  And Nekros.

Huge Toad.name: Huge Toad
Huge Toad.text: Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
Huge Toad.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Huge Toad.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Mana Addict.name: Mana Addict
Mana Addict.text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +2 Attack this turn.
Mana Addict.flavor: She’s trying to kick the habit, but still takes some mana whenever she has a stressful day.

Getaway Kodo.name: Getaway Kodo
Getaway Kodo.text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, return it to your hand.

Ravenholdt Assassin.name: Ravenholdt Assassin
Ravenholdt Assassin.flavor: Just mail him a package with a name and 10,000 gold.  He'll take care of the rest.

Ogre Warmaul.name: Ogre Warmaul
Ogre Warmaul.text: 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
Ogre Warmaul.flavor: Simple, misguided, and incredibly dangerous. You know, like most things ogre.

Call of the Wild.name: Call of the Wild
Call of the Wild.flavor: "Hello. Misha, Leokk and Huffer aren't here right now, but if you leave a message we'll get back to you right away." BEEP.

Hungry Dragon.name: Hungry Dragon
Hungry Dragon.text: Battlecry: Summon a random 1-Cost minion for your opponent.
Hungry Dragon.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Hungry Dragon.flavor: Hungry Hungry Dragon is NOT a fun game.
Hungry Dragon.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Deathwing.name: Deathwing
Deathwing.text: Battlecry: Destroy all other minions and discard your hand.
Deathwing.flavor: Once a noble dragon known as Neltharion, Deathwing lost his mind and shattered Azeroth before finally being defeated.  Daddy issues?

Psych-o-Tron.name: Psych-o-Tron
Psych-o-Tron.flavor: "Annoyinger-o-Tron" was just too unwieldy. And accurate.

Sabotage.name: Sabotage
Sabotage.text: Destroy a random enemy minion. Combo: And your opponent's weapon.
Sabotage.flavor: Rogues can't stand it. They know you planned it! They are going to set you straight!

Cairne Bloodhoof.name: Cairne Bloodhoof
Cairne Bloodhoof.flavor: Cairne was killed by Garrosh, so... don't put this guy in a Warrior deck.  It's pretty insensitive.

Scarlet Crusader.name: Scarlet Crusader
Scarlet Crusader.flavor: Never wash your whites with a Scarlet Crusader.

Mountain Giant.name: Mountain Giant
Mountain Giant.text: Costs (1) less for each other card in your hand.
Mountain Giant.flavor: His mother said that he was just big boned.

Flame Geyser.name: Flame Geyser
Flame Geyser.text:
Deal $2 damage.
Add a 1/2 Elemental to your hand.

Gorehowl.name: Gorehowl
Gorehowl.text: Attacking a minion costs 1 Attack instead of 1 Durability.
Gorehowl.flavor: Grommash Hellscream's famous axe.  Somehow this ended up in Prince Malchezaar's possession.  Quite the mystery!

Upgrade!.name: Upgrade!
Upgrade!.text: If you have a weapon, give it +1/+1. Otherwise equip a 1/3 weapon.

Bolvar Fordragon.name: Bolvar Fordragon
Bolvar Fordragon.text: Whenever a friendly minion dies while this is in your hand, gain +1 Attack.
Bolvar Fordragon.flavor: Spoiler alert: Bolvar gets melted and then sits on an ice throne and everyone forgets about him.

Eydis Darkbane.name: Eydis Darkbane
Eydis Darkbane.text: Whenever you target this minion with a spell, deal 3 damage to a random enemy.

Charged Hammer.name: Charged Hammer
Charged Hammer.flavor: You can only pick it up if you are worthy.

Drakonid Crusher.name: Drakonid Crusher
Drakonid Crusher.text: Battlecry: If your opponent has 15 or less Health, gain +3/+3.
Drakonid Crusher.howToEarn: Unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Drakonid Crusher.flavor: Drakonids were created to have all the bad parts of a dragon in the form of a humanoid. But, like, why?
Drakonid Crusher.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.text: Give your hero +4 Attack this turn and 4 Armor.

Frostwolf Warlord.name: Frostwolf Warlord
Frostwolf Warlord.text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each other friendly minion on the battlefield.
Frostwolf Warlord.flavor: The Frostwolves are locked in combat with the Stormpike Expedition over control of Alterac Valley.  Every attempt at peace-talks has ended with Captain Galvangar killing the mediator.

Enchanted Raven.name: Enchanted Raven
Enchanted Raven.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Prologue, in One Night in Karazhan.
Enchanted Raven.flavor: Once upon a midnight restive, Medivh pondered, feeling festive!
Enchanted Raven.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Prologue, in One Night in Karazhan.

Secretkeeper.name: Secretkeeper
Secretkeeper.flavor: She promises not to tell anyone about that thing you did last night with that one person.

Reincarnate.name: Reincarnate
Reincarnate.text: Destroy a minion, then return it to life with full Health.
Reincarnate.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Reincarnate.flavor: It's like birth, except you're an adult and you were just dead a second ago.
Reincarnate.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Wobbling Runts.name: Wobbling Runts
Wobbling Runts.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Wobbling Runts.flavor: The fourth one fell off in a tragic accident.  They don't talk about it.
Wobbling Runts.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Yogg-Saron, Hope's End.name: Yogg-Saron, Hope's End
Yogg-Saron, Hope's End.text: Battlecry: Cast a random spell for each spell you've cast this game (targets chosen randomly).
Yogg-Saron, Hope's End.flavor: I spell your doom... Y-O-U-R D-O-O-M!

Faceless Behemoth.name: Faceless Behemoth
Faceless Behemoth.flavor: Rejected names: Forty-Foot Faceless, Big ol' No-face, Huge Creature Sans Face, Teddy.

Aya Blackpaw.name: Aya Blackpaw
Aya Blackpaw.flavor: Though young, Aya took over as the leader of Jade Lotus through her charisma and strategic acumen when her predecessor was accidentally crushed by a jade golem.

Old Murk-Eye.name: Old Murk-Eye
Old Murk-Eye.text: Charge. Has +1 Attack for each other Murloc on the battlefield.
Old Murk-Eye.howToEarn: Unlocked when you have all the Murlocs from the Classic Set.
Old Murk-Eye.flavor: He's a legend among murlocs.  "Mrghllghghllghg!", they say.
Old Murk-Eye.howToEarnGolden: Unlocked when you have all the Golden Murlocs from the Expert and Basic Sets.

The Caverns Below.name: The Caverns Below
The Caverns Below.text: [x]Quest: Play four minions with the same name. Reward: Crystal Core.
The Caverns Below.flavor: Why can't it ever be The Taverns Below?

Tracking.name: Tracking
Tracking.text: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Draw one and discard the others.
Tracking.flavor: For the person who just cannot decide what card to put into a deck!

Jungle Moonkin.name: Jungle Moonkin
Jungle Moonkin.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Jungle Moonkin.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Lotus Illusionist.name: Lotus Illusionist
Lotus Illusionist.text:
[x]After this minion attacks
a hero, transform it into a
 random 6-Cost minion.
Lotus Illusionist.flavor: If you think her Illidan and Sylvanas cosplay is great, wait till you see her Reno Jackson!

Spellbreaker.name: Spellbreaker
Spellbreaker.flavor: Spellbreakers can rip enchantments from magic-wielders.  The process is painless and can be performed on an outpatient basis.

Shield Slam.name: Shield Slam
Shield Slam.text: Deal 1 damage to a minion for each Armor you have.
Shield Slam.flavor: "What is a better weapon? The sharp one your enemies expect, or the blunt one they ignore?" - The Art of Warrior, Chapter 9

Northshire Cleric.name: Northshire Cleric
Northshire Cleric.text: Whenever a minion is healed, draw a card.
Northshire Cleric.flavor: They help the downtrodden and distressed.  Also they sell cookies.

Kor'kron Elite.name: Kor'kron Elite
Kor'kron Elite.flavor: The Kor'kron are the elite forces of Garrosh Hellscream. Let's just say you don't want to run into these guys while wearing a blue tabard.

Possessed Villager.name: Possessed Villager
Possessed Villager.flavor: It's like a pinata! A lame disgusting horrific pinata.

Public Defender.name: Public Defender
Public Defender.flavor: Happy to defend any public offender!

Feral Spirit.name: Feral Spirit
Feral Spirit.flavor: Spirit wolves are like regular wolves with pom-poms.

Ancestor's Call.name: Ancestor's Call
Ancestor's Call.text: Put a random minion from each player's hand into the battlefield.

Volcano.name: Volcano
Volcano.text: Deal $15 damage randomly split among all minions. Overload: (2)
Volcano.flavor: Many young shaman summon a volcano as their first school project.

Usher of Souls.name: Usher of Souls
Usher of Souls.text: Whenever a friendly minion dies, give your C'Thun +1/+1 (wherever it is).
Usher of Souls.flavor: Nothing unburdens your soul like a good ushing!

Evolving Spores.name: Evolving Spores
Evolving Spores.flavor: The most powerful mushrooms are commonly found in boxes marked with "?".

Thoughtsteal.name: Thoughtsteal
Thoughtsteal.text: Copy 2 cards in your opponent's deck and add them to your hand.
Thoughtsteal.flavor: "What do you get when you cast Thoughtsteal on an Orc?  Nothing!" - Tauren joke

Gnomeregan Infantry.name: Gnomeregan Infantry
Gnomeregan Infantry.flavor: The gnomes are valiant and ready to return to their irradiated, poorly ventilated homeland!

Dart Trap.name: Dart Trap
Dart Trap.text: Secret: After an opposing Hero Power is used, deal $5 damage to a random enemy.
Dart Trap.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Dart Trap.flavor: Five years of tap-dancing lessons are FINALLY going to pay off!
Dart Trap.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Fel Cannon.name: Fel Cannon
Fel Cannon.text: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to a non-Mech minion.
Fel Cannon.flavor: The box says, "New and improved, with 200% more fel!"

Blade of C'Thun.name: Blade of C'Thun
Blade of C'Thun.text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion. Add its Attack and Health to your C'Thun's (wherever it is).
Blade of C'Thun.flavor: C'Thun demands a sacrifice! Preferably a Deathwing.

Druid of the Flame.name: Druid of the Flame
Druid of the Flame.text: Choose One - Transform into a 5/2 minion; or a 2/5 minion.
Druid of the Flame.howToEarn: Unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Druid of the Flame.flavor: Druids who fought too long in Northrend were easily seduced by Ragnaros; a mug of hot chocolate was generally all it took.
Druid of the Flame.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Effigy.name: Effigy
Effigy.text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, summon a random minion with the same Cost.

Stegodon.name: Stegodon
Stegodon.flavor: Level 40 Tortollan Paladins quest to tame a Stegodon.  There are no level 41 Tortollan Paladins.

Multi-Shot.name: Multi-Shot
Multi-Shot.text: Deal $3 damage to two random enemy minions.

Frost Giant.name: Frost Giant
Frost Giant.text: Costs (1) less for each time you used your Hero Power this game.
Frost Giant.flavor: Don't ask him about the beard.  JUST DON'T.

Alley Armorsmith.name: Alley Armorsmith
Alley Armorsmith.text: [x]Taunt Whenever this minion deals damage, gain that much Armor.
Alley Armorsmith.flavor: The rent is cheap and she passes the savings onto YOU!

Shadowboxer.name: Shadowboxer
Shadowboxer.text: Whenever a character is healed, deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
Shadowboxer.flavor: Punching is its primary function. Also, its secondary function.

Elise the Trailblazer.name: Elise the Trailblazer
Elise the Trailblazer.text: Battlecry: Shuffle a sealed Un'Goro pack into your deck.
Elise the Trailblazer.flavor: Reno taught her that blazing her own trail is a lot more fun than following someone else's map.

Young Priestess.name: Young Priestess
Young Priestess.text: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Health.
Young Priestess.flavor: She can't wait to learn Power Word: Fortitude Rank 2.

Hobart Grapplehammer.name: Hobart Grapplehammer
Hobart Grapplehammer.text: Battlecry: Give all weapons in your hand and deck +1 Attack.
Hobart Grapplehammer.flavor: Grapplehammer is the horrible mind behind the Automatic Piranha Launcher (banned in 7 districts)!

Blessing of Might.name: Blessing of Might
Blessing of Might.flavor: "As in, you MIGHT want to get out of my way." - Toad Mackle, recently buffed.

Priest of the Feast.name: Priest of the Feast
Priest of the Feast.text:
Whenever you cast a spell, restore 3 Health to
your hero.
Priest of the Feast.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
Priest of the Feast.flavor: Now that's a world champion cheesecake!
Priest of the Feast.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.

Sherazin, Corpse Flower.name: Sherazin, Corpse Flower
Sherazin, Corpse Flower.text: Deathrattle: Go dormant. Play 4 cards in a turn to revive this minion.

Big-Time Racketeer.name: Big-Time Racketeer
Big-Time Racketeer.flavor: "It'd be a shame if someone disenchanted those Legendaries."

Nesting Roc.name: Nesting Roc
Nesting Roc.text: Battlecry: If you control at least 2 other minions, gain Taunt.
Nesting Roc.flavor: Roc eggs are great in omelettes, sandwiches, and as bait to turn poachers into bird food.

Grimestreet Protector.name: Grimestreet Protector
Grimestreet Protector.flavor: Some new asphalt should do the trick.

Demented Frostcaller.name: Demented Frostcaller
Demented Frostcaller.text: After you cast a spell, Freeze a random enemy.
Demented Frostcaller.flavor: He prefers that you refer to him by his nickname: 'Frostwaker.'

Blood To Ichor.name: Blood To Ichor
Blood To Ichor.text: Deal $1 damage to a minion. If it survives, summon a 2/2 Slime.
Blood To Ichor.flavor: For his next trick, he turns the ichor back to blood and stuffs it back in you.

Living Mana.name: Living Mana
Living Mana.text: Transform your Mana Crystals into 2/2 minions. Recover the mana when they die.
Living Mana.flavor: If you truly love your mana, set it free.

Validated Doomsayer.name: Validated Doomsayer
Validated Doomsayer.text: At the start of your turn, set this minion's Attack to 7.
Validated Doomsayer.flavor: Really feels good about himself and is in a much better place now. But… he sure does miss piloting those shredders.

Jade Blossom.name: Jade Blossom
Jade Blossom.collectionText: Summon a Jade Golem. Gain an empty Mana Crystal.
Jade Blossom.text: Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem. Gain an empty Mana Crystal.
Jade Blossom.flavor: Meditating under a jade blossom is said to grant you wisdom, unless you have a pollen allergy.

Shadow Sensei.name: Shadow Sensei
Shadow Sensei.flavor: He used to be Aya's tutor, but she fired him for bugging her too much.

Feugen.name: Feugen
Feugen.text: Deathrattle: If Stalagg also died this game, summon Thaddius.
Feugen.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Feugen.flavor: Feugen is sad because everyone likes Stalagg better.
Feugen.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Abomination.name: Abomination
Abomination.flavor: Abominations enjoy Fresh Meat and long walks on the beach.

Baron Geddon.name: Baron Geddon
Baron Geddon.text: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to ALL other characters.
Baron Geddon.flavor: Baron Geddon was Ragnaros's foremost lieutenant, until he got FIRED.

Everyfin is Awesome.name: Everyfin is Awesome
Everyfin is Awesome.text:
Give your minions +2/+2.
Costs (1) less for each Murloc you control.
Everyfin is Awesome.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Everyfin is Awesome.flavor: Everyfin is cool when you're part of a murloc team!
Everyfin is Awesome.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Questing Adventurer.name: Questing Adventurer
Questing Adventurer.text: Whenever you play a card, gain +1/+1.
Questing Adventurer.flavor: "Does anyone have some extra Boar Pelts?"

Swashburglar.name: Swashburglar
Swashburglar.text: Battlecry: Add a random class card to your hand (from your opponent's class).
Swashburglar.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
Swashburglar.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.

Jinyu Waterspeaker.name: Jinyu Waterspeaker
Jinyu Waterspeaker.flavor: Waterspeakers can tell the future! So the Jade Lotus employs them to speculate on the Auction House.

Princess Huhuran.name: Princess Huhuran
Princess Huhuran.flavor: She flitters around Ahn'Qiraj dreaming of the day she will meet a sweet prince, whom she can lay thousands of eggs with.

Sinister Strike.name: Sinister Strike
Sinister Strike.text: Deal $3 damage to the enemy hero.
Sinister Strike.flavor: There's something about this strike that just feels off.  Sinister, even.

Tar Lord.name: Tar Lord
Tar Lord.text: Taunt Has +4 Attack during your opponent’s turn.
Tar Lord.flavor: Tar Lord, man... legendary monster? Aw, forget it.

Mistress of Pain.name: Mistress of Pain
Mistress of Pain.text: Damage dealt by this minion also heals your hero.
Mistress of Pain.flavor: Her sister is the Mistress of Pane who sells windows and shower doors.

Shielded Minibot.name: Shielded Minibot
Shielded Minibot.flavor: He chooses to believe what he is programmed to believe!

Call in the Finishers.name: Call in the Finishers
Call in the Finishers.flavor: When you really need a job done… but you don't really care if it gets done right.

Gruul.name: Gruul
Gruul.text: At the end of each turn, gain +1/+1 .
Gruul.flavor: He's Gruul "the Dragonkiller".  He just wanted to cuddle them… he never meant to…

Shaku, the Collector.name: Shaku, the Collector
Shaku, the Collector.text: [x]Stealth. Whenever this attacks, add a random card to your hand (from your opponent's class).
Shaku, the Collector.flavor: Aya even staged an intervention once, but Shaku still insists that he is not a hoarder.

Wrathion.name: Wrathion
Wrathion.text: Taunt. Battlecry: Draw cards until you draw one that isn't a Dragon.
Wrathion.flavor: Wrathion, son of Deathwing, is a dragon.  Why isn't he tagged as a dragon, you ask?  WHAT, ARE YOU TRYING TO BLOW HIS COVER??

Kun the Forgotten King.name: Kun the Forgotten King
Kun the Forgotten King.text: Choose One - Gain 10 Armor; or Refresh your Mana Crystals.
Kun the Forgotten King.flavor: Aya siphons a bit of Kun's soul to animate each golem in her Jade army. To his credit, he's being a great sport about it.

Eadric the Pure.name: Eadric the Pure
Eadric the Pure.text: Battlecry: Change all enemy minions' Attack to 1.
Eadric the Pure.flavor: Nobody rocks a monocle like Eadric.

Repentance.name: Repentance
Repentance.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, reduce its Health to 1.
Repentance.flavor: Repentance often comes in the moment before obliteration. Curious.

Trade Prince Gallywix.name: Trade Prince Gallywix
Trade Prince Gallywix.text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, gain a copy of it and give them a Coin.
Trade Prince Gallywix.flavor: Gallywix believes in supply and demand. He supplies the beatings and demands you pay up!

Kill Command.name: Kill Command
Kill Command.text:
Deal $3 damage. If you control a Beast, deal
$5 damage instead.

Primalfin Totem.name: Primalfin Totem
Primalfin Totem.text: At the end of your turn, summon a 1/1 Murloc.
Primalfin Totem.flavor: Emits a sound only murlocs can hear, which is good because it’s REALLY annoying.

Mechanical Yeti.name: Mechanical Yeti
Mechanical Yeti.flavor: The yetis of Chillwind Point are a source of both inspiration and savage beatings.

Flying Machine.name: Flying Machine
Flying Machine.flavor: To operate, this contraption needs a hula doll on the dashboard. Otherwise it's just a “falling machine.”

Faceless Shambler.name: Faceless Shambler
Faceless Shambler.text: Taunt Battlecry: Copy a friendly minion's Attack and Health.
Faceless Shambler.flavor: "What is that thing?!" "I'm not sure, but it seems to be sort of Ysera shaped."

Vanish.name: Vanish
Vanish.text: Return all minions to their owner's hand.

Divine Strength.name: Divine Strength
Divine Strength.flavor: Every year a few paladins get disqualified from the Westfall weight lifting championship for using Divine Strength.

Tentacles for Arms.name: Tentacles for Arms
Tentacles for Arms.flavor: That's right. Garrosh just slapped you to death with a tentacle.

Wild Pyromancer.name: Wild Pyromancer
Wild Pyromancer.text: After you cast a spell, deal 1 damage to ALL minions.
Wild Pyromancer.flavor: BOOM BABY BOOM!  BAD IS GOOD!  DOWN WITH GOVERNMENT!

Frigid Snobold.name: Frigid Snobold
Frigid Snobold.flavor: Ironically, the natural enemy of the snobold is THE CANDLE.

Brave Archer.name: Brave Archer
Brave Archer.text: Inspire: If your hand is empty, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.

Nerubian Prophet.name: Nerubian Prophet
Nerubian Prophet.text:
At the start of your turn, reduce this card's
Cost by (1).

Clockwork Giant.name: Clockwork Giant
Clockwork Giant.text: Costs (1) less for each card in your opponent's hand.
Clockwork Giant.flavor: He and Mountain Giant don't get along.

Mana Tide Totem.name: Mana Tide Totem
Mana Tide Totem.text: At the end of your turn, draw a card.
Mana Tide Totem.flavor: It is said that some shaman can say "Floatin' totem" 10 times, fast.

Savagery.name: Savagery
Savagery.text: Deal damage equal to your hero's Attack to a minion.
Savagery.flavor: It is true that some druids are savage, but others still enjoy a quiet moment and a spot of tea.

Coghammer.name: Coghammer
Coghammer.text: Battlecry: Give a random friendly minion Divine Shield and Taunt.
Coghammer.flavor: So you ripped this out of a machine, carved some runes on it, stuck it on a handle, and now it's a weapon of great divine power? Seems legit.

Mark of Nature.name: Mark of Nature
Mark of Nature.text: Choose One - Give a minion +4 Attack; or +4 Health and Taunt.
Mark of Nature.flavor: Druids call it the "Mark of Nature."  Everyone else calls it "needing a bath."

Conceal.name: Conceal
Conceal.text: Give your minions Stealth until your next turn.
Conceal.flavor: Rogues conceal everything but their emotions.  You can't get 'em to shut up about feelings.

Flare.name: Flare
Flare.text: All minions lose Stealth. Destroy all enemy Secrets. Draw a card.
Flare.flavor: Not only does it reveal your enemies, but it's also great for parties!

Wind-up Burglebot.name: Wind-up Burglebot
Wind-up Burglebot.text: Whenever this attacks a minion and survives, draw a card.
Wind-up Burglebot.flavor: Don't blame the bot for his crimes...  Blame whoever keeps winding him up!

Core Rager.name: Core Rager
Core Rager.text: Battlecry: If your hand is empty, gain +3/+3.
Core Rager.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Core Rager.flavor: It takes a special kind of hunter to venture deep into a firey lava pit and convince a monster who lives there to come home and be a cuddly housepet.
Core Rager.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Healing Wave.name: Healing Wave
Healing Wave.text: Restore #7 Health. Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, Restore #14 instead.
Healing Wave.flavor: Favored by shaman who study the art of restoration and healing, this spell would feel smug, if it had feelings.

Gluttonous Ooze.name: Gluttonous Ooze
Gluttonous Ooze.text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon and gain Armor equal to its Attack.
Gluttonous Ooze.flavor: Three time winner of the Un'Goro weapon eating contest.

Wee Spellstopper.name: Wee Spellstopper
Wee Spellstopper.text: Adjacent minions can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
Wee Spellstopper.flavor: Bane of spellcasters and spelling bees everywhere.

Trogg Beastrager.name: Trogg Beastrager
Trogg Beastrager.text: Battlecry: Give a random Beast in your hand +1/+1.
Trogg Beastrager.flavor: Still angry that the Gadgetzan Rager Club wouldn't accept him as a member.

Floating Watcher.name: Floating Watcher
Floating Watcher.text: Whenever your hero takes damage on your turn, gain +2/+2.
Floating Watcher.flavor: "Evil Eye Watcher of Doom" was the original name, but marketing felt it was a bit too aggressive.

Twilight Whelp.name: Twilight Whelp
Twilight Whelp.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +2 Health.
Twilight Whelp.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Twilight Whelp.flavor: The twilight whelps are basically magic-vampires. Despite this, they are not a reference to any popular series of novels.
Twilight Whelp.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Cryomancer.name: Cryomancer
Cryomancer.flavor: She loves Frozen. I mean who doesn't?

Mogor's Champion.name: Mogor's Champion
Mogor's Champion.text: 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
Mogor's Champion.flavor: This champion has learned from the best.  Except for his target selection.

Master of Disguise.name: Master of Disguise
Master of Disguise.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Stealth until your next turn.
Master of Disguise.flavor: She's actually a male tauren.  People don't call him "Master of Disguise" for nothing.

Brass Knuckles.name: Brass Knuckles
Brass Knuckles.text:
[x]After your hero attacks,
give a random minion in
your hand +1/+1.
Brass Knuckles.flavor: For the goon that wants to make a fashion statement.

Power Word: Shield.name: Power Word: Shield
Power Word: Shield.text:
Give a minion +2 Health.
Draw a card.
Power Word: Shield.flavor: Sure the extra protection is nice, but the shield really reduces visibility.

Sap.name: Sap
Sap.text: Return an enemy minion to your opponent's hand.

Kara Kazham!.name: Kara Kazham!
Kara Kazham!.text: Summon a 1/1 Candle, 2/2 Broom, and 3/3 Teapot.
Kara Kazham!.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
Kara Kazham!.flavor: This is what happens when you tell Khadgar to set the table.
Kara Kazham!.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.

Noble Sacrifice.name: Noble Sacrifice
Noble Sacrifice.text: Secret: When an enemy attacks, summon a 2/1 Defender as the new target.

Fjola Lightbane.name: Fjola Lightbane
Fjola Lightbane.text: Whenever you target this minion with a spell, gain Divine Shield.

Sen'jin Shieldmasta.name: Sen'jin Shieldmasta
Sen'jin Shieldmasta.flavor: Sen'jin Villiage is nice, if you like trolls and dust.

Protect the King!.name: Protect the King!
Protect the King!.text: For each enemy minion, summon a 1/1 Pawn with Taunt.
Protect the King!.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
Protect the King!.flavor: Form ranks! Everyone into the King's Tuskarr Defense!
Protect the King!.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.

Axe Flinger.name: Axe Flinger
Axe Flinger.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
Axe Flinger.howToEarn: Unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Axe Flinger.flavor: Once a lowly "Stick Flinger", he's been relentless on the path to his ultimate dream: "Tauren Flinger".
Axe Flinger.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Quick Shot.name: Quick Shot
Quick Shot.text:
Deal $3 damage.
If your hand is empty, draw a card.
Quick Shot.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Quick Shot.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Mistress of Mixtures.name: Mistress of Mixtures
Mistress of Mixtures.flavor: Her favorite mixture is cola and lime.

Kobold Geomancer.name: Kobold Geomancer
Kobold Geomancer.flavor: In the old days, Kobolds were the finest candle merchants in the land. Then they got pushed too far...

Avenge.name: Avenge
Avenge.text: Secret: When one of your minions dies, give a random friendly minion +3/+2.
Avenge.howToEarn: Unlocked in Frostwyrm Lair, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Avenge.flavor: Several paladins have joined together to deliver justice under the name "Justice Force".  Their lawyer talked them out of calling themselves the Justice League.
Avenge.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Frostwyrm Lair, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Blessed Champion.name: Blessed Champion
Blessed Champion.flavor: This card causes double the trouble AND double the fun.

Mimiron's Head.name: Mimiron's Head
Mimiron's Head.text: At the start of your turn, if you have at least 3 Mechs, destroy them all and form V-07-TR-0N.
Mimiron's Head.flavor: Do not push the big red button!

Twilight Drake.name: Twilight Drake
Twilight Drake.text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Health for each card in your hand.
Twilight Drake.flavor: Twilight drakes feed on Mystical Energy.  And Tacos.

Tanaris Hogchopper.name: Tanaris Hogchopper
Tanaris Hogchopper.text: [x]Battlecry: If your opponent's hand is empty, gain Charge.
Tanaris Hogchopper.flavor: The Hogchoppers are well-known throughout Kalimdor for being a real, actual group.

Soulfire.name: Soulfire
Soulfire.flavor: Are you lighting a soul on fire? Or burning someone with your OWN soul? This seems like an important distinction.

Cat Trick.name: Cat Trick
Cat Trick.text: Secret: After your opponent casts a spell, summon a 4/2 Panther with Stealth.
Cat Trick.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
Cat Trick.flavor: "I know some new tricks, a lot of good tricks. I will show them to you. Medivh will not mind at all if I do."
Cat Trick.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.

Wildwalker.name: Wildwalker
Wildwalker.flavor: She was born to be something.  She is just not quite sure what yet...

Klaxxi Amber-Weaver.name: Klaxxi Amber-Weaver
Klaxxi Amber-Weaver.text: Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, gain +5 Health.
Klaxxi Amber-Weaver.flavor: Amberweaving is a specialty course at the local trade school.

Arch-Thief Rafaam.name: Arch-Thief Rafaam
Arch-Thief Rafaam.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Arch-Thief Rafaam.flavor: He's very good at retrieving artifacts.  From other people's museums.
Arch-Thief Rafaam.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Smuggler's Run.name: Smuggler's Run
Smuggler's Run.text: Give all minions in your hand +1/+1.
Smuggler's Run.flavor: One of the most famous busts in Gadgetzan’s history happened on Smuggler’s Run, where Sergeant Sally apprehended a cadre of Grimy Goons transporting a massive number of illegal fish heads.

Stoneskin Gargoyle.name: Stoneskin Gargoyle
Stoneskin Gargoyle.text: At the start of your turn, restore this minion to full Health.
Stoneskin Gargoyle.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Stoneskin Gargoyle.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Infested Wolf.name: Infested Wolf
Infested Wolf.flavor: A little flea powder will fix that right up.

Chromaggus.name: Chromaggus
Chromaggus.text: Whenever you draw a card, put another copy into your hand.
Chromaggus.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Chromaggus.flavor: Left head and right head can never agree about what to eat for dinner, so they always end up just eating ramen again.
Chromaggus.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Swipe.name: Swipe
Swipe.text: Deal $4 damage to an enemy and $1 damage to all other enemies.
Swipe.flavor: When a bear rears back and extends his arms, he's about to Swipe!  ... or hug.

Crackling Razormaw.name: Crackling Razormaw
Crackling Razormaw.flavor: Wasn't clever enough to go AROUND the electric fence.

Vilefin Inquisitor.name: Vilefin Inquisitor
Vilefin Inquisitor.text: Battlecry: Your Hero Power becomes 'Summon a 1/1 Murloc.'

Fossilized Devilsaur.name: Fossilized Devilsaur
Fossilized Devilsaur.text: Battlecry: If you control a Beast, gain Taunt.
Fossilized Devilsaur.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Fossilized Devilsaur.flavor: This was the only job he could get after the dinosaur theme park debacle.
Fossilized Devilsaur.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Duplicate.name: Duplicate
Duplicate.text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, put 2 copies of it into your hand.
Duplicate.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Duplicate.flavor: The one time when duping cards won't get your account banned!
Duplicate.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Desert Camel.name: Desert Camel
Desert Camel.text: Battlecry: Put a 1-Cost minion from each deck into the battlefield.
Desert Camel.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Desert Camel.flavor: Dang.  This card is sweet.  Almost as sweet as Dessert Camel.
Desert Camel.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Meteor.name: Meteor
Meteor.text: Deal $15 damage to a minion and $3 damage to adjacent ones.
Meteor.flavor: When you absolutely, positively, have to kill all the dinosaurs.

Kel'Thuzad.name: Kel'Thuzad
Kel'Thuzad.text: At the end of each turn, summon all friendly minions that died this turn.
Kel'Thuzad.howToEarn: Unlocked in Frostwyrm Lair, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Kel'Thuzad.flavor: Kel'Thuzad could not resist the call of the Lich King. Even when it's just a robo-call extolling the Lich King's virtues.
Kel'Thuzad.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Frostwyrm Lair, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Tinkertown Technician.name: Tinkertown Technician
Tinkertown Technician.text: Battlecry: If you have a Mech, gain +1/+1 and add a Spare Part to your hand.
Tinkertown Technician.flavor: Won't you take me to... Tinkertown?

Confessor Paletress.name: Confessor Paletress
Confessor Paletress.flavor: She sees into your past and makes you face your fears.  Most common fear:  Getting Majordomo out of Sneed's Old Shredder.

Direhorn Hatchling.name: Direhorn Hatchling
Direhorn Hatchling.text: Taunt Deathrattle: Shuffle a 6/9 Direhorn with Taunt into your deck.
Direhorn Hatchling.flavor: His mom could beat up your mom.

Cursed Blade.name: Cursed Blade
Cursed Blade.text: Double all damage dealt to your hero.
Cursed Blade.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Cursed Blade.flavor: The Curse is that you have to listen to "MMMBop" on repeat.
Cursed Blade.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Raven Idol.name: Raven Idol
Raven Idol.text: Choose One - Discover a minion; or Discover a spell.
Raven Idol.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Raven Idol.flavor: Was petrified when it found out it didn't make the cut for Azerothian Idol.
Raven Idol.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Greater Healing Potion.name: Greater Healing Potion
Greater Healing Potion.text: Restore #12 Health to a friendly character.

Pilfered Power.name: Pilfered Power
Pilfered Power.text: Gain an empty Mana Crystal for each friendly minion.
Pilfered Power.flavor: The Hozen don't get paid much, but at least they get to keep any excess mana.

Iron Juggernaut.name: Iron Juggernaut
Iron Juggernaut.text: Battlecry: Shuffle a Mine into your opponent's deck. When drawn, it explodes for 10 damage.
Iron Juggernaut.flavor: The Iron Juggernaut guards Orgrimmar and has just earned the "Employee of the Month" award!

Mimic Pod.name: Mimic Pod
Mimic Pod.text: Draw a card, then add a copy of it to your hand.

Gadgetzan Jouster.name: Gadgetzan Jouster
Gadgetzan Jouster.text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, gain +1/+1.
Gadgetzan Jouster.flavor: It's not HER fault you didn't put a spinning saw blade on your horse.

Elder Longneck.name: Elder Longneck
Elder Longneck.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a minion with 5 or more Attack, Adapt.
Elder Longneck.flavor: And so the bartender says, “Why the long neck?”

Soot Spewer.name: Soot Spewer
Soot Spewer.flavor: The inventor of the goblin shredder is involved in several patent disputes with the inventor of the soot spewer.

Cabal Shadow Priest.name: Cabal Shadow Priest
Cabal Shadow Priest.text: Battlecry: Take control of an enemy minion that has 2 or less Attack.
Cabal Shadow Priest.targetingArrowText: Steal a minion that has 2 or less Attack.
Cabal Shadow Priest.flavor: You never know who may be secretly working for the Cabal....

Boneguard Lieutenant.name: Boneguard Lieutenant
Boneguard Lieutenant.flavor: Underneath all that impressive armor, he's just skin and bones.  Okay, maybe just bones.

Devolve.name: Devolve
Devolve.text: Transform all enemy minions into random ones that cost (1) less.
Devolve.flavor: Ragnaros looked down. He looked like some kind of War Golem. "WHAT HAVE YOU DONE TO ME," he yelled. But all that came out was a deep grinding sound. He began to cry.

Snake Trap.name: Snake Trap
Snake Trap.text: Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, summon three 1/1 Snakes.
Snake Trap.flavor: Why did it have to be snakes?

Justicar Trueheart.name: Justicar Trueheart
Justicar Trueheart.text: Battlecry: Replace your starting Hero Power with a better one.
Justicar Trueheart.flavor: It's like putting racing stripes and a giant spoiler on your hero power.

Junkbot.name: Junkbot
Junkbot.text: Whenever a friendly Mech dies, gain +2/+2.
Junkbot.flavor: One bot's junk is another bot's AWESOME UPGRADE!

Undercity Valiant.name: Undercity Valiant
Undercity Valiant.flavor: Almost went to play for Stormwind before signing with Undercity.

Nourish.name: Nourish
Nourish.text: Choose One - Gain 2 Mana Crystals; or Draw 3 cards.
Nourish.flavor: Druids take nourishment from many things: the power of nature, the songbird's chirp, a chocolate cake.

Lightfused Stegodon.name: Lightfused Stegodon
Lightfused Stegodon.flavor: “Come now, Johnston. I think those horns are quite fetching on you.”

Darnassus Aspirant.name: Darnassus Aspirant
Darnassus Aspirant.text: Battlecry: Gain an empty Mana Crystal. Deathrattle: Lose a Mana Crystal.
Darnassus Aspirant.flavor: She loves mana crystals, she hates mana crystals.   So fickle!

Tentacle of N'Zoth.name: Tentacle of N'Zoth
Tentacle of N'Zoth.flavor: Because EVERYDAY is the Day of the Tentacle of N'zoth.

Fallen Hero.name: Fallen Hero
Fallen Hero.text: Your Hero Power deals 1 extra damage.

Holy Wrath.name: Holy Wrath
Holy Wrath.text: Draw a card and deal damage equal to its Cost.

Shadow Madness.name: Shadow Madness
Shadow Madness.text: Gain control of an enemy minion with 3 or less Attack until end of turn.
Shadow Madness.flavor: You can rationalize it all you want, it's still a mean thing to do.

Mogu'shan Warden.name: Mogu'shan Warden
Mogu'shan Warden.flavor: All these guys ever do is talk about the Thunder King.   BOOOORRRINNG!

Arcane Nullifier X-21.name: Arcane Nullifier X-21
Arcane Nullifier X-21.text: Taunt Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
Arcane Nullifier X-21.flavor: There was some hard talk between gnome magi and engineers about inventing this mech.

Raza the Chained.name: Raza the Chained
Raza the Chained.text: [x] Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, your Hero Power costs (0) this game.
Raza the Chained.flavor: "Could you do me a favor and get the keys from Kazakus?"

Ancient Harbinger.name: Ancient Harbinger
Ancient Harbinger.text: At the start of your turn, put a 10-Cost minion from your deck into your hand.
Ancient Harbinger.flavor: "honey, can u run down to the store and pick up some 10 cost minions? thx"

River Crocolisk.name: River Crocolisk
River Crocolisk.flavor: Edward "Lefty" Smith tried to make luggage out of a river crocolisk once.

Silvermoon Portal.name: Silvermoon Portal
Silvermoon Portal.text:
Give a minion +2/+2. Summon a random
2-Cost minion.
Silvermoon Portal.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
Silvermoon Portal.flavor: What's Millhouse Manastorm doing in Silvermoon?
Silvermoon Portal.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.

Vinecleaver.name: Vinecleaver
Vinecleaver.text:
[x]After your hero attacks,
summon two 1/1 Silver
Hand Recruits.
Vinecleaver.flavor: George and Karl!  Thank the Light we found you!

Injured Blademaster.name: Injured Blademaster
Injured Blademaster.flavor: He claims it is an old war wound, but we think he just cut himself shaving.

Aviana.name: Aviana
Aviana.flavor: Call her "Tweety".  She'll find it real funny.  I PROMISE.

Terrorscale Stalker.name: Terrorscale Stalker
Terrorscale Stalker.flavor: Likes to scare his friends half to death.

Darkshire Librarian.name: Darkshire Librarian
Darkshire Librarian.text: Battlecry: Discard a random card. Deathrattle: Draw a card.
Darkshire Librarian.flavor: Do NOT be late with your overdue fines.

Dreadsteed.name: Dreadsteed
Dreadsteed.flavor: Crescendo himself summoned this steed, riding it to victory in the Grand Tournament.  Wherever he rides, an army of riders ride behind him, supporting the legendary champion.

Hemet Nesingwary.name: Hemet Nesingwary
Hemet Nesingwary.flavor: It's hard to make a living as a hunter in a world where beasts instantly reappear minutes after you kill them.

Lightbomb.name: Lightbomb
Lightbomb.text: Deal damage to each minion equal to its Attack.
Lightbomb.flavor: This is what happens when you allow goblins to be priests.

Dancing Swords.name: Dancing Swords
Dancing Swords.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Dancing Swords.flavor: They like to dance to reggae.
Dancing Swords.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Shadowstep.name: Shadowstep
Shadowstep.text: Return a friendly minion to your hand. It costs (2) less.
Shadowstep.flavor: Rogue dance troops will sometimes Shadowstep away at the end of a performance.  Crowds love it.

Alleycat.name: Alleycat
Alleycat.flavor: To be a cool cat in Gadgetzan, you gotta have bling.

Glaivezooka.name: Glaivezooka
Glaivezooka.text: Battlecry: Give a random friendly minion +1 Attack.
Glaivezooka.flavor: For the times when a regular bazooka just isn't enough.

Core Hound.name: Core Hound
Core Hound.flavor: You don’t tame a Core Hound. You just train it to eat someone else before it eats you.

Charge.name: Charge
Charge.text: Give a friendly minion Charge. It can't attack heroes this turn.
Charge.flavor: "Guys! Guys! Slow down!" - some kind of non-warrior minion

Spiteful Smith.name: Spiteful Smith
Spiteful Smith.flavor: She'll craft you a sword, but you'll need to bring her 5 Steel Ingots, 3 Motes of Earth, and the scalp of her last customer.

Sense Demons.name: Sense Demons
Sense Demons.flavor: Generally demons are pretty obvious and you don’t need a spell to sense them.

Gurubashi Berserker.name: Gurubashi Berserker
Gurubashi Berserker.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, gain +3 Attack.

Beneath the Grounds.name: Beneath the Grounds
Beneath the Grounds.text: Shuffle 3 Ambushes into your opponent's deck. When drawn, you summon a 4/4 Nerubian.
Beneath the Grounds.flavor: Can you hold these eggs for just a second?  I promise they're not full of giant enraged undead spider things.

Twisting Nether.name: Twisting Nether
Twisting Nether.flavor: The Twisting Nether is a formless place of magic and illusion and destroyed minions.

Hemet, Jungle Hunter.name: Hemet, Jungle Hunter
Hemet, Jungle Hunter.text: Battlecry: Destroy all cards in your deck that cost (3) or less.
Hemet, Jungle Hunter.flavor: The goblin travel agency lost his luggage, but he's still having a great vacation!

Blackwing Technician.name: Blackwing Technician
Blackwing Technician.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1/+1.
Blackwing Technician.howToEarn: Unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackwing Technician.flavor: This is who you go to when your Blackwing needs a tune up. Don't go to a cut rate Blackwing tune up shop!
Blackwing Technician.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Starfall.name: Starfall
Starfall.text: Choose One - Deal $5 damage to a minion; or $2 damage to all enemy minions.
Starfall.flavor: Is the sky falling?  Yes.  Yes it is.

Ornery Direhorn.name: Ornery Direhorn
Ornery Direhorn.flavor: "It's an herbivore.  How dangerous can it be?"  - Famous last words

Ancestral Spirit.name: Ancestral Spirit
Ancestral Spirit.text: Give a minion "Deathrattle: Resummon this minion."
Ancestral Spirit.flavor: It was just a flesh wound.

Sudden Genesis.name: Sudden Genesis
Sudden Genesis.text: Summon copies of your damaged minions.
Sudden Genesis.flavor: Being hurt can make you another person.

Emerald Hive Queen.name: Emerald Hive Queen
Emerald Hive Queen.flavor: She rules the emerald hive at the end of the yellow brick trail.

Confuse.name: Confuse
Confuse.text: Swap the Attack and Health of all minions.

Mukla, Tyrant of the Vale.name: Mukla, Tyrant of the Vale
Mukla, Tyrant of the Vale.flavor: Pro tip: DO NOT BOGART THE BANANAS.

Seal of Champions.name: Seal of Champions
Seal of Champions.text: Give a minion +3 Attack and Divine Shield.

Living Roots.name: Living Roots
Living Roots.text: Choose One - Deal $2 damage; or Summon two 1/1 Saplings.
Living Roots.flavor: 2 out of 2 saplings recommend that you summon the saplings.

Spiritsinger Umbra.name: Spiritsinger Umbra
Spiritsinger Umbra.text: After you summon a minion, trigger its Deathrattle effect.
Spiritsinger Umbra.flavor: She sees the fate of anyone she meets, but it's always the same: dinosaur attack.

Crush.name: Crush
Crush.text: Destroy a minion. If you have a damaged minion, this costs (4) less.
Crush.flavor: Using this card on your enemies is one of the best things in life, according to some barbarians.

Imp-losion.name: Imp-losion
Imp-losion.text: Deal $2-$4 damage to a minion. Summon a 1/1 Imp for each damage dealt.
Imp-losion.flavor: The shrapnel is waaaaay worse than the explosion.

Charged Devilsaur.name: Charged Devilsaur
Charged Devilsaur.flavor: What happens when a dinosaur mixes soda and pop rocks.

Explosive Sheep.name: Explosive Sheep
Explosive Sheep.flavor: How is this supposed to work? Your enemies think, "Hey! Cute sheep!" and run over to cuddle it?

Southsea Captain.name: Southsea Captain
Southsea Captain.flavor: When he saves enough plunder, he's going to commission an enormous captain's hat.  He has hat envy.

Ancient of Blossoms.name: Ancient of Blossoms
Ancient of Blossoms.flavor: His new shampoo is really working!

Eviscerate.name: Eviscerate
Eviscerate.flavor: There is a high cost to Eviscerating your opponent:  It takes a long time to get blood stains out of leather armor.

Demolisher.name: Demolisher
Demolisher.text: At the start of your turn, deal 2 damage to a random enemy.
Demolisher.flavor: Laying siege isn't fun for anyone.  It's not even all that effective, now that everyone has a flying mount.

The Mistcaller.name: The Mistcaller
The Mistcaller.text: Battlecry: Give all minions in your hand and deck +1/+1.
The Mistcaller.flavor: Calling the mist doesn't sound all that great.  "Ooooh, it is slightly damp now!"

Cyclopian Horror.name: Cyclopian Horror
Cyclopian Horror.text: Taunt. Battlecry: Gain +1 Health for each enemy minion.
Cyclopian Horror.flavor: What are the qualifications for being a 'Horror?'  Just how horrible do you have to be?

Aldor Peacekeeper.name: Aldor Peacekeeper
Aldor Peacekeeper.text: Battlecry: Change an enemy minion's Attack to 1.
Aldor Peacekeeper.flavor: The Aldor hate two things: the Scryers and smooth jazz.

Krul the Unshackled.name: Krul the Unshackled
Krul the Unshackled.text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, summon all  Demons from your hand.
Krul the Unshackled.flavor: Spicklefizz pondered his life choices as he looked at the chain around his neck. "Become a warlock," they said. "You get to enslave demons," they said.

Dark Bargain.name: Dark Bargain
Dark Bargain.text: Destroy 2 random enemy minions. Discard 2 random cards.
Dark Bargain.flavor: A prime example of lose-lose negotiating.

Grand Crusader.name: Grand Crusader
Grand Crusader.text: Battlecry: Add a random Paladin card to your hand.
Grand Crusader.flavor: A veteran of a number of crusades, she is a force for light and goodness.  Her latest crusade is against goblin telemarketers.

Avian Watcher.name: Avian Watcher
Avian Watcher.text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, gain +1/+1 and Taunt.
Avian Watcher.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
Avian Watcher.flavor: He mostly watches light romantic comedies.
Avian Watcher.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.

Emerald Reaver.name: Emerald Reaver
Emerald Reaver.flavor: Not to be confused with clubbing enthusiast Emerald Raver.

Flamestrike.name: Flamestrike
Flamestrike.text: Deal $4 damage to all enemy minions.
Flamestrike.flavor: When the ground is on fire, you should not stop, drop, and roll.

Grommash Hellscream.name: Grommash Hellscream
Grommash Hellscream.flavor: Grommash drank the tainted blood of Mannoroth, dooming the orcs to green skin and red eyes!  Maybe not his best decision.

Zealous Initiate.name: Zealous Initiate
Zealous Initiate.flavor: Ok, Initiate. You need to settle down and do your job. In this case, that means die so someone else can get a minor buff.

Kidnapper.name: Kidnapper
Kidnapper.text: Combo: Return a minion to its owner's hand.
Kidnapper.flavor: He just wants people to see his vacation photos.

Southsea Deckhand.name: Southsea Deckhand
Southsea Deckhand.text: Has Charge while you have a weapon equipped.
Southsea Deckhand.flavor: Pirates are into this new fad called "Planking".

Arcanologist.name: Arcanologist
Arcanologist.flavor: What did you draw? Shhhh… it’s a secret.

Spiked Hogrider.name: Spiked Hogrider
Spiked Hogrider.text: Battlecry: If an enemy minion has Taunt, gain Charge.
Spiked Hogrider.flavor: Did you know the Hogchoppers compete every year at the Mirage Raceway?  They do.  It's a real group.

Blackwater Pirate.name: Blackwater Pirate
Blackwater Pirate.flavor: "Look, they fell off the back of a ship, do you want them or not? I have a meeting with Y'Shaarj in like ten minutes."

Flesheating Ghoul.name: Flesheating Ghoul
Flesheating Ghoul.text: Whenever a minion dies, gain +1 Attack.
Flesheating Ghoul.flavor: 'Flesheating' is an unfair name.  It's just that there's not really much else for him to eat.

Young Dragonhawk.name: Young Dragonhawk
Young Dragonhawk.flavor: They were the inspiration for the championship Taurenball team: The Dragonhawks.

Demonwrath.name: Demonwrath
Demonwrath.text:
[x]Deal $2 damage to all
minions except Demons.
Demonwrath.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Demonwrath.flavor: Demons are not angry most of the time. You have to play this card in order to really bring it out of them.
Demonwrath.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Crazed Alchemist.name: Crazed Alchemist
Crazed Alchemist.text: Battlecry: Swap the Attack and Health of a minion.
Crazed Alchemist.targetingArrowText: Swap Attack and Health of a minion.
Crazed Alchemist.flavor: "You'll love my new recipe!" he says... especially if you're not happy with your current number of limbs.

Stormwind Champion.name: Stormwind Champion
Stormwind Champion.flavor: When Deathwing assaulted the capital, this soldier was the only member of his squad to survive. Now he's all bitter and stuff.

Runic Egg.name: Runic Egg
Runic Egg.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
Runic Egg.flavor: Oh man! Runic omelettes are the best!
Runic Egg.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.

Blowgill Sniper.name: Blowgill Sniper
Blowgill Sniper.flavor: Imagine how much further his darts would go if he had lungs instead of gills!

Blessing of Kings.name: Blessing of Kings
Blessing of Kings.flavor: Given the number of kings who have been assassinated, are you sure you want their blessing?

Forbidden Healing.name: Forbidden Healing
Forbidden Healing.text: Spend all your Mana. Restore twice that much Health.
Forbidden Healing.flavor: No one's quite sure why it's forbidden. And yes, that should make you nervous.

Frost Nova.name: Frost Nova
Frost Nova.flavor: Hey man, that's cold.  Literally and metaphorically.

Ram Wrangler.name: Ram Wrangler
Ram Wrangler.text: Battlecry: If you have a Beast, summon a random Beast.
Ram Wrangler.flavor: Not getting trampled is really the trick here.

The Black Knight.name: The Black Knight
The Black Knight.flavor: He was sent by the Lich King to disrupt the Argent Tournament.   We can pretty much mark that a failure.

Arcane Shot.name: Arcane Shot
Arcane Shot.flavor: Magi conjured arcane arrows to sell to hunters, until hunters learned just enough magic to do it themselves.  The resulting loss of jobs sent Stormwind into a minor recession.

Draenei Totemcarver.name: Draenei Totemcarver
Draenei Totemcarver.flavor: It's nice to find a real craftsman in this day and age of mass-produced totems.

Spawn of N'Zoth.name: Spawn of N'Zoth
Spawn of N'Zoth.flavor: Who's a cute widdle N'Zoth? You are! Yes you are! Yes you're the cutest widdle N'Zoth in the whole world!!!

Silver Hand Knight.name: Silver Hand Knight
Silver Hand Knight.flavor: It's good to be a knight.   Less so to be one's squire.

Flame Imp.name: Flame Imp
Flame Imp.flavor: Imps like being on fire.  They just do.

Violet Illusionist.name: Violet Illusionist
Violet Illusionist.text: During your turn, your hero is Immune.
Violet Illusionist.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
Violet Illusionist.flavor: She’s much more cheerful after losing the ‘n’ in her name.
Violet Illusionist.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.

Dragon Egg.name: Dragon Egg
Dragon Egg.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 2/1 Whelp.
Dragon Egg.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Dragon Egg.flavor: Think of them as bullets for your dragon gun.
Dragon Egg.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Goblin Blastmage.name: Goblin Blastmage
Goblin Blastmage.text: Battlecry: If you have a Mech, deal 4 damage randomly split among all enemies.
Goblin Blastmage.flavor: If you can't find a bomb to throw, just pick up any goblin invention and throw that.

Pint-Sized Summoner.name: Pint-Sized Summoner
Pint-Sized Summoner.text: The first minion you play each turn costs (1) less.
Pint-Sized Summoner.flavor: She's quite jealous of the Gallon-Sized Summoner.

Kabal Chemist.name: Kabal Chemist
Kabal Chemist.text: Battlecry: Add a random Potion to your hand.
Kabal Chemist.flavor: Sure you could have that Polymorph potion, but wouldn't you rather have this mystery potion?  It could be anything.  Even a Polymorph potion!

Iron Sensei.name: Iron Sensei
Iron Sensei.text: At the end of your turn, give another friendly Mech +2/+2.
Iron Sensei.flavor:
Mechs like learning from him because he really speaks their language.
0110100001101001

Xaril, Poisoned Mind.name: Xaril, Poisoned Mind
Xaril, Poisoned Mind.text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Add a random Toxin card to your hand.
Xaril, Poisoned Mind.flavor: It's basically your own fault if you go around drinking weird green potions handed out by creepy mantid dudes.

Gnomish Experimenter.name: Gnomish Experimenter
Gnomish Experimenter.text: Battlecry: Draw a card. If it's a minion, transform it into a Chicken.
Gnomish Experimenter.flavor: He's legitimately surprised every time he turns himself into a chicken.

Menagerie Warden.name: Menagerie Warden
Menagerie Warden.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly Beast. Summon a copy of it.
Menagerie Warden.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
Menagerie Warden.flavor: Please? Can I keep him? I promise to clean his cage every day.
Menagerie Warden.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.

Shrinkmeister.name: Shrinkmeister
Shrinkmeister.text: Battlecry: Give a minion -2 Attack this turn.
Shrinkmeister.flavor: After the debacle of the Gnomish World Enlarger, gnomes are wary of size-changing inventions.

Mortal Strike.name: Mortal Strike
Mortal Strike.text: Deal $4 damage. If you have 12 or less Health, deal $6 instead.
Mortal Strike.flavor: "If you only use one ability, use Mortal Strike." - The Warrior Code, Line 6

Force of Nature.name: Force of Nature
Force of Nature.flavor: "I think I'll just nap under these trees. Wait... AAAAAHHH!" - Blinkfizz, the Unfortunate Gnome

Shadowfiend.name: Shadowfiend
Shadowfiend.text: Whenever you draw a card, reduce its Cost by (1).
Shadowfiend.flavor: Hopes to be promoted to "Shadowfriend" someday.

Grimscale Oracle.name: Grimscale Oracle
Grimscale Oracle.flavor: These are the brainy murlocs.  It turns out that doesn’t mean much.

Dragonkin Sorcerer.name: Dragonkin Sorcerer
Dragonkin Sorcerer.text: Whenever you target this minion with a spell, gain +1/+1.
Dragonkin Sorcerer.howToEarn: Unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Dragonkin Sorcerer.flavor: Dragonkin Sorcerers be all "I'm a wizard" and everyone else be all "daaaaang".
Dragonkin Sorcerer.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

C'Thun's Chosen.name: C'Thun's Chosen
C'Thun's Chosen.text: [x]Divine Shield Battlecry: Give your C'Thun +2/+2 (wherever it is).
C'Thun's Chosen.flavor: He gave her a promise ring and everything.

Worgen Greaser.name: Worgen Greaser
Worgen Greaser.flavor: Hair products are 79% of his monthly budget.

Cobra Shot.name: Cobra Shot
Cobra Shot.text: Deal $3 damage to a minion and the enemy hero.
Cobra Shot.flavor: "Cobra Shot" hurts way, way, way more than "Cobra Cuddle."

The Marsh Queen.name: The Marsh Queen
The Marsh Queen.flavor: Question: What's scarier, one giant angry dinosaur or 15 smaller vicious ones? Answer: AHHHHHHH THEY FOUND MEEEEEE

Burgly Bully.name: Burgly Bully
Burgly Bully.text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, add a Coin to your hand.
Burgly Bully.flavor: He only burgles to pay the bills.  He is really just a bully at heart.
